Next Space Setup.code:
; NAME: Next Space Setup
; GAMES: MP3_USA
; EXECUTION: Direct
; PARAM: Space|Next
; PARAM: Space|Prev

ADDIU SP SP -40
SW RA 36(SP)

LI A0 -1 ; Set current player
LI A1 Next_chain_index ; Pass chain index on A1
JAL SetNextChainAndSpace
LI A2 Next_chain_space_index ; Pass chain space index on A2

LI A0 -1
LI A1 Prev_chain_index ; Pass chain index on A1
JAL SetPrevChainAndSpace
LI A2 Prev_chain_space_index ; Pass chain space index on A2

LW RA 36(SP)
JR RA
ADDIU SP SP 40

Boo Bellhouse v3.code:
; NAME: Boo Bellhouse v3
; GAMES: MP3_USA
; EXECUTION: Direct
; PARAM: Space|BooBellhouse

ADDIU SP SP -40
SW RA 36(SP)
SW S0 32(SP)
SW S1 28(SP)

; S0 = Current Player Struct
; S1 = Empty Item Slot

;===Rotate Toward Boo Bellhouse===
LI A0 -1 ; Set current player
LI A1 8 ; Rotate in 8 frames
JAL RotatePlayerModel
LI A2 BooBellhouse ; Face BooBellhouse

;===Check Player Item Slots===
JAL GetCurrentPlayerIndex ; Get current player index at V0
NOP

JAL PlayerHasEmptyItemSlot
MOVE A0 V0 ; Check current player

BLTZ V0 NoSpace ; If V0 < 0 (no empty slots), go to NoSpace
NOP
MOVE S1 V0 ; Copy V0 to S1

;===Boo Bellhouse Message===
JAL PlaySound
LI A0 0x257 ; Boo laugh

LUI A0 hi(BellhouseMessage)
JAL CallMessage
ADDIU A0 A0 lo(BellhouseMessage) ; Display BellhouseMessage

;===Receive Boo Bell===
JAL GetPlayerStruct
LI A0 -1 ; Get current player struct at V0
MOVE S0 V0 ; Copy V0 to S0

LI T0 0x0B ; Boo Bell index
ADDU V0 V0 S1 ; Add empty slot offset to player struct
SB T0 0x18(V0) ; Store item into empty slot offset of player struct

JAL PlaySound
LI A0 0x10C ; Turn Start sound

;===Play Happy Voice and Animation===
LBU A0 3(S0) ; Load character value from offset of player struct
JAL PlaySound
ADDIU A0 A0 0x2BE ; Add character value to Mario's happy voice
; Character voices are their "character value" distance away from
; Mario's, e.g. Luigi's character value = 1, so Luigi's happy voice
; is 1 away from Mario's.
; 0x2BE = Happy Voice, 0x287 = Sad Voice

LI A0 -1 ; Set current player
LI A1 5 ; Set joy animation
JAL SetBoardPlayerAnimation
LI A2 0 ; Do not loop animation

JAL SleepProcess
LI A0 40 ; Wait 40 frames for animation

J exit
NOP

;===No Space Message===
NoSpace:
JAL PlaySound
LI A0 0x25E ; Boo cry

LUI A0 hi(NoSpaceMessage)
JAL CallMessage
ADDIU A0 A0 lo(NoSpaceMessage) ; Display NoSpaceMessage

exit:
LW RA 36(SP)
LW S0 32(SP)
LW S1 28(SP)
JR RA
ADDIU SP SP 40

;===Mini Func to Call Message===
.align 4
CallMessage:
ADDIU SP SP -40
SW RA 36(SP)

; A0 = Message Address

MOVE A1 A0 ; Copy A0 to A1
SW R0 16(SP) ; A4
SW R0 20(SP) ; A5
SW R0 24(SP) ; A6
LI A0 0x7 ; Character image (-1 for none, 0x7 for Boo)
; Visit the following link to get the full list of Character Images
; https://github.com/PartyPlanner64/PartyPlanner64/wiki/Displaying-Messages
; If you use a character image, check the bottom of the code
LI A2 0
JAL ShowMessage
LI A3 0

; Obligatory message box closing/cleanup calls.
JAL 0x800EC9DC
NOP
JAL CloseMessage
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6EC
NOP

LW RA 36(SP)
JR RA
ADDIU SP SP 40

;===Message Text===
.align 16
BellhouseMessage:
.byte 0x1A,0x1A,0x1A,0x1A ; Padding for character image
.ascii "On behalf of the"
.byte 0x04 ; Purple font
.ascii " Boo Bellhouse"
.byte 0x08,0x82 ; White font, Comma (,)
.byte 0x0A,0x1A,0x1A,0x1A,0x1A ; New line + character image padding
.ascii "please accept this"
.byte 0x06 ; Blue font
.ascii " sonorous gift"
.byte 0x08,0xC2 ; White font, Exclamation mark (!)
.byte 0xFF,0 ; Wait, press A to confirm

.align 16
NoSpaceMessage:
.byte 0x1A,0x1A,0x1A,0x1A ; Padding for character image
.ascii "You can"
.byte 0x5C ; Apostrophe (')
.ascii "t accept my"
.byte 0x06 ; Blue font
.ascii " sonorous gift"
.byte 0x08,0xC3 ; White font, Question mark (?)
.byte 0x0A,0x1A,0x1A,0x1A,0x1A ; New line + character image padding
.ascii "How regrettable"
.byte 0x85 ; Period (.)
.byte 0xFF,0 ; Wait, press A to confirm

; Here's a list of the most common bytes you'll need
; .byte 0x01 ; Black font
; .byte 0x03 ; Red font
; .byte 0x04 ; Purple font
; .byte 0x05 ; Green font
; .byte 0x06 ; Blue font
; .byte 0x07 ; Yellow font
; .byte 0x08 ; White font
; .byte 0x85 ; Period (.)
; .byte 0xC2 ; Exclamation mark (!)
; .byte 0xC3 ; Question mark (?)
; .byte 0x82 ; Comma (,)
; .byte 0x0A ; New line (writes below)
; .byte 0x5C ; Apostrophe (')
; .byte 0x29 ; Coin icon
; .byte 0x3D ; Minus (-)
; .byte 0x3E ; Multiply (x)
; .byte 0xFF,0 ; Wait, press A to confirm

; If your message has an image, use this at the start of each line
; .byte 0x1A,0x1A,0x1A,0x1A ; Padding for character image

Mushroom Curse Effect.code:
; NAME: Mushroom Curse Effect
; GAMES: MP3_USA
; EXECUTION: Direct

ADDIU SP SP -40
SW RA 36(SP)
SW S0 32(SP)

;===Get Current Player Index===
JAL GetCurrentPlayerIndex ; Get current player index at V0
NOP
MOVE S0 V0 ; Copy V0 to S0

;===Get Player's Mushroom Curse Flag===
LUI T0 0x800C ; 0x800C0000
ORI T0 T0 0xD09C ; 0x800CD09C - P1 Mushroom Curse Flag
ADDU T0 T0 V0 ; Add to get current player's Mushroom Curse Flag

;===Check Flag===
LBU T1 0(T0) ; Load Mushroom Curse Flag value
BEQZ T1 exit ; If flag is OFF, exit
NOP
; else, flag is ON

;===Change Flags===
SB R0 0(T0) ; Turn off Mushroom Curse Flag

;===Store Forced Roll===
JAL GetRand
ORI A0 R0 0x04 ; Get random byte (0-4) at V0

LUI T1 0x800C ; 0x800C0000
ORI T1 T1 0xDBD2 ; 0x800CDBD2 - P1 Forced Roll Address

LI T0 0x4C ; Distance between each player's forced roll address
MULT T0 S0 ; Multiply player index by T0
MFLO T0 ; Move result into T0
ADDU T1 T1 T0 ; Add to get opponent's forced roll address

ADDIU V0 V0 1 ; Add 1 to random byte
SB V0 0(T1) ; Store forced roll into address

;===Display Message===
SW R0 16(SP) ; A4
SW R0 20(SP) ; A5
SW R0 24(SP) ; A6
LI A0 -1 ; Character image (-1 for none)
; Visit the following link to get the full list of Character Images
; https://github.com/PartyPlanner64/PartyPlanner64/wiki/Displaying-Messages
; If you use a character image, check the bottom of the code
LUI A1 hi(CurseMessage)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(CurseMessage) ; Display CurseMessage
LI A2 0
JAL ShowMessage
LI A3 0

; Obligatory message box closing/cleanup calls.
JAL 0x800EC9DC
NOP
JAL CloseMessage
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6EC
NOP

exit:
LW RA 36(SP)
LW S0 32(SP)
JR RA
ADDIU SP SP 40

;===Mini Func to Get Random Byte===
.align 4
GetRand: ; returns on V0

; A0 = max byte

ADDIU sp, sp, -0x18
SW ra, 0x0010 (sp)
BLTZL a0, label1_func0
SUBU a0, r0, a0
label1_func0:
BEQZ a0, End1
DADDU v0, r0, r0
ADDIU v0, r0, 0x0001
BNEL a0, v0, label2_func0
ADDIU v0, r0, 0x0064
JAL Function1
ADDIU a0, r0, 0x03E8
SLTI v0, v0, 0x01F5
J End1
XORI v0, v0, 0x0001
label2_func0:
BEQ a0, v0, label3_func0
NOP
JAL Function1
NOP
J End1
NOP
label3_func0:
JAL Function1
ADDIU a0, r0, 0x03F1
LUI v1, 0x6666
ORI v1, v1, 0x6667
MULT v0, v1
SRA v0, v0, 31
MFHI a1
SRA v1, a1, 2
SUBU v0, v1, v0
End1:
LW ra, 0x0010 (sp)
JR RA
ADDIU sp, sp, 0x18
//
Function1:
ADDIU sp, sp, -0x20
SW s0, 0x0010 (sp)
ADDIU s0, r0, 0xFFFF
SW s1, 0x0014 (sp)
ADDIU s1, a0, 0x0001
BNEZ s1, label1_func1
DIVU s0, s1
BREAK 0x01C00
label1_func1:
MFLO s0
BNEZ s0, label2_func1
SW ra, 0x0018 (sp)
ADDIU s0, r0, 0x0001
label2_func1:
JAL Function2
NOP
BNEZ s0, label3_func1
DIVU v0, s0
BREAK 0x01C00
label3_func1:
MFLO v1
SLTU v0, v1, s1
BEQZ v0, label2_func1
DADDU v0, v1, r0
LW ra, 0x0018 (sp)
LW s1, 0x0014 (sp)
LW s0, 0x0010 (sp)
JR RA
ADDIU sp, sp, 0x20
//
Function2:
LUI v0, 0x8009
LW v0, 0x7650 (v0)
LUI v1, 0x41C6
ORI v1, v1, 0x4E6D
MULT v0, v1
MFLO v0
ADDIU v0, v0, 0x3039
LUI v1, 0x8009
JR RA
SW v0, 0x7650 (v1)

;===Message Text===
.align 16
CurseMessage:
.ascii "Feeling the effects of the"
.byte 0x04 ; Purple font
.ascii " Mushroom Curse"
.byte 0x08,0x82 ; White font, Comma (,)
.ascii " you"
.byte 0x0A ; New line (writes below)
.ascii "can only roll up to"
.byte 0x03 ; Red font
.ascii " five"
.byte 0x08 ; White font
.ascii " this turn"
.byte 0xC2 ; Exclamation mark (!)
.byte 0xFF,0 ; Wait, press A to confirm

; Here's a list of the most common bytes you'll need
; .byte 0x01 ; Black font
; .byte 0x03 ; Red font
; .byte 0x04 ; Purple font
; .byte 0x05 ; Green font
; .byte 0x06 ; Blue font
; .byte 0x07 ; Yellow font
; .byte 0x08 ; White font
; .byte 0x85 ; Period (.)
; .byte 0xC2 ; Exclamation mark (!)
; .byte 0xC3 ; Question mark (?)
; .byte 0x82 ; Comma (,)
; .byte 0x0A ; New line (writes below)
; .byte 0x5C ; Apostrophe (')
; .byte 0x29 ; Coin icon
; .byte 0x3D ; Minus (-)
; .byte 0x3E ; Multiply (x)
; .byte 0xFF,0 ; Wait, press A to confirm

; If your message has an image, use this at the start of each line
; .byte 0x1A,0x1A,0x1A,0x1A ; Padding for character image

Boo Brothers Curse v1.1.code:
; NAME: Boo Brothers Curse v1.1
; GAMES: MP3_USA
; EXECUTION: Direct
; PARAM: Space|BooBrother
; PARAM: Boolean|LeftOrRight

ADDIU SP SP -120
SW RA 116(SP)
SW S0 112(SP)
SW S1 108(SP)
SW S2 104(SP)
SW S3 100(SP)

; S0 = Current Player Struct
; S1 = Prompt Choice / Item Offset of Player Struct
; S2 = Empty Item Slot / Curse Item Index
; S3 = Hitlist Address

;===Rotate Toward BooBrother===
LI A0 -1 ; Set current player
LI A1 8 ; Rotate in 8 frames
JAL RotatePlayerModel
LI A2 BooBrother ; Face BooBrother

;===Check Boo Repellant Flag===
LUI T0 0x800C ; 0x800C0000
ORI T0 T0 0xD09A ; 0x800CD09A - Boo Repellant Flag
ADDIU T0 T0 LeftOrRight ; Add 1 if it's Right Boo Brother
LBU T1 0(T0) ; Load value of Boo Repellant Flag
BNEZ T1 BooRepellantCursed
NOP
; else, Boo Brother is active

;===Check Player Inventory===
JAL GetPlayerStruct
LI A0 -1 ; Get current player struct at V0
MOVE S0 V0 ; Copy V0 to S0

JAL PlayerHasEmptyItemSlot
LBU A0 0x1D(S0) ; Pass current player index on A0

BEQZ V0 NoItems ; If V0 = 0 (no items), go to NoItems
NOP
MOVE S2 V0 ; Copy V0 to S2

;===Create Hitlist===
LBU T1 0x1D(S0) ; Load current player index into T1
LUI S3 hi(Hitlist)
ADDIU S3 S3 lo(Hitlist)
MOVE T3 S3 ; Copy S3 to T3
BEQZ T1 SkipHitZero ; If current player is P1, do not add to Hitlist
NOP
SB R0 0(T3) ; Add P1 to Hitlist
ADDIU T3 T3 1 ; Add 1 to get next spot on Hitlist

SkipHitZero:
LI T0 1
BEQ T1 T0 SkipHitOne ; If current player is P2, do not add to Hitlist
NOP
SB T0 0(T3) ; Add P2 to Hitlist
ADDIU T3 T3 1 ; Add 1 to get next spot on Hitlist

SkipHitOne:
LI T0 2
BEQ T1 T0 SkipHitTwo ; If current player is P3, do not add to Hitlist
NOP
SB T0 0(T3) ; Add P3 to Hitlist
ADDIU T3 T3 1 ; Add 1 to get next spot on Hitlist

SkipHitTwo:
LI T0 3
BEQ T1 T0 StartGreetingMessage ; If current player is P4, do not add to Hitlist
NOP
SB T0 0(T3) ; Add P4 to Hitlist

;===Greeting Message===
StartGreetingMessage:
JAL PlaySound
LI A0 0x257 ; Boo laugh

LUI A0 hi(GreetingMessage)
JAL CallMessage
ADDIU A0 A0 lo(GreetingMessage) ; Display GreetingMessage

;===Prepare Item Strings for Prompt===
StartItemPrompt:
LUI A0 hi(ItemPrompt)
ADDIU A0 A0 lo(ItemPrompt)
JAL PrepareItemStrings
MOVE A1 S0 ; Pass current player struct on A1

;===Display Item Prompt===
SW R0 16(SP) ; A4
SW R0 20(SP) ; A5
SW R0 24(SP) ; A6
LI A0 0x7 ; Character image (-1 for none, 0x7 for Boo)
; Visit the following link to get the full list of Character Images
; https://github.com/PartyPlanner64/PartyPlanner64/wiki/Displaying-Messages
; If you use a character image, check the bottom of the code
LUI A1 hi(ItemPromptHolder)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(ItemPromptHolder) ; Display ItemPrompt (with strings)
LI A2 0
JAL ShowMessage
LI A3 0

; Pass window ID on A0
JAL DisablePrompt
MOVE A1 S2 ; Pass empty item slot on A1

JAL AILogic
MOVE A0 S2 ; Pass empty item slot on A0

; Get the selection, either from the player or CPU.
; If A0 is a pointer to AI data, AI logic is ran to pick for CPUs.
; If A0 is 0 or 1, the 0th or 1st option is chosen by CPUs.
; If A0 is 2, then the value of A1 is the CPUs option index choice.
LI A0 2
JAL GetBasicPromptSelection
MOVE A1 V0 ; A1 now has the AI's decision
MOVE S1 V0 ; S1 now has the chosen option index

; Obligatory message box closing/cleanup calls.
JAL CloseMessage
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6EC
NOP

; Change the player's destination based on the choice.
LI T0 3
BNE S1 T0 SelectCurse
NOP
; else pick "View map"
JAL ViewBoardMap
NOP
J StartItemPrompt
NOP

;===Select Curse===
SelectCurse:
ADDU S1 S0 S1 ; Add item offset of player struct
LBU S2 0x18(S1) ; Load item value from offset of player struct

BNEZ S2 SkipMushroom
NOP

;===Mushroom Curse===
JAL DisplayCurseMessage
MOVE A0 S2 ; Pass item index on A0

JAL MushroomCurse
MOVE A0 S3 ; Pass Hitlist address on A0

J Exiting
NOP

;===Continue Selecting Curse===
SkipMushroom:
LI T0 0x02 ; Poison Mushroom index
BEQ T0 S2 PickNormalCurse
LI T0 0x03 ; Reverse Mushroom index
BEQ T0 S2 PickNormalCurse
LI T0 0x0A ; Golden Mushroom index
BEQ T0 S2 PickNormalCurse
NOP

LI T0 0x04 ; Cellular Shopper index
BEQ T0 S2 PickItemCurse
LI T0 0x06 ; Plunder Chest index
BEQ T0 S2 PickItemCurse
LI T0 0x10 ; Barter Box index
BEQ T0 S2 PickItemCurse
NOP

LI T0 0x05 ; Warp Block index
BEQ T0 S2 PickWarpCurse
NOP

LI T0 0x08 ; Dueling Glove index
BEQ T0 S2 PickDuelCurse
NOP

LI T0 0x0B ; Boo Bell index
BEQ T0 S2 PickBellCurse
NOP

LI T0 0x0C ; Boo Repellant index
BEQ T0 S2 PickRepelCurse
NOP

LI T0 0x0E ; Magic Lamp index
BEQ T0 S2 PickStarCurse
NOP

LI T0 0x0F ; Koopa Kard index
BEQ T0 S2 PickBankCurse
NOP
; else, pick Coin Curse

;===Coin Curse===
JAL DisplayCurseMessage
MOVE A0 S2 ; Pass item index on A0

MOVE A0 S3 ; Pass Hitlist address on A0
JAL CoinCurse
MOVE A1 S2 ; Pass item index on A1

J Exiting
NOP

;===Normal Curse===
PickNormalCurse:
JAL DisplayCurseMessage
MOVE A0 S2 ; Pass item index on A0

MOVE A0 S3 ; Pass Hitlist address on A0
JAL NormalCurse
MOVE A1 S2 ; Pass item index on A1

J Exiting
NOP

;===Item Curse===
PickItemCurse:
JAL DisplayCurseMessage
MOVE A0 S2 ; Pass item index on A0

MOVE A0 S3 ; Pass Hitlist address on A0
JAL ItemCurse
MOVE A1 S2 ; Pass item index on A1

J Exiting
NOP

;===Warp Curse===
PickWarpCurse:
JAL DisplayCurseMessage
MOVE A0 S2 ; Pass item index on A0

JAL WarpCurse
MOVE A0 S3 ; Pass Hitlist address on A0

J Exiting
NOP

;===Duel Curse===
PickDuelCurse:
JAL DisplayCurseMessage
MOVE A0 S2 ; Pass item index on A0

JAL DuelCurse
MOVE A0 S3 ; Pass Hitlist address on A0

J Exiting
NOP

;===Bell Curse===
PickBellCurse:
JAL DisplayCurseMessage
MOVE A0 S2 ; Pass item index on A0

JAL BellCurse
MOVE A0 S3 ; Pass Hitlist address on A0

J Exiting
NOP

;===Repel Curse===
PickRepelCurse:
JAL PlaySound
LI A0 0xB9 ; "Phew" sound

JAL SleepProcess
LI A0 30 ; Wait 30 frames for sound

LUI T0 0x800C ; 0x800C0000
ORI T0 T0 0xD09A ; 0x800CD09A - Boo Repellant Flag
ADDIU T0 T0 LeftOrRight ; Add 1 if it's the Right Boo Brother
LI T1 1 ; Turn flag ON
SB T1 0(T0) ; Store value of Boo Repellant Flag

JAL PlaySound
LI A0 0x25E ; Boo cry

LUI A0 hi(RepellantMessage)
JAL CallMessage
ADDIU A0 A0 lo(RepellantMessage) ; Display RepellantMessage

J exit
NOP

;===Star Curse===
PickStarCurse:
JAL DisplayCurseMessage
MOVE A0 S2 ; Pass item index on A0

JAL StarCurse
MOVE A0 S3 ; Pass Hitlist address on A0

J Exiting
NOP

;===Bank Curse===
PickBankCurse:
JAL DisplayCurseMessage
MOVE A0 S2 ; Pass item index on A0

JAL BankCurse
MOVE A0 S3 ; Pass Hitlist address on A0

;===Cursed Message===
Exiting:
LI T0 0xFF ; No item index
SB T0 0x18(S1) ; Store no item into chosen slot offset of player struct

JAL FixUpPlayerItemSlots
LBU A0 0x1D(S0) ; Pass current player index on A0
JAL FixUpPlayerItemSlots
LBU A0 0x1D(S0) ; Pass current player index on A0
JAL RefreshHUD
LBU A0 0x1D(S0) ; Pass current player index on A0

LUI A0 hi(CursedMessage)
JAL CallMessage
ADDIU A0 A0 lo(CursedMessage) ; Display CursedMessage

LBU A0 3(S0) ; Load character value from offset of player struct
JAL PlaySound
ADDIU A0 A0 0x2BE ; Add character value to Mario's happy voice
; Character voices are their "character value" distance away from
; Mario's, e.g. Luigi's character value = 1, so Luigi's happy voice
; is 1 away from Mario's.
; 0x2BE = Happy Voice, 0x287 = Sad Voice

LI A0 -1 ; Set current player
LI A1 5 ; Set joy animation
JAL SetBoardPlayerAnimation
LI A2 0 ; Do not loop animation

JAL SleepProcess
LI A0 40 ; Wait 40 frames for animation

J exit
NOP

;===No Items Message===
NoItems:
JAL PlaySound
LI A0 0x25E ; Boo cry

LUI A0 hi(NoItemsMessage)
JAL CallMessage
ADDIU A0 A0 lo(NoItemsMessage) ; Display NoItemsMessage

J exit
NOP

;===Boo Brother Cursed by Boo Repellant===
BooRepellantCursed:
SB R0 0(T0) ; Reset Boo Repellant Flag

JAL PlaySound
LI A0 0x25E ; Boo cry

LUI A0 hi(RepellantResetMessage)
JAL CallMessage
ADDIU A0 A0 lo(RepellantResetMessage) ; Display RepellantResetMessage

exit:
LW RA 116(SP)
LW S0 112(SP)
LW S1 108(SP)
LW S2 104(SP)
LW S3 100(SP)
JR RA
ADDIU SP SP 120

;===Hitlist===
.align 16
Hitlist:
.fill 4,4 ; Fill 4 bytes of 4

;===Mini Func to Call Message===
.align 4
CallMessage:
ADDIU SP SP -40
SW RA 36(SP)

; A0 = Message Address

MOVE A1 A0 ; Copy A0 to A1
SW R0 16(SP) ; A4
SW R0 20(SP) ; A5
SW R0 24(SP) ; A6
LI A0 0x7 ; Character image (-1 for none, 0x7 for Boo)
; Visit the following link to get the full list of Character Images
; https://github.com/PartyPlanner64/PartyPlanner64/wiki/Displaying-Messages
; If you use a character image, check the bottom of the code
LI A2 0
JAL ShowMessage
LI A3 0

; Obligatory message box closing/cleanup calls.
JAL 0x800EC9DC
NOP
JAL CloseMessage
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6EC
NOP

LW RA 36(SP)
JR RA
ADDIU SP SP 40

;===Mini Func to Prepare Item Strings===
.align 4
PrepareItemStrings:
ADDIU SP SP -40
SW RA 36(SP)

; A0 = Message Address
; A1 = Current Player Struct

LUI A3 hi(BlueColor_ptr)
ADDIU A3 A3 lo(BlueColor_ptr) ; Default to blue font (item #2)
MOVE T5 A3 ; Copy A2 to T4 (item #3 font colour)

LUI T0 hi(ItemStrings)
ADDIU T0 T0 lo(ItemStrings)
LBU T1 0x18(A1) ; Load item #1 from offset of player struct
LBU T2 0x19(A1) ; Load item #2 from offset of player struct
LBU T3 0x1A(A1) ; Load item #3 from offset of player struct
LI T7 0xFF ; No item index

SLL A2 T1 5 ; Multiply by 32 (distance between item strings)
ADDU A2 T0 A2 ; A2 now contains item string #1 pointer

BEQ T2 T7 GetNullStringTwice ; If slot #2 empty, get null string twice
NOP

SLL T4 T2 5 ; Multiply by 32 (distance between item strings)
ADDU T4 T0 T4 ; T4 now contains item string #2 pointer

BEQ T3 T7 GetNullString ; If slot #3 empty, get null string
NOP

SLL T6 T3 5 ; Multiply by 32 (distance between item srings)
J FinalString
ADDU T6 T0 T6 ; T6 now contains item string #3 pointer

GetNullStringTwice:
LUI T4 hi(NullString)
ADDIU T4 T4 lo(NullString) ; Item #2 = null string
LUI A3 hi(BlackColor_ptr)
ADDIU A3 A3 lo(BlackColor_ptr) ; Use black font

GetNullString:
LUI T6 hi(NullString)
ADDIU T6 T6 lo(NullString) ; Item #3 = null string
LUI T5 hi(BlackColor_ptr)
ADDIU T5 T5 lo(BlackColor_ptr) ; Use black font

FinalString:
MOVE A1 A0 ; String formatter (%s) from message address
LUI A0 hi(ItemPromptHolder)
ADDIU A0 A0 lo(ItemPromptHolder) ; Parse destination
; A2 has item string #1
; A3 has item #2 font colour
SW T4 16(SP) ; Pass T4 to A4 of sprintf (item string #2)
SW T5 20(SP) ; Pass T5 to A5 of sprintf (item #3 font colour)
SW T6 24(SP) ; Pass T6 to A6 of sprintf (item string #3)
JAL sprintf ; Converts to text string
SW R0 28(SP) ; Terminator byte

LW RA 36(SP)
JR RA
ADDIU SP SP 40

.align 16
BlueColor_ptr:
.byte 0x06,0

.align 16
BlackColor_ptr:
.byte 0x01,0

;===Mini Func to Disable Prompt Options===
.align 4
DisablePrompt:
ADDIU SP SP -40
SW RA 36(SP)
SW S0 32(SP)
SW S1 28(SP)

; A0 / S0 = Window ID
; A1 / S1 = Empty Item Slot (0,1,2,-1)

BLTZ A1 DisablePromptExit ; If no empty slots, no need to disable
NOP
MOVE S0 A0 ; Copy A0 to S0
MOVE S1 A1 ; Copy A1 to S1

BNEZ S1 SkipZero
NOP
; Pass window ID on A0, 0th option on A1
JAL DisablePromptOption
NOP
ADDIU S1 S1 1

SkipZero:
LI T1 2
BEQ S1 T1 SkipOne
NOP

MOVE A0 S0 ; Copy S0 to A0
JAL DisablePromptOption
MOVE A1 S1 ; Disable 1st option
ADDIU S1 S1 1

SkipOne:
MOVE A0 S0 ; Copy S0 to A0
JAL DisablePromptOption
MOVE A1 S1 ; Disable 2nd option

DisablePromptExit:
LW RA 36(SP)
LW S0 32(SP)
LW S1 28(SP)
JR RA
ADDIU SP SP 40

;===Mini Func to Determine AI Logic===
.align 4
AILogic:
ADDIU SP SP -40
SW RA 36(SP)

; A0 = Empty Item Slot

BLTZ A0 PickThree ; If A0 = -1, go to PickThree
NOP
ADDIU V0 A0 -1 ; Subtract 1 from A0 (1,2) -> (0,1)
BEQZ V0 AILogicExit ; If 0, only have 1 item
NOP
JAL RNGPercentChance
LI A0 50 ; 50% chance to pick 1 of 2 items

J AILogicExit
NOP

PickThree:
JAL GetRand
ORI A0 R0 0x02 ; Get random byte from 0-2 at V0

AILogicExit:
LW RA 36(SP)
JR RA
ADDIU SP SP 40

;===Mini Func to Get Random Byte===
.align 4
GetRand: ; returns on V0

; A0 = max byte

ADDIU sp, sp, -0x18
SW ra, 0x0010 (sp)
BLTZL a0, label1_func0
SUBU a0, r0, a0
label1_func0:
BEQZ a0, End1
DADDU v0, r0, r0
ADDIU v0, r0, 0x0001
BNEL a0, v0, label2_func0
ADDIU v0, r0, 0x0064
JAL Function1
ADDIU a0, r0, 0x03E8
SLTI v0, v0, 0x01F5
J End1
XORI v0, v0, 0x0001
label2_func0:
BEQ a0, v0, label3_func0
NOP
JAL Function1
NOP
J End1
NOP
label3_func0:
JAL Function1
ADDIU a0, r0, 0x03F1
LUI v1, 0x6666
ORI v1, v1, 0x6667
MULT v0, v1
SRA v0, v0, 31
MFHI a1
SRA v1, a1, 2
SUBU v0, v1, v0
End1:
LW ra, 0x0010 (sp)
JR RA
ADDIU sp, sp, 0x18
//
Function1:
ADDIU sp, sp, -0x20
SW s0, 0x0010 (sp)
ADDIU s0, r0, 0xFFFF
SW s1, 0x0014 (sp)
ADDIU s1, a0, 0x0001
BNEZ s1, label1_func1
DIVU s0, s1
BREAK 0x01C00
label1_func1:
MFLO s0
BNEZ s0, label2_func1
SW ra, 0x0018 (sp)
ADDIU s0, r0, 0x0001
label2_func1:
JAL Function2
NOP
BNEZ s0, label3_func1
DIVU v0, s0
BREAK 0x01C00
label3_func1:
MFLO v1
SLTU v0, v1, s1
BEQZ v0, label2_func1
DADDU v0, v1, r0
LW ra, 0x0018 (sp)
LW s1, 0x0014 (sp)
LW s0, 0x0010 (sp)
JR RA
ADDIU sp, sp, 0x20
//
Function2:
LUI v0, 0x8009
LW v0, 0x7650 (v0)
LUI v1, 0x41C6
ORI v1, v1, 0x4E6D
MULT v0, v1
MFLO v0
ADDIU v0, v0, 0x3039
LUI v1, 0x8009
JR RA
SW v0, 0x7650 (v1)

;===Mini Func to Display Curse Message===
.align 4
DisplayCurseMessage:
ADDIU SP SP -40
SW RA 36(SP)

; A0 = Item Index

LUI T0 hi(ItemStrings)
ADDIU T0 T0 lo(ItemStrings)
SLL T1 A0 5 ; Multiply item index by 32 (distance between item strings)
ADDU A2 T0 T1 ; Add to get item string to convert

LUI A0 hi(CurseMessageHolder)
ADDIU A0 A0 lo(CurseMessageHolder) ; Parse destination
LUI A1 hi(CurseMessage)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(CurseMessage) ; String formatter (%s)
; Pass item string to convert on A2
JAL sprintf ; Prints converted string
LI A3 0 ; Terminator byte

LUI A0 hi(CurseMessageHolder)
JAL CallMessage
ADDIU A0 A0 lo(CurseMessageHolder) ; Display CurseMessage with strings

LI A0 4 ; Happening fade-out
JAL InitFadeOut ; Fade to black
LI A1 16 ; Assigns 16 frames of fade-out

JAL SleepProcess
LI A0 17 ; Wait 17 frames for fade-out

JAL PlaySound
LI A0 0x0D ; Cursed Mushroom block sound

JAL SleepProcess
LI A0 20 ; Wait 20 frames for sound

LUI A0 hi(Hitlist)
JAL PlaySadVoices
ADDIU A0 A0 lo(Hitlist) ; Pass Hitlist address on A0

LW RA 36(SP)
JR RA
ADDIU SP SP 40

;===Mini Func to Play Sad Voices===
.align 4
PlaySadVoices:
ADDIU SP SP -40
SW RA 36(SP)
SW S0 32(SP)

; A0 / S0 = Hitlist Address

MOVE S0 A0 ; Copy A0 to S0

SadVoiceLoop:
JAL GetPlayerStruct
LBU A0 0(S0) ; Get opponent's player struct at V0

LBU T0 3(V0) ; Load character value from offset of player struct
JAL PlaySound
ADDIU A0 T0 0x287 ; Add character value to Mario's happy voice
; Character voices are their "character value" distance away from
; Mario's, e.g. Luigi's character value = 1, so Luigi's happy voice
; is 1 away from Mario's.
; 0x2BE = Happy Voice, 0x287 = Sad Voice

JAL SleepProcess
LI A0 15 ; Wait 15 frames for sound

LBU T1 1(S0) ; Load next opponent index
LI T0 4
BEQ T1 T0 ExitSadVoices ; If all opponents checked, exit
NOP
J SadVoiceLoop
ADDIU S0 S0 1 ; Add 1 to get next opponent

ExitSadVoices:
LW RA 36(SP)
LW S0 32(SP)
JR RA
ADDIU SP SP 40

;===Mini Func to Cast Mushroom Curse===
.align 4
MushroomCurse:
ADDIU SP SP -40
SW RA 36(SP)

; A0 = Hitlist Address

MushroomCurseLoop:
LUI T0 0x800C ; 0x800C0000
ORI T0 T0 0xD09C ; 0x800CD09C - Mushroom Curse P1 Flag
LBU T1 0(A0) ; Load opponent index
ADDU T0 T0 T1 ; Add to get opponent's Mushroom Curse Flag
LI T1 1 ; Turn Mushroom Curse Flag ON
SB T1 0(T0) ; Store ON flag into address

LBU T1 1(A0) ; Load next opponent index
LI T0 4
BEQ T1 T0 ExitMushroomCurse ; If all opponents cursed, exit
NOP
J MushroomCurseLoop
ADDIU A0 A0 1 ; Add 1 to get next opponent

ExitMushroomCurse:
JAL CurseFadeIn
NOP

LW RA 36(SP)
JR RA
ADDIU SP SP 40

;===Mini Func for Fade-in===
.align 4
CurseFadeIn:
ADDIU SP SP -40
SW RA 36(SP)

LI A0 4 ; Happening fade-in
JAL InitFadeIn ; Fade from black
LI A1 16 ; Assigns 16 frames of fade-in

JAL SleepProcess
LI A0 17 ; Wait 17 frames for fade-in

LW RA 36(SP)
JR RA
ADDIU SP SP 40

;===Mini Func to Cast Normal Curse===
.align 4
NormalCurse:
ADDIU SP SP -40
SW RA 36(SP)
SW S0 32(SP)
SW S1 28(SP)

; A0 / S0 = Hitlist Address
; A1 / S1 = Item Index (0x02, 0x03, 0x0A) / Status Flag

MOVE S0 A0 ; Copy A0 to S0
MOVE S1 A1 ; Copy A1 to S1

LI T0 0x02
BEQ T0 S1 NormalCurseLoop ; If Poison Mushroom, use 0x02
NOP
LI T0 0x03
BEQ T0 S1 GetReverseCurse ; If Reverse Mushroom, get reverse curse
NOP
; else, have Golden Mushroom
J NormalCurseLoop
LI S1 0x86 ; Poison + Reverse flag

GetReverseCurse:
LI S1 0x84 ; Reverse flag

NormalCurseLoop:
JAL GetPlayerStruct
LBU A0 0(S0) ; Get opponent's player struct at V0
LBU T0 0x17(V0) ; Load status flags from offset of player struct
OR T0 T0 S1 ; Keep all existing flags ON and add curse flags
SB T0 0x17(V0) ; Store status flags into offset of player struct

ANDI T0 S1 0x02 ; Poison flag
LI T1 0x02
BNE T0 T1 NormalCurseNext ; If not poison curse, continue
NOP
LUI T0 0x800C ; 0x800C0000
ORI T0 T0 0xD0AF ; 0x800CD0AF - Slow Dice Flags
LBU T1 0(T0) ; Load slow dice flags value into T1
LBU T2 0(S0) ; Load opponent index
LI T3 1 ; ON flag
SLLV T2 T3 T2 ; Turn ON bit corresponding to opponent index
OR T1 T1 T2 ; Keep all flags ON
SB T1 0(T0) ; Store value back into address

NormalCurseNext:
LBU T1 1(S0) ; Load next opponent index
LI T0 4
BEQ T1 T0 ExitNormalCurse ; If all opponents cursed, exit
NOP
J NormalCurseLoop
ADDIU S0 S0 1 ; Add 1 to get next opponent

ExitNormalCurse:
JAL CurseFadeIn
NOP

LW RA 36(SP)
LW S0 32(SP)
LW S1 28(SP)
JR RA
ADDIU SP SP 40

;===Mini Func to Cast Item Curse===
.align 4
ItemCurse:
ADDIU SP SP -40
SW RA 36(SP)
SW S0 32(SP)
SW S1 28(SP)

; A0 / S0 = Hitlist Address
; A1 = Item Index (0x04, 0x06, 0x10)
; S1 = Number of Items to Lose

MOVE S0 A0 ; Copy A0 to S0
LI S1 0

LI T0 0x04 ; Cellular Shopper index
BEQ A1 T0 ItemCurse2
NOP
LI T0 0x06 ; Plunder Chest index
BEQ A1 T0 ItemCurse1
NOP
; else, have Barter Box

ADDIU S1 S1 1 ; Add 1 item to lose

ItemCurse2:
ADDIU S1 S1 1 ; Add 1 item to lose

ItemCurse1:
ADDIU S1 S1 1 ; Add 1 item to lose

ItemCurseLoop:
JAL GetPlayerStruct
LBU A0 0(S0) ; Get opponent's player struct at V0

LI T0 0xFF ; No item index
MOVE T1 S1 ; Copy S1 to T1
ItemCurseRemovalLoop:
SB T0 0x18(V0) ; Remove item from offset of player struct
ADDIU T1 T1 -1 ; Remove 1 item to lose
BEQZ T1 ItemCurseNext ; When done removing items, get next opponent
NOP
J ItemCurseRemovalLoop
ADDIU V0 V0 1 ; Add 1 to get next item slot

ItemCurseNext:
JAL FixUpPlayerItemSlots
LBU A0 0(S0)
JAL FixUpPlayerItemSlots
LBU A0 0(S0)
JAL RefreshHUD
LBU A0 0(S0)

LBU T1 1(S0) ; Load next opponent index
LI T0 4
BEQ T1 T0 ExitItemCurse ; If all opponents cursed, exit
NOP
J ItemCurseLoop
ADDIU S0 S0 1 ; Add 1 to get next opponent

ExitItemCurse:
JAL CurseFadeIn
NOP

LW RA 36(SP)
LW S0 32(SP)
LW S1 28(SP)
JR RA
ADDIU SP SP 40

;===Mini Func to Cast Warp Curse===
.align 4
WarpCurse:
ADDIU SP SP -40
SW RA 36(SP)
SW S0 32(SP)
SW S1 28(SP)
SW S2 24(SP)

; A0 / S0 = Hitlist Address
; S1 = Warp Hold
; S2 = Rewrite Flag (0 for forwards, 1 for backwards)

MOVE S0 A0 ; Copy A0 to S0
LUI S1 hi(WarpHold1)
ADDIU S1 S1 lo(WarpHold1)

WarpCurseLoop:
JAL GetPlayerStruct
LBU A0 0(S0) ; Get opponent's player struct at V0
LBU T1 0xF(V0) ; Load chain index from offset of player struct
LBU T2 0x10(V0) ; Load space index from offset of player struct
LBU T3 0x11(V0) ; Load next chain from offset of player struct
LBU T4 0x12(V0) ; Load next space from offset of player struct
LBU T5 0x13(V0) ; Load chain data from offset of player struct
LBU T6 0x14(V0) ; Load space data from offset of player struct
LBU T7 0x15(V0) ; Load prev chain from offset of player struct
LBU T8 0x16(V0) ; Load prev space from offset of player struct
SB T1 0(S1) ; Store chain index into Warp Hold
SB T2 1(S1) ; Store space index into Warp Hold
SB T3 2(S1) ; Store next chain into Warp Hold
SB T4 3(S1) ; Store next space into Warp Hold
SB T5 4(S1) ; Store chain data into Warp Hold
SB T6 5(S1) ; Store space data into Warp Hold
SB T7 6(S1) ; Store prev chain into Warp Hold
SB T8 7(S1) ; Store prev space into Warp Hold

ADDIU S1 S1 16 ; Add distance between Warp Holds

WarpCurseNext:
LBU T1 1(S0) ; Load next opponent index
LI T0 4
BEQ T1 T0 WarpCurseLoopExit ; If all opponents checked, exit loop
NOP
J WarpCurseLoop
ADDIU S0 S0 1 ; Add 1 to get next opponent

WarpCurseLoopExit:
LUI S0 hi(Hitlist)
ADDIU S0 S0 lo(Hitlist) ; Refresh S0 to 0th byte

JAL RNGPercentChance
LI A0 50 ; 50% chance of V0 = 1
MOVE S2 V0 ; Copy V0 to S2

JAL GetRand
ORI A0 R0 0x2 ; Get random byte (0-2) at V0

BEQZ V0 StartWarp1 ; Assign WarpHold1 first
NOP
LI T0 1
BEQ V0 T0 StartWarp2 ; Assign WarpHold2 first
NOP
; else, assign WarpHold3 first

StartWarp3:
LUI S1 hi(WarpHold3)
ADDIU S1 S1 lo(WarpHold3)
JAL GetPlayerStruct
LBU A0 0(S0) ; Get opponent's player struct at V0
LBU T1 0(S1) ; Load chain index from WarpHold3
LBU T2 1(S1) ; Load space index from WarpHold3
LBU T3 2(S1) ; Load next chain from WarpHold3
LBU T4 3(S1) ; Load next space from WarpHold3
LBU T5 4(S1) ; Load chain data from WarpHold3
LBU T6 5(S1) ; Load space data from WarpHold3
LBU T7 6(S1) ; Load prev chain from WarpHold3
LBU T8 7(S1) ; Load prev space from WarpHold3

SB T1 0xF(V0) ; Store chain index into offset of player struct
SB T2 0x10(V0) ; Store space index into offset of player struct
SB T3 0x11(V0) ; Store next chain into offset of player struct
SB T4 0x12(V0) ; Store next space into offset of player struct
SB T5 0x13(V0) ; Store chain data into offset of player struct
SB T6 0x14(V0) ; Store space data into offset of player struct
SB T7 0x15(V0) ; Store prev chain into offset of player struct
SB T8 0x16(V0) ; Store prev space into offset of player struct

LBU T1 1(S0) ; Load next opponent index
LI T0 4
BEQ T1 T0 ExitWarpCurse ; If all opponents cursed, exit
ADDIU S0 S0 1 ; Add 1 to get next opponent

PickWarp3:
BNEZ S2 StartWarp2
NOP
; else, go to StartWarp1

StartWarp1:
LUI S1 hi(WarpHold1)
ADDIU S1 S1 lo(WarpHold1)
JAL GetPlayerStruct
LBU A0 0(S0) ; Get opponent's player struct at V0
LBU T1 0(S1) ; Load chain index from WarpHold1
LBU T2 1(S1) ; Load space index from WarpHold1
LBU T3 2(S1) ; Load next chain from WarpHold1
LBU T4 3(S1) ; Load next space from WarpHold1
LBU T5 4(S1) ; Load chain data from WarpHold1
LBU T6 5(S1) ; Load space data from WarpHold1
LBU T7 6(S1) ; Load prev chain from WarpHold1
LBU T8 7(S1) ; Load prev space from WarpHold1

SB T1 0xF(V0) ; Store chain index into offset of player struct
SB T2 0x10(V0) ; Store space index into offset of player struct
SB T3 0x11(V0) ; Store next chain into offset of player struct
SB T4 0x12(V0) ; Store next space into offset of player struct
SB T5 0x13(V0) ; Store chain data into offset of player struct
SB T6 0x14(V0) ; Store space data into offset of player struct
SB T7 0x15(V0) ; Store prev chain into offset of player struct
SB T8 0x16(V0) ; Store prev space into offset of player struct

LBU T1 1(S0) ; Load next opponent index
LI T0 4
BEQ T1 T0 ExitWarpCurse ; If all opponents cursed, exit
ADDIU S0 S0 1 ; Add 1 to get next opponent

PickWarp1:
BNEZ S2 StartWarp3
NOP
; else, go to StartWarp2

StartWarp2:
LUI S1 hi(WarpHold2)
ADDIU S1 S1 lo(WarpHold2)
JAL GetPlayerStruct
LBU A0 0(S0) ; Get opponent's player struct at V0
LBU T1 0(S1) ; Load chain index from WarpHold2
LBU T2 1(S1) ; Load space index from WarpHold2
LBU T3 2(S1) ; Load next chain from WarpHold2
LBU T4 3(S1) ; Load next space from WarpHold2
LBU T5 4(S1) ; Load chain data from WarpHold2
LBU T6 5(S1) ; Load space data from WarpHold2
LBU T7 6(S1) ; Load prev chain from WarpHold2
LBU T8 7(S1) ; Load prev space from WarpHold2

SB T1 0xF(V0) ; Store chain index into offset of player struct
SB T2 0x10(V0) ; Store space index into offset of player struct
SB T3 0x11(V0) ; Store next chain into offset of player struct
SB T4 0x12(V0) ; Store next space into offset of player struct
SB T5 0x13(V0) ; Store chain data into offset of player struct
SB T6 0x14(V0) ; Store space data into offset of player struct
SB T7 0x15(V0) ; Store prev chain into offset of player struct
SB T8 0x16(V0) ; Store prev space into offset of player struct

LBU T1 1(S0) ; Load next opponent index
LI T0 4
BEQ T1 T0 ExitWarpCurse ; If all opponents cursed, exit
ADDIU S0 S0 1 ; Add 1 to get next opponent

PickWarp2:
BNEZ S2 StartWarp1
NOP
J StartWarp3
NOP

ExitWarpCurse:
JAL CurseFadeIn
NOP

LW RA 36(SP)
LW S0 32(SP)
LW S1 28(SP)
LW S2 24(SP)
JR RA
ADDIU SP SP 40

.align 16
WarpHold1:
.fill 8

.align 16
WarpHold2:
.fill 8

.align 16
WarpHold3:
.fill 8

;===Mini Func to Cast Duel Curse===
.align 4
DuelCurse:
ADDIU SP SP -40
SW RA 36(SP)
SW S0 32(SP)
SW S1 28(SP)

; A0 / S0 = Hitlist Address
; S1 = Duel Hold

MOVE S0 A0 ; Copy A0 to S0
LUI S1 hi(DuelHold)
ADDIU S1 S1 lo(DuelHold)

ADDU V0 S0 V0 ; Get random opponent from hitlist

LBU T5 0x13(V0) ; Load chain data from offset of player struct
LBU T6 0x14(V0) ; Load space data from offset of player struct
LBU T7 0x15(V0) ; Load prev chain from offset of player struct
LBU T8 0x16(V0) ; Load prev space from offset of player struct
SB T1 0(S1) ; Store chain index into DuelHold
SB T2 1(S1) ; Store space index into DuelHold
SB T3 2(S1) ; Store next chain into DuelHold
SB T4 3(S1) ; Store next space into DuelHold
SB T5 4(S1) ; Store chain data into DuelHold
SB T6 5(S1) ; Store space data into DuelHold
SB T7 6(S1) ; Store prev chain into DuelHold
SB T8 7(S1) ; Store prev space into DuelHold

DuelCurseLoop:
JAL GetPlayerStruct
LBU A0 0(S0) ; Get opponent's player struct at V0
LBU T1 0(S1) ; Load chain index from DuelHold
LBU T2 1(S1) ; Load space index from DuelHold
LBU T3 2(S1) ; Load next chain from DuelHold
LBU T4 3(S1) ; Load next space from DuelHold
LBU T5 4(S1) ; Load chain data from DuelHold
LBU T6 5(S1) ; Load space data from DuelHold
LBU T7 6(S1) ; Load prev chain from DuelHold
LBU T8 7(S1) ; Load prev space from DuelHold

SB T2 0x10(V0) ; Store space index into offset of player struct
SB T3 0x11(V0) ; Store next chain into offset of player struct
SB T4 0x12(V0) ; Store next space into offset of player struct
SB T5 0x13(V0) ; Store chain data into offset of player struct
SB T6 0x14(V0) ; Store space data into offset of player struct
SB T7 0x15(V0) ; Store prev chain into offset of player struct
SB T8 0x16(V0) ; Store prev space into offset of player struct

LBU T1 1(S0) ; Load next opponent index
LI T0 4
BEQ T1 T0 ExitDuelCurse ; If all opponents cursed, exit
NOP

;===Mini Func to Cast Bell Curse===
.align 4
BellCurse:

SW RA 36(SP)

; A0 = Hitlist Address

BellCurseLoop:
LUI T0 0x800C ; 0x800C0000
ORI T0 T0 0xD096 ; 0x800CD096 - Bell Curse P1 Flag
LBU T1 0(A0) ; Load opponent index
ADDU T0 T0 T1 ; Add to get opponent's Bell Curse Flag
LI T1 1 ; Turn Bell Curse Flag ON
SB T1 0(T0) ; Store ON flag into address

LBU T1 1(A0) ; Load next opponent index
LI T0 4
BEQ T1 T0 ExitBellCurse ; If all opponents cursed, exit
NOP
J BellCurseLoop
ADDIU A0 A0 1 ; Add 1 to get next opponent

;===Mini Func to Cast Star Curse===
.align 4
StarCurse:
ADDIU SP SP -40
SW RA 36(SP)
SW S0 32(SP)

; A0 / S0 = Hitlist Address

MOVE S0 A0 ; Copy A0 to S0

StarCurseLoop:
JAL GetPlayerStruct
LBU A0 0(S0) ; Get opponent's player struct at V0
LBU T0 0xE(V0) ; Load opponent's stars from offset of player struct
BEQZ T0 SkipStarCurse ; If opponent has no stars, skip them
NOP
ADDIU T0 T0 -1 ; Subtract 1 star
SB T0 0xE(V0) ; Store new star count into offset of player struct

SkipStarCurse:

LI T0 4
BEQ T1 T0 ExitStarCurse ; If all opponents cursed, exit
NOP
J StarCurseLoop
ADDIU S0 S0 1 ; Add 1 to get next opponent

NOP

ADDIU SP SP 40

;===Mini Func to Cast Bank Curse===
.align 4
BankCurse:
ADDIU SP SP -40
SW RA 36(SP)
SW S0 32(SP)
SW S1 28(SP)
SW S2 24(SP)

; A0 / S0 = Hitlist Address
; S1 = Bank Coin Total
; S2 = Coins to Lose

MOVE S0 A0 ; Copy A0 to S0
LUI S1 hi(bank_coin_total)
ADDIU S1 S1 lo(bank_coin_total) ; Load Bank Coin Total

JAL CurseFadeIn ; Fade-in before coin change
NOP

BankCurseLoop:
JAL GetPlayerStruct
LBU A0 0(S0) ; Get opponent's player struct at V0

LBU A0 0(S0) ; Take coins from opponent
LHU A1 0xA(V0) ; Load opponent's coins into A1
SRL A1 A1 1 ; Shift 1 bit to right - divide coins by 2 (round down)
JAL CoinChange
MOVE S2 A1 ; Copy A1 to S2

LHU T0 0(S1) ; Load bank coins
ADDU T0 S2 T0 ; Add opponent's lost coins
SH T0 0(S1) ; Store bank coins

LBU T1 1(S0) ; Load next opponent index
LI T0 4
BEQ T1 T0 ExitBankCurse ; If all opponents cursed, exit
NOP
J BankCurseLoop
ADDIU S0 S0 1 ; Add 1 to get next opponent

ExitBankCurse:
JAL SleepProcess
LI A0 30 ; Wait 30 frames for coin change

LW RA 36(SP)
LW S0 32(SP)
LW S1 28(SP)
LW S2 24(SP)
JR RA
ADDIU SP SP 40

;===Mini Func to Show Coin Change===
.align 4
CoinChange:
ADDIU SP SP -40
SW RA 36(SP)
SW S0 32(SP)
SW S1 28(SP)

; A0 / S0 = Opponent Index
; A1 / S1 / V0 = Coins to Lose

MOVE S0 A0 ; Copy A0 to S0
MOVE S1 A1 ; Copy A1 to S1

; Pass opponent index to A0
JAL AdjustPlayerCoinsGradual
SUBU A1 R0 S1 ; Subtract coins

MOVE A0 S0 ; Take coins from opponent
JAL 0x800E1F28 ; ShowPlayerCoinChangeHUD
SUBU A1 R0 S1 ; Subtract coins

MOVE V0 S1 ; Return negative coins on V0

LW RA 36(SP)
LW S0 32(SP)
LW S1 28(SP)
JR RA
ADDIU SP SP 40

;===Mini Func to Cast Coin Curse===
.align 16
CoinCurse:
ADDIU SP SP -48
SW RA 44(SP)
SW S0 40(SP)
SW S1 36(SP)
SW S2 32(SP)

; A0 / S0 = Hitlist Address
; A1 / S1 = Item Index
; S2 = Coins to Lose

MOVE S0 A0 ; Copy A0 to S0
MOVE S1 A1 ; Copy A1 to S1
LI S2 0 ; Start coins at 0

JAL CurseFadeIn ; Fade-in before coin change
NOP

LI T1 0x01 ; Skeleton Key index
BEQ S1 T1 FiveCoinCurse
NOP
LI T1 0x09 ; Lucky Lamp index
BEQ S1 T1 TenCoinCurse
NOP
LI T1 0x0D ; Bowser Suit index
BEQ S1 T1 FifteenCoinCurse
NOP
LI T1 0x07 ; Bowser Phone index
BEQ S1 T1 TwentyCoinCurse
NOP
LI T1 0x12 ; Wacky Watch index
BEQ S1 T1 FiftyCoinCurse
NOP
; else, cast Lucky Charm curse

LuckyCoinCurseLoop:
JAL GetPlayerStruct
LBU A0 0(S0) ; Get opponent's player struct at V0

LBU A0 0(S0) ; Take coins from opponent
JAL CoinChange
LHU A1 0xA(V0) ; Subtract all opponent's coins

LBU T1 1(S0) ; Load next opponent index
BEQ T1 T0 ExitCoinCurse ; If all opponents cursed, exit
NOP
J LuckyCoinCurseLoop
ADDIU S0 S0 1 ; Add 1 to get next opponent

FiftyCoinCurse:
ADDIU S2 S2 30 ; Lose 30+5+5+5+5 = 50 coins

TwentyCoinCurse:
ADDIU S2 S2 5 ; Lose 5+5+5+5 = 20 coins

FifteenCoinCurse:
ADDIU S2 S2 5 ; Lose 5+5+5 = 15 coins

TenCoinCurse:
ADDIU S2 S2 5 ; Lose 5+5 = 10 coins

FiveCoinCurse:
ADDIU S2 S2 5 ; Lose 5 coins

CoinCurseLoop:
LBU A0 0(S0) ; Take coins from opponent
JAL CoinChange
MOVE A1 S2 ; Subtract coins

LBU T1 1(S0) ; Load next opponent index
LI T0 4
BEQ T1 T0 ExitCoinCurse ; If all opponents cursed, exit
NOP
J CoinCurseLoop
ADDIU S0 S0 1 ; Add 1 to get next opponent

ExitCoinCurse:
JAL SleepProcess
LI A0 30 ; Wait 30 frames for coin change

LW RA 44(SP)
LW S0 40(SP)
LW S1 36(SP)
LW S2 32(SP)
JR RA
ADDIU SP SP 48

Concession v3.1.code:
; NAME: Concession v3.1
; GAMES: MP3_USA
; EXECUTION: Direct
; PARAM: Space|Concession

ADDIU SP SP -64
SW RA 60(SP)
SW S0 56(SP)
SW S1 52(SP)
SW S2 48(SP)
SW S3 44(SP)
SW S4 40(SP)

; S0 = Current Player Struct
; S1 = Prompt Choice
; S2 = Mushroom Chances Table / Mushroom Index
; S3 = Empty Item Slot (Offset)
; S4 = Prompt Address

;===Hide Dice Roll===
JAL GetPlayerStruct
LI A0 -1 ; Get current player struct at V0
MOVE S0 V0 ; Copy V0 to S0

JAL 0x800DBEC0 ; HideDiceRoll
LBU A0 0x1D(S0) ; Pass current player index on A0

;===Set Player Idle Animation===
LI A0 -1 ; Set current player
LI A1 -1 ; Set idle animation
JAL SetBoardPlayerAnimation
LI A2 2 ; Loop the animation

;===Rotate Toward Concession===
LI A0 -1 ; Set current player
LI A1 8 ; Rotate in 8 frames
JAL RotatePlayerModel
LI A2 Concession ; Face Concession

;===Check Turns===
LUI T0 hi(total_turns)
ADDIU T0 T0 lo(total_turns)
LBU T0 0(T0) ; Load total turns into T0

LUI T1 hi(current_turn)
ADDIU T1 T1 lo(current_turn)
LBU T1 0(T1) ; Load current turn into T1

BEQ T0 T1 LastTurn ; If it's the last turn, go to LastTurn
NOP

;===Check Player Coins===
LBU A0 0x1D(S0) ; Pass current player index on A0
JAL PlayerHasCoins ; Returns 1 if player has enough coins
LI A1 5 ; Check for 5 coins

BEQZ V0 NoCoins ; If V0 = 0, go to NoCoins
NOP

;===Check for Empty Item Slots===
JAL PlayerHasEmptyItemSlot
LBU A0 0x1D(S0) ; Pass current player index on A0

BLTZ V0 TooManyItems ; If V0 < 0 (no empty slots), go to TooManyItems
NOP
; else, player has empty item slot
MOVE S3 V0 ; Copy V0 to S3

;===Randomize Mushroom===
JAL GetPlayerPlacement
LBU A0 0x1D(S0) ; Get current player placement (0-3) at V0

LUI S2 hi(MushroomChancesTable)
ADDIU S2 S2 lo(MushroomChancesTable)
LI T2 16 ; Distance between chances tables
MULT V0 T2 ; Multiply V0 by T2
MFLO T0 ; Move result into T0
ADDU S2 S2 T0 ; Add the distance between chances tables

JAL GetRandomByte ; Get random byte (0-255) at V0
NOP

LBU T0 0(S2) ; Load Mushroom chance value into T0
SLT T1 V0 T0 ; If V0 < T0, T1 = 1
BNEZ T1 PickMushroom ; If T1 = 1, pick Mushroom
NOP
LBU T0 1(S2) ; Load Poison Mushroom chance value into T0
SLT T1 V0 T0 ; If V0 < T0, T1 = 1
BNEZ T1 PickPoisonMushroom ; If T1 = 1, pick Poison Mushroom
NOP
LBU T0 2(S2) ; Load Reverse Mushroom chance value into T0
SLT T1 V0 T0 ; If V0 < T0, T1 = 1
BNEZ T1 PickReverseMushroom ; If T1 = 1, pick Reverse Mushroom
NOP
; else, pick Golden Mushroom

;===Pick Golden Mushroom===
LI S2 0x0A ; Golden Mushroom index
LUI S4 hi(GoldenMushroomPrompt)
J MainPrompt
ADDIU S4 S4 lo(GoldenMushroomPrompt) ; Display GoldenMushroomPrompt

;===Pick Mushroom===
PickMushroom:
LI S2 0x00 ; Mushroom index
LUI S4 hi(MushroomPrompt)
J MainPrompt
ADDIU S4 S4 lo(MushroomPrompt) ; Display MushroomPrompt

;===Pick Poison Mushroom===
PickPoisonMushroom:
LI S2 0x02 ; Poison Mushroom index
LUI S4 hi(PoisonMushroomPrompt)
J MainPrompt
ADDIU S4 S4 lo(PoisonMushroomPrompt) ; Display PoisonMushroomPrompt

;===Pick Reverse Mushroom===
PickReverseMushroom:
LI S2 0x03 ; Reverse Mushroom index
LUI S4 hi(ReverseMushroomPrompt)
ADDIU S4 S4 lo(ReverseMushroomPrompt) ; Display ReverseMushroomPrompt

;===Main Prompt===
MainPrompt:
JAL PlaySound
LI A0 0x257 ; Boo laugh

StartMainPrompt:
SW R0 16(SP) ; A4
SW R0 20(SP) ; A5
SW R0 24(SP) ; A6
LI A0 0x7 ; Character image (-1 for none, 0x7 for Boo)
; Visit the following link to get the full list of Character Images
; https://github.com/PartyPlanner64/PartyPlanner64/wiki/Displaying-Messages
; If you use a character image, check the bottom of the code
MOVE A1 S4 ; Copy S4 to A1
LI A2 0
JAL ShowMessage
LI A3 0

JAL AILogic
LBU A0 0x1D(S0) ; Pass current player index on A0

; Get the selection, either from the player or CPU.
; If A0 is a pointer to AI data, AI logic is ran to pick for CPUs.
; If A0 is 0 or 1, the 0th or 1st option is chosen by CPUs.
; If A0 is 2, then the value of A1 is the CPUs option index choice.
LI A0 2
JAL GetBasicPromptSelection
MOVE A1 V0 ; A1 now has the AI's decision
MOVE S1 V0 ; S1 now has the chosen option index

; Obligatory message box closing/cleanup calls.
JAL CloseMessage
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6EC
NOP

; Change the player's destination based on the choice.
BEQZ S1 Pay
NOP
LI T0 1
BEQ S1 T0 No
NOP
; else pick "View map"
JAL ViewBoardMap
NOP
J StartMainPrompt
NOP

;===Pay Coins===
Pay:
LBU A0 0x1D(S0) ; Take coins from current player
JAL AdjustPlayerCoinsGradual
LI A1 -5 ; Subtract 5 coins

LBU A0 0x1D(S0) ; Take coins from current player
JAL ShowPlayerCoinChange
LI A1 -5 ; Subtract 5 coins

JAL SleepProcess
LI A0 30 ; Wait 30 frames for coin change

;===Receive Item===
ADDU S3 S0 S3 ; Add empty item slot offset to player struct
SB S2 0x18(S3) ; Store item into offset of player struct

JAL PlaySound
LI A0 0x10C ; Turn Start sound

;===Play Happy Voice and Animation===
LBU A0 3(S0) ; Load character value from offset of player struct
JAL PlaySound
ADDIU A0 A0 0x2BE ; Add character value to Mario's happy voice
; Character voices are their "character value" distance away from
; Mario's, e.g. Luigi's character value = 1, so Luigi's happy voice
; is 1 away from Mario's.
; 0x2BE = Happy Voice, 0x287 = Sad Voice

LI A0 -1 ; Set current player
LI A1 5 ; Set joy animation
JAL SetBoardPlayerAnimation
LI A2 0 ; Do not loop animation

JAL SleepProcess
LI A0 40 ; Wait 40 frames for animation

LUI A0 hi(SoldMessage)
JAL CallMessage
ADDIU A0 A0 lo(SoldMessage) ; Display SoldMessage

J exit
NOP

;===No Message===
No:
JAL PlaySound
LI A0 0x257 ; Boo laugh

LUI A0 hi(NoMessage)
JAL CallMessage
ADDIU A0 A0 lo(NoMessage) ; Display NoMessage

J exit
NOP

;===Too Many Items Message===
TooManyItems:
JAL PlaySound
LI A0 0x25E ; Boo cry

LUI A0 hi(TooManyItemsMessage)
JAL CallMessage
ADDIU A0 A0 lo(TooManyItemsMessage) ; Display TooManyItemsMessage

J exit
NOP

;===No Coins Message===
NoCoins:
JAL PlaySound
LI A0 0x25E ; Boo cry

LUI A0 hi(NoCoinsMessage)
JAL CallMessage
ADDIU A0 A0 lo(NoCoinsMessage) ; Display NoCoinsMessage

J exit
NOP

;===Last Turn Message===
LastTurn:
JAL PlaySound
LI A0 0x257 ; Boo laugh

LUI A0 hi(LastTurnMessage)
JAL CallMessage
ADDIU A0 A0 lo(LastTurnMessage) ; Display LastTurnMessage

exit:
JAL 0x800DB884 ; ShowDiceRoll
LBU A0 0x1D(S0) ; Pass current player index on A0

JAL SleepProcess
LI A0 10 ; Wait 10 frames for dice roll to show

LW RA 60(SP)
LW S0 56(SP)
LW S1 52(SP)
LW S2 48(SP)
LW S3 44(SP)
LW S4 40(SP)
JR RA
ADDIU SP SP 64

;===Mini Func to Determine AI Logic===
.align 4
AILogic:
ADDIU SP SP -40
SW RA 36(SP)
SW S0 32(SP)

; A0 / S0 = Current Player Index

MOVE S0 A0 ; Check CPU
JAL PlayerHasCoins
LI A1 17 ; Check if CPU has 17 coins

BEQZ V0 SelectYes ; If CPU has 5-16 coins, select yes
NOP

MOVE A0 S0 ; Check CPU
JAL PlayerHasCoins
LI A1 25 ; Check if CPU has 25 coins

BNEZ V0 SelectYes ; If CPU has 25 coins, select yes
NOP

SelectNo:
J AILogicExit
LI V0 1

SelectYes:
LI V0 0

AILogicExit:
LW RA 36(SP)
LW S0 32(SP)
JR RA
ADDIU SP SP 40

;===Mini Func to Call Message===
.align 4
CallMessage:
ADDIU SP SP -40
SW RA 36(SP)

; A0 = Message Address

MOVE A1 A0 ; Copy A0 to A1
SW R0 16(SP) ; A4
SW R0 20(SP) ; A5
SW R0 24(SP) ; A6
LI A0 0x7 ; Character image (-1 for none, 0x7 for Boo)
; Visit the following link to get the full list of Character Images
; https://github.com/PartyPlanner64/PartyPlanner64/wiki/Displaying-Messages
; If you use a character image, check the bottom of the code
LI A2 0
JAL ShowMessage
LI A3 0

; Obligatory message box closing/cleanup calls.
JAL 0x800EC9DC
NOP
JAL CloseMessage
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6EC
NOP

LW RA 36(SP)
JR RA
ADDIU SP SP 40

;===Mushroom 1st Chances Table===
.align 16
MushroomChancesTable:
.byte 0x60 ; Mushroom (00-5F) 37.5%
.byte 0xD8 ; Poison Mushroom (60-D7) 46.875%
.byte 0xEC ; Reverse Mushroom (D8-EB) 7.8125%
; Golden Mushroom (EC-FF) 7.8125%

;===Mushroom 2nd Chances Table===
.align 16
.byte 0x60 ; Mushroom (00-5F) 37.5%
.byte 0xC0 ; Poison Mushroom (60-BF) 37.5%
.byte 0xE0 ; Reverse Mushroom (C0-DF) 12.5%
; Golden Mushroom (E0-FF) 12.5%

;===Mushroom 3rd Chances Table===
.align 16
.byte 0x50 ; Mushroom (00-49) 31.25%
.byte 0xA0 ; Poison Mushroom (50-99) 31.25%
.byte 0xD0 ; Reverse Mushroom (A0-CF) 18.75%
; Golden Mushroom (D0-FF) 18.75%

;===Mushroom 4th Chances Table===
.align 16
.byte 0x40 ; Mushroom (00-29) 25%
.byte 0x80 ; Poison Mushroom (30-59) 25%
.byte 0xC0 ; Reverse Mushroom (60-AF) 25%
; Golden Mushroom (B0-FF) 25%

;===Message Text===
.align 16
GoldenMushroomPrompt:

; .byte 0x01 ; Black font
; .byte 0x03 ; Red font

; .byte 0xC3 ; Question mark (?)

; .byte 0x0A ; New line (writes below)
; .byte 0x5C ; Apostrophe (')
; .byte 0x29 ; Coin icon
; .byte 0x3D ; Minus (-)
; .byte 0x3E ; Multiply (x)
; .byte 0xFF,0 ; Wait, press A to confirm

; If your message has an image, use this at the start of each line
; .byte 0x1A,0x1A,0x1A,0x1A ; Padding for character image

Peek-a-Boo v1.1.code:
; NAME: Peek-a-Boo v1.1
; GAMES: MP3_USA
; EXECUTION: Direct
; PARAM: Space|BoolockHolmes

ADDIU SP SP -40
SW RA 36(SP)

;===Rotate Toward Boolock Holmes===
LI A0 -1 ; Set current player
LI A1 8 ; Rotate in 8 frames
JAL RotatePlayerModel
LI A2 BoolockHolmes ; Face BoolockHolmes

;===Greeting Message===
JAL PlaySound
LI A0 0x257 ; Boo laugh

LUI A0 hi(GreetingMessage)
JAL CallMessage
ADDIU A0 A0 lo(GreetingMessage) ; Display GreetingMessage

;===Randomize Prompt===
JAL GetRand
ORI A0 R0 0x5 ; Get random byte from 0-5

BEQZ V0 FirstPrompt
NOP
ADDIU V0 V0 -1 ; Subtract 1 from V0
BEQZ V0 SecondPrompt
NOP
ADDIU V0 V0 -1 ; Subtract 1 from V0
BEQZ V0 ThirdPrompt
NOP
ADDIU V0 V0 -1 ; Subtract 1 from V0
BEQZ V0 FourthPrompt
NOP
ADDIU V0 V0 -1 ; Subtract 1 from V0
BEQZ V0 FifthPrompt
NOP
; else, select SixthPrompt

;===Sixth Prompt===
LUI A0 hi(CoffinPrompt)
ADDIU A0 A0 lo(CoffinPrompt) ; Display CoffinPrompt
JAL CallPrompt
LI A1 2 ; Correct option is 2

J CheckAnswer
NOP

;===First Prompt===
FirstPrompt:
LUI A0 hi(ChompPrompt)
ADDIU A0 A0 lo(ChompPrompt) ; Display ChompPrompt
JAL CallPrompt
LI A1 0 ; Correct option is 0

J CheckAnswer
NOP

;===Second Prompt===
SecondPrompt:
LUI A0 hi(DarkPrompt)
ADDIU A0 A0 lo(DarkPrompt) ; Display DarkPrompt
JAL CallPrompt
LI A1 1 ; Correct option is 1

J CheckAnswer
NOP

;===Third Prompt===
ThirdPrompt:
LUI A0 hi(KingPrompt)
ADDIU A0 A0 lo(KingPrompt) ; Display KingPrompt
JAL CallPrompt
LI A1 2 ; Correct option is 2

J CheckAnswer
NOP

;===Fourth Prompt===
FourthPrompt:
LUI A0 hi(MintPrompt)
ADDIU A0 A0 lo(MintPrompt) ; Display MintPrompt
JAL CallPrompt
LI A1 0 ; Correct option is 0

J CheckAnswer
NOP

;===Fifth Prompt===
FifthPrompt:
LUI A0 hi(ButlerPrompt)
ADDIU A0 A0 lo(ButlerPrompt) ; Display ButlerPrompt
JAL CallPrompt
LI A1 1 ; Correct option is 1

CheckAnswer:
BEQ V0 V1 CorrectAnswer
NOP
; else, go to WrongAnswer

;===Wrong Answer Message===
WrongAnswer:
JAL FadeScreen
NOP

JAL PlaySound
LI A0 0x25E ; Boo cry

LUI A0 hi(WrongMessage)
JAL CallMessage
ADDIU A0 A0 lo(WrongMessage) ; Display WrongMessage

J exit
NOP

;===Correct Answer Message===
CorrectAnswer:
JAL FadeScreen
NOP

JAL PlaySound
LI A0 0x257 ; Boo laugh

LUI A0 hi(CorrectMessage)
JAL CallMessage
ADDIU A0 A0 lo(CorrectMessage) ; Display CorrectMessage

;===Receive Coins===
JAL GetCurrentPlayerIndex ; Get current player index at V0
NOP

MOVE A0 V0 ; Give coins to current player
JAL AdjustPlayerCoinsGradual
LI A1 15 ; Gain 15 coins

JAL GetCurrentPlayerIndex ; Get current player index at V0
NOP

MOVE A0 V0 ; Give coins to current player
JAL ShowPlayerCoinChange
LI A1 15 ; Gain 15 coins

JAL SleepProcess
LI A0 30 ; Wait 30 frames for coin change

;===Play Happy Voice and Animation===
JAL GetPlayerStruct
LI A0 -1 ; Get current player struct at V0

LBU A0 3(V0) ; Load character value from offset of player struct
JAL PlaySound
ADDIU A0 A0 0x2BE ; Add character value to Mario's happy voice
; Character voices are their "character value" distance away from
; Mario's, e.g. Luigi's character value = 1, so Luigi's happy voice
; is 1 away from Mario's.
; 0x2BE = Happy Voice, 0x287 = Sad Voice

LI A0 -1 ; Set current player
LI A1 5 ; Set joy animation
JAL SetBoardPlayerAnimation
LI A2 0 ; Do not loop animation

JAL SleepProcess
LI A0 40 ; Wait 40 frames for animation

exit:
LW RA 36(SP)
JR RA
ADDIU SP SP 40

;===Mini Func to Call Message===
.align 4
CallMessage:
ADDIU SP SP -40
SW RA 36(SP)

; A0 = Message Address

MOVE A1 A0 ; Copy A0 to A1
SW R0 16(SP) ; A4
SW R0 20(SP) ; A5
SW R0 24(SP) ; A6
LI A0 0x7 ; Character image (-1 for none, 0x7 for Boo)
; Visit the following link to get the full list of Character Images
; https://github.com/PartyPlanner64/PartyPlanner64/wiki/Displaying-Messages
; If you use a character image, check the bottom of the code
LI A2 0
JAL ShowMessage
LI A3 0

; Obligatory message box closing/cleanup calls.
JAL 0x800EC9DC
NOP
JAL CloseMessage
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6EC
NOP

LW RA 36(SP)
JR RA
ADDIU SP SP 40

;===Mini Func to Get Random Byte===
.align 4
GetRand: ; returns on V0

; A0 = max byte

ADDIU sp, sp, -0x18
SW ra, 0x0010 (sp)
BLTZL a0, label1_func0
SUBU a0, r0, a0
label1_func0:
BEQZ a0, End1
DADDU v0, r0, r0
ADDIU v0, r0, 0x0001
BNEL a0, v0, label2_func0
ADDIU v0, r0, 0x0064
JAL Function1
ADDIU a0, r0, 0x03E8
SLTI v0, v0, 0x01F5
J End1
XORI v0, v0, 0x0001
label2_func0:
BEQ a0, v0, label3_func0
NOP
JAL Function1
NOP
J End1
NOP
label3_func0:
JAL Function1
ADDIU a0, r0, 0x03F1
LUI v1, 0x6666
ORI v1, v1, 0x6667
MULT v0, v1
SRA v0, v0, 31
MFHI a1
SRA v1, a1, 2
SUBU v0, v1, v0
End1:
LW ra, 0x0010 (sp)
JR RA
ADDIU sp, sp, 0x18
//
Function1:
ADDIU sp, sp, -0x20
SW s0, 0x0010 (sp)
ADDIU s0, r0, 0xFFFF
SW s1, 0x0014 (sp)
ADDIU s1, a0, 0x0001
BNEZ s1, label1_func1
DIVU s0, s1
BREAK 0x01C00
label1_func1:
MFLO s0
BNEZ s0, label2_func1
SW ra, 0x0018 (sp)
ADDIU s0, r0, 0x0001
label2_func1:
JAL Function2
NOP
BNEZ s0, label3_func1
DIVU v0, s0
BREAK 0x01C00
label3_func1:
MFLO v1
SLTU v0, v1, s1
BEQZ v0, label2_func1
DADDU v0, v1, r0
LW ra, 0x0018 (sp)
LW s1, 0x0014 (sp)
LW s0, 0x0010 (sp)
JR RA
ADDIU sp, sp, 0x20
//
Function2:
LUI v0, 0x8009
LW v0, 0x7650 (v0)
LUI v1, 0x41C6
ORI v1, v1, 0x4E6D
MULT v0, v1
MFLO v0
ADDIU v0, v0, 0x3039
LUI v1, 0x8009
JR RA
SW v0, 0x7650 (v1)

;===Mini Func to Call Prompt===
.align 4
CallPrompt:
ADDIU SP SP -40
SW RA 36(SP)
SW S0 32(SP)
SW S1 28(SP)

; A0 = Message Prompt
; A1 / S0 / V1 = Correct Option
; S1 / V0 = Chosen Option

MOVE S0 A1 ; Copy A1 to S0
MOVE A1 A0 ; Copy A0 to A1
SW R0 16(SP) ; A4
SW R0 20(SP) ; A5
SW R0 24(SP) ; A6
LI A0 0x7 ; Character image (-1 for none, 0x7 for Boo)
; Visit the following link to get the full list of Character Images
; https://github.com/PartyPlanner64/PartyPlanner64/wiki/Displaying-Messages
; If you use a character image, check the bottom of the code
LI A2 0
JAL ShowMessage
LI A3 0

JAL AILogic
MOVE A0 S0 ; Pass correct option on A0

; Get the selection, either from the player or CPU.
; If A0 is a pointer to AI data, AI logic is ran to pick for CPUs.
; If A0 is 0 or 1, the 0th or 1st option is chosen by CPUs.
; If A0 is 2, then the value of A1 is the CPUs option index choice.
LI A0 2
JAL GetBasicPromptSelection
MOVE A1 V0 ; A1 now has the AI's decision
MOVE S1 V0 ; S0 now has the chosen option index

; Obligatory message box closing/cleanup calls.
JAL CloseMessage
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6EC
NOP

MOVE V0 S1 ; Copy S1 to V0
MOVE V1 S0 ; Copy S0 to V1

LW RA 36(SP)
LW S0 32(SP)
LW S1 28(SP)
JR RA
ADDIU SP SP 40

;===Mini Func to Determine AI Logic===
.align 4
AILogic:
ADDIU SP SP -40
SW RA 36(SP)
SW S0 32(SP)

; A0 / S0 = Correct Option

MOVE S0 A0 ; Copy A0 to S0
JAL GetPlayerStruct
LI A0 -1 ; Get current player struct at V0

LBU T0 0x1(V0) ; Load CPU difficulty into T0
LI T1 25
MULT T0 T1 ; Multiply T0 by T1
MFLO A0 ; Move result into A0
JAL RNGPercentChance
NOP
BNEZL V0 AIExit ; If V0 = 1, select correct option
MOVE V0 S0 ; Pick correct option (on likely)
; else, pick wrong option

BEQL S0 R0 AIExit ; If V0 = 1, pick above
ADDIU V0 S0 2 ; Pick 2 options above (on likely)
J AIExit
ADDIU V0 S0 -1 ; Pick option below

AIExit:
LW RA 36(SP)
LW S0 32(SP)
JR RA
ADDIU SP SP 40

;===Mini Func to Fade Screen Out and In===
.align 4
FadeScreen:
ADDIU SP SP -40
SW RA 36(SP)

LI A0 12 ; Assigns Boo fade-out
JAL InitFadeOut ; Fade to black
LI A1 16 ; Assigns 16 frames of fade-out

JAL SleepProcess
LI A0 17 ; Wait 17 frames for fade-out

LI A0 12 ; Assigns Boo fade-in
JAL InitFadeIn ; Fade from black
LI A1 16 ; Assigns 16 frames of fade-in

JAL SleepProcess
LI A0 17 ; Wait 17 frames for fade-in

LW RA 36(SP)
JR RA
ADDIU SP SP 40

Peepa Bellhouse v3.1.code:
; NAME: Peepa Bellhouse v3.1
; GAMES: MP3_USA
; EXECUTION: Direct
; PARAM: Space|PeepaBellhouse

ADDIU SP SP -40
SW RA 36(SP)
SW S0 32(SP)
SW S1 28(SP)

; S0 = Current Player Struct
; S1 = Empty Item Slot Offset

;===Rotate Toward Boo Bellhouse===
LI A0 -1 ; Set current player
LI A1 8 ; Rotate in 8 frames
JAL RotatePlayerModel
LI A2 PeepaBellhouse ; Face PeepaBellhouse

;===Check Player Item Slots===
JAL GetPlayerStruct
LI A0 -1 ; Get current player struct at V0
MOVE S0 V0 ; Copy V0 to S0

JAL PlayerHasEmptyItemSlot
LBU A0 0x1D(S0) ; Pass current player index on A0

BLTZ V0 NoSpace ; If V0 < 0 (no empty slots), go to NoSpace
NOP
MOVE S1 V0 ; Copy V0 to S1

;===Boo Bellhouse Message===
JAL PlaySound
LI A0 0x13A ; Peepa squeak

LUI A0 hi(BellhouseMessage)
JAL CallMessage
ADDIU A0 A0 lo(BellhouseMessage) ; Display BellhouseMessage

;===Receive Boo Repellant===
LI T0 0x0C ; Boo Repellant index
ADDU S1 S0 S1 ; Add empty slot offset to player struct
SB T0 0x18(S1) ; Store item into empty slot offset of player struct

JAL PlaySound
LI A0 0x10C ; Turn Start sound

;===Play Happy Voice and Animation===
LBU A0 3(S0) ; Load character value from offset of player struct
JAL PlaySound
ADDIU A0 A0 0x2BE ; Add character value to Mario's happy voice
; Character voices are their "character value" distance away from
; Mario's, e.g. Luigi's character value = 1, so Luigi's happy voice
; is 1 away from Mario's.
; 0x2BE = Happy Voice, 0x287 = Sad Voice

LI A0 -1 ; Set current player
LI A1 5 ; Set joy animation
JAL SetBoardPlayerAnimation
LI A2 0 ; Do not loop animation

JAL SleepProcess
LI A0 40 ; Wait 40 frames for animation

J exit
NOP

;===No Space Message===
NoSpace:
JAL PlaySound
LI A0 0x13A ; Peepa squeak

LUI A0 hi(NoSpaceMessage)
JAL CallMessage
ADDIU A0 A0 lo(NoSpaceMessage) ; Display NoSpaceMessage

exit:
LW RA 36(SP)
LW S0 32(SP)
LW S1 28(SP)
JR RA
ADDIU SP SP 40

;===Mini Func to Call Message===
.align 4
CallMessage:
ADDIU SP SP -40
SW RA 36(SP)

; A0 = Message Address

MOVE A1 A0 ; Copy A0 to A1
SW R0 16(SP) ; A4
SW R0 20(SP) ; A5
SW R0 24(SP) ; A6
LI A0 -1 ; Character image (-1 for none)
; Visit the following link to get the full list of Character Images
; https://github.com/PartyPlanner64/PartyPlanner64/wiki/Displaying-Messages
; If you use a character image, check the bottom of the code
LI A2 0
JAL ShowMessage
LI A3 0

; Obligatory message box closing/cleanup calls.
JAL 0x800EC9DC
NOP
JAL CloseMessage
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6EC
NOP

LW RA 36(SP)
JR RA
ADDIU SP SP 40

;===Message Text===
.align 16
BellhouseMessage:
.ascii "Psst"
.byte 0xC2 ; Exclamation mark (!)
.ascii " Wanna help us take down these"
.byte 0x0A ; New line (writes below)
.byte 0x03 ; Red font
.ascii "oppressive Boos"
.byte 0x08,0xC3 ; White font, Question mark (?)
.ascii " Take this"
.byte 0x82 ; Comma (,)
.ascii " it"
.byte 0x5C ; Apostrophe (')
.ascii "s"
.byte 0x0A ; New line (writes below)
.ascii "our"
.byte 0x06 ; Blue font
.ascii " secret weapon"
.byte 0x08,0xC2 ; White font, Exclamation mark (!)
.byte 0xFF,0 ; Wait, press A to confirm

.align 16
NoSpaceMessage:
.ascii "Go away"
.byte 0xC2 ; Exclamation mark (!)
.ascii " You"
.byte 0x5C ; Apostrophe (')
.ascii "ll be of no help to our"
.byte 0x0A ; New line (writes below)
.byte 0x03 ; Red font
.ascii "ethereal revolution"
.byte 0x08,0xC2 ; White font, Exclamation mark (!)
.ascii " Shoo"
.byte 0xC2 ; Exclamation mark (!)
.byte 0xFF,0 ; Wait, press A to confirm

; .byte 0x01 ; Black font
; .byte 0x03 ; Red font

; .byte 0xC2 ; Exclamation mark (!)
; .byte 0xC3 ; Question mark (?)
; .byte 0x82 ; Comma (,)

; .byte 0x5C ; Apostrophe (')
; .byte 0x29 ; Coin icon
; .byte 0x3D ; Minus (-)
