Load Boo Models (KBC).code:
; NAME: Load Boo Models (KBC)
; GAMES: MP3_USA
; EXECUTION: Direct
; PARAM: Boolean|LoadPerFrame
; PARAM: +Number|ModelID
; PARAM: Space[]|ModelSpace
; PARAM: Space[]|FacingSpace

; This event supports loading models before a player's turn or at
; every frame possible using a Rainhook. Set this event as "Before
; player turn" regardless of which format you want.

; If the parameter LoadPerFrame is set to "true", this event will
; insert a detour into the main game loop that will run code to load
; models at every frame. This way, models will be loaded whenever the
; board is reloaded after minigames, item use, etc. Setting this
; parameter ON will require the additional event "Revert Rainhook" and
; a game on this board must be finished before playing another board
; on the same ROM to avoid issues.

; If any performance issues are experienced, one can set the parameter
; LoadPerFrame to "false" so that models will only be loaded at the
; start of each player's turn. Setting this parameter OFF does not
; require any additional events or criteria, but models may disappear
; from the board due to minigames, item use, etc.

;===Check Loading Frequency===
LI T0 LoadPerFrame
BEQZ T0 LoadModel ; If LoadPerFrame is OFF, just load model
NOP
; else, insert rainhook

;===Insert Rainhook===
.align 16
ADDIU SP SP -32
SW RA 28(SP)

LUI T0 hi(HookData)
ADDIU T0 T0 lo(HookData)
LW V0 0(T0) ; Load HookData operation
LUI V1 0x8000 ; 0x8000000
ORI V1 V1 0xE7F0 ; 0x8000E7F0, address in main game loop
SW V0 0(V1) ; Insert rainhook to CustomCode in main game loop

LW RA 28(SP)
JR RA
ADDIU SP SP 32

;===Hook Data===
.align 16
HookData: ; Rainhook to jump to CustomCode in main game loop
J CustomCode

;===Custom Code===
.align 16
CustomCode:
ADDIU SP SP -40
SW RA 36(SP)
SW T0 32(SP)
SW T1 28(SP)

LUI T0 0x800D ; 0x800D0000
LW T0 0xC3DC(T0) ; Load value from 0x800CC3DC
BEQZ T0 Skip ; If 0x800CC3DC == NULL (not in board play), skip
NOP
; else, run custom code here

JAL LoadModel
NOP

Skip:
LW RA 36(SP)
LW T0 32(SP)
LW T1 28(SP)
J 0x8000E7C0 ; Resume main game loop
ADDIU SP SP 40

; This code loads a board model onto a blank space on the board
; decided by the parameter "ModelSpace". The parameter "ModelID" sets
; which model will be loaded, and takes a value from 0-78 - see the
; bottom of the event for the entire list. The model can face forward
; (south) by setting the parameter "FaceForward" to "true" or
; towards another space decided by the parameter "FacingSpace".
; Additionally, the model can face the screen by setting the
; parameter "FaceScreen" to "true" (and can be set in conjunction with
; the above parameters).

; Notably, this event loads any models that are present on the other
; MP3 boards, such as Millennium Star, Tumble, or the cacti from
; Spiny Desert. To load any model from the game, refer to the "Load
; Global Model" event instead.

; CAUTION: Do not place the model on a space that players can walk on,
; as this may cause problems.

;===Function to Load Board Model===
.align 16
LoadModel:
ADDIU SP SP -80
SW RA 76(SP)
SW S0 72(SP)
SW S1 68(SP)
SW S2 64(SP)
SW S3 60(SP)
SW A0 56(SP)
SW A1 52(SP)
SW V0 48(SP)
SW T0 44(SP)
SW T1 40(SP)

; S0 = Space Array, the pointer to the space arrays
; S1 = Model Data Pointer, the pointer to the model data
; S2 = Model Space Data, the pointer to the space data
; S3 = Null Pointer, tells if the models are already loaded or not

;===Check Koopa Model Null Pointer===
LUI S3 hi(NullPointer)
ADDIU S3 S3 lo(NullPointer) ; Load the null pointer
LW T0 0(S3) ; Load value of the null pointer into T0
BNEZ T0 exit ; If T0 is not equal to 0, the model is already loaded,
; exit and do not load another model.
NOP
LUI S0 hi(SpaceArray)
ADDIU S0 S0 lo(SpaceArray)

;===Get Model Pointer===
ModelLoop:
LI A0 ModelID ; Model ID value from 0-78
JAL 0x800D90C8 ; Get model pointer at V0
LI A1 0

MOVE S1 V0 ; Copy V0 to S1

;===Get Model Space Data===
JAL GetSpaceData
LBU A0 0(S0) ; Get ModelSpace data at V0
MOVE S2 V0 ; Copy V0 to S2

;===Get Facing Space Data===
JAL GetSpaceData
LBU A0 2(S0) ; Get FacingSpace data at V0

;===Get Midpoint===
ADDIU A0 SP 32 ; Store midpoint xyz coords in 32(SP)
ADDIU A1 V0 8 ; FacingSpace coords
JAL midpoint
ADDIU A2 S2 8 ; ModelSpace coords

JAL 0x800D88E8 ; SpaceAngleHelper
ADDIU A0 SP 32 ; Fix-up midpoint coords

;===Rotate Model===
ADDIU A0 S1 0x18 ; Pass model x2 coord on A0
JAL 0x80089A20 ; StoreCoords (to face)
ADDIU A1 SP 32 ; Pass midpoint coords on A1

;===Put Model onto Space===
PutModel:
ADDIU A0 S1 12 ; Pass model x coord on A0
JAL 0x80089A20 ; StoreCoords (to stand)
ADDIU A1 S2 8 ; Pass ModelSpace coords on A1

LW T0 0(S3) ; Load null pointer into T0
ADDIU S0 S0 1 ; Add 1 to space array
BEQL T0 R0 ModelLoop ; If null pointer is empty, go to ModelLoop
SW S1 0(S3) ; Store model pointer to null pointer (on likely)

exit:
LW RA 76(SP)
LW S0 72(SP)
LW S1 68(SP)
LW S2 64(SP)
LW S3 60(SP)
LW A0 56(SP)
LW A1 52(SP)
LW V0 48(SP)
LW T0 44(SP)
LW T1 40(SP)
JR RA
ADDIU SP SP 80

.align 4
NullPointer:
.fill 4

.align 8
SpaceArray:
.byte ModelSpace
.byte FacingSpace

; Indexes for model ID value
; 0: Mario (low-res)
; 1: Luigi (low-res)
; 2: Peach (low-res)
; 3: Yoshi (low-res)
; 4: Wario (low-res)
; 5: DK (low-res)
; 6: Waluigi (low-res)
; 7: Daisy (low-res)
; 8: Bowser
; 9: Toad
; 10: Boo
; 11: Whomp
; 12: Goomba
; 13: Thwomp
; 14: Mario (high-res)
; 15: Luigi (high-res)
; 16: Peach (high-res)
; 17: Yoshi (high-res)
; 18: Wario (high-res)
; 19: DK (high-res)
; 20: Waluigi (high-res)
; 21: Daisy (high-res)
; 22: Red junction arrow
; 23: Star (lays flat)
; 24: Toad (2D on board)
; 25: Coin (upright)
; 26: Star
; 27: Toad
; 28: Warp Block effect (Rainbow effect around player)
; 29: Baby Bowser (2D on board)
; 30: Koopa bank coin
; 31: Parachute (for goomba?)
; 32: Barter Box opening
; 33: Plunder Chest opening
; 34: White shining effect
; 35: Mario in Bowser Suit
; 36: Magic Lamp
; 37: Genie of the lamp
; 38: Gate (Chilly Waters) opening (overwritten with PP64 gate)
; 39: Gate (Deep Bloober Sea) opening
; 40: Gate (Spiny Desert) opening (overwritten with PP64 gate)
; 41: Gate (Woody Woods?) opening
; 42: Gate (Creepy Cavern?) opening
; 43: Gate (Waluigi's Island?) opening
; 44: Mecha Fly Guy
; 45: Snowman head sleeping
; 46: Snowman head awake
; 47: Snowball rolling
; 48: Toad's item shop opening
; 49: Baby Bowser's item shop opening
; 50: Bank opening
; 51: Boo coffin opening
; 52: Koopa Bank coin tray?
; 53: Koopa Troopa
; 54: Ripple effect
; 55: Stars bursting away effect
; 56: Two white stars pulsing effect
; 57: Baby Bowser
; 58: Millenium Star
; 59: Tumble
; 60: Jeanie waving her wand
; 61: Lucky Lamp
; 62: Game Guy
; 63: Poison Mushroom
; 64: Reverse Mushroom
; 65: Bowser poison curse
; 66: Bowser reverse curse
; 67: Lucky Charm
; 68: Koopa Kard
; 69: Stars and cloud expanding effect
; 70: Blue shining effect
; 71: Quicksand pit
; 72: Purple pit
; 73: Red eyeballs from purple pit
; 74: Green cactus
; 75: Green cactus (female)
; 76: Cart to ride on
; 77: Rock spike
; 78: Pink Koopa Kid ball
; 79: (crash)
; 80+: no model is loaded, at about 85 it crashes

Revert Rainhook.code:
; NAME: Revert Rainhook
; GAMES: MP3_USA
; EXECUTION: Direct

; Set this event as "After turn".

ADDIU SP SP -32
SW RA 28(SP)

;===Check Turn Count===
LUI T0 hi(current_turn)
ADDIU T0 T0 lo(current_turn)
LBU T0 0(T0) ; Load current turn

LUI T1 hi(total_turns)
ADDIU T1 T1 lo(total_turns)
LBU T1 0(T1) ; Load total turns

BNE T0 T1 exit ; If it's not the last turn, exit
NOP
; else, revert Rainhook

;===Revert Rainhook===
.align 16
Main:
LUI T0 hi(OriginalData)
ADDIU T0 T0 lo(OriginalData)
LW V0 0(T0) ; Load OriginalData operation
LUI V1 0x8000 ; 0x8000000
ORI V1 V1 0xE7F0 ; 0x8000E7F0, address in main game loop
SW V0 0(V1) ; Insert original code in main game loop

exit:
LW RA 28(SP)
JR RA
ADDIU SP SP 32

;===Original Data===
.align 16
OriginalData:
J 0x8000E7C0 ; Original code

Bell Curse or Spook Effect.code:
; NAME: Bell Curse or Spook Effect
; GAMES: MP3_USA
; EXECUTION: Direct

ADDIU SP SP -32
SW RA 28(SP)

;===Get Current Player Index===
JAL GetCurrentPlayerIndex ; Get current player index at V0
NOP

;===Get Player's Bell Curse Flag===
LUI T0 0x800C ; 0x800C0000
ORI T0 T0 0xD096 ; 0x800CD096 - P1 Bell Curse Flag
ADDU T0 T0 V0 ; Add to get current player's Bell Curse Flag

;===Check Flag===
LBU T2 0(T0) ; Load Bell Curse Flag value
BEQZ T2 exit ; If flag is OFF, exit
NOP
; else, flag is ON

;===Change Flags===
SB R0 0(T0) ; Turn off Bell Curse Flag
LUI T0 0x800C ; 0x800C0000
ORI T0 T0 0xD0A9 ; 0x800CD0A9 - Used Item Flag
LI T1 1 ; Turn flag ON
SB T1 0(T0) ; Used Item Flag ON, player cannot use items

;===Decide Message===
BEQ T2 T1 BellCurse ; If T2 = 1, Bell Curse in effect
NOP
; else, Spook in effect
LUI A1 hi(SpookMessage)
J StartMessage
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(SpookMessage) ; Display SpookMessage

BellCurse:
LUI A1 hi(CurseMessage)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(CurseMessage) ; Display CurseMessage

;===Display Message===
StartMessage:
SW R0 16(SP) ; A4
SW R0 20(SP) ; A5
SW R0 24(SP) ; A6
LI A0 -1 ; Character image (-1 for none)
; Visit the following link to get the full list of Character Images
; https://github.com/PartyPlanner64/PartyPlanner64/wiki/Displaying-Messages
; If you use a character image, check the bottom of the code
; Pass message address on A1
LI A2 0
JAL ShowMessage
LI A3 0

; Obligatory message box closing/cleanup calls.
JAL 0x800EC9DC
NOP
JAL CloseMessage
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6EC
NOP

exit:
LW RA 28(SP)
JR RA
ADDIU SP SP 32

;===Message Text===
.align 16
SpookMessage:
.ascii "That"
.byte 0x05 ; Green font
.ascii " Boo"
.byte 0x08 ; White font
.ascii " was so frightening that"
.byte 0x0A ; New line (writes below)
.ascii "you"
.byte 0x5C ; Apostrophe (')
.ascii "re too"
.byte 0x04 ; Purple font
.ascii " spooked"
.byte 0x08 ; White font
.ascii " to"
.byte 0x0A ; New line (writes below)
.ascii "use your"
.byte 0x06 ; Blue font
.ascii " items"
.byte 0x08 ; White font
.ascii " this turn"
.byte 0xC2 ; Exclamation mark (!)
.byte 0xFF,0 ; Wait, press A to confirm

.align 16
CurseMessage:
.ascii "Feeling the effects of the"
.byte 0x04 ; Purple font
.ascii " Boo Bell Curse"
.byte 0x08,0x82 ; White font, Comma (,)
.ascii " you"
.byte 0x0A ; New line (writes below)
.ascii "can"
.byte 0x5C ; Apostrophe (')
.ascii "t use your"
.byte 0x06 ; Blue font
.ascii " items"
.byte 0x08 ; White font
.ascii " this turn"
.byte 0xC2 ; Exclamation mark (!)
.byte 0xFF,0 ; Wait, press A to confirm

; Here's a list of the most common bytes you'll need
; .byte 0x01 ; Black font
; .byte 0x03 ; Red font
; .byte 0x04 ; Purple font
; .byte 0x05 ; Green font
; .byte 0x06 ; Blue font
; .byte 0x07 ; Yellow font
; .byte 0x08 ; White font
; .byte 0x85 ; Period (.)
; .byte 0xC2 ; Exclamation mark (!)
; .byte 0xC3 ; Question mark (?)
; .byte 0x82 ; Comma (,)
; .byte 0x0A ; New line (writes below)
; .byte 0x5C ; Apostrophe (')
; .byte 0x29 ; Coin icon
; .byte 0x3D ; Minus (-)
; .byte 0x3E ; Multiply (x)
; .byte 0xFF,0 ; Wait, press A to confirm

; If your message has an image, use this at the start of each line
; .byte 0x1A,0x1A,0x1A,0x1A ; Padding for character image

Merged Path Fix (v2).code:
; NAME: Merged Path Fix (v2)
; GAMES: MP3_USA
; EXECUTION: Direct
; PARAM: Space|Behind
; PARAM: Space|Next
; PARAM: Space|OtherBehind

ADDIU SP SP -32
SW RA 28(SP)

JAL GetPlayerStruct ; at V0
LI A0 -1

CheckChain:
LBU T1 0x15(V0) ; Previous Chain Index
LBU T2 0x16(V0) ; Previous ChainSpace Index
ADDIU T0 R0 Behind_chain_index
BNE T0 T1 CheckChain2
NOP
ADDIU T0 R0 Behind_chain_space_index
BNE T0 T2 CheckChain2
NOP
J SetupSpace
NOP

CheckChain2:
ADDIU T0 R0 OtherBehind_chain_index
BEQ T0 T1 exit
NOP
ADDIU T0 R0 OtherBehind_chain_space_index
BEQ T0 T1 exit
NOP

SetupSpace:
LI A0 -1 ; Assigns Current Player Index to A0
ADDIU A1 R0 Next_chain_index ; Assigns Chain Index to A1
JAL SetNextChainAndSpace
ADDIU A2 R0 Next_chain_space_index ; Assigns Space Index to A2 

LI A0 -1 ; Assigns Current Player Index to A0
ADDIU A1 R0 Behind_chain_index ; Assigns Chain Index to A1
JAL SetPrevChainAndSpace 
ADDIU A2 R0 Behind_chain_space_index ; Assigns Space Index to A2

exit:
LW RA 28(SP)
JR RA
ADDIU SP SP 32

Red Space Ruleset Fix-up.code:
; NAME: Red Space Ruleset Fix-up
; GAMES: MP3_USA
; EXECUTION: Direct
; PARAM: Space[]|RedSpaces

ADDIU SP SP -40
SW RA 36(SP)
SW S0 32(SP)
SW S1 28(SP)

LUI S0 hi(RedSpaceArray)
ADDIU S0 S0 lo(RedSpaceArray)
LI S1 1 ; Start at 1

LoopFix:
LBU A0 0(S0) ; Load space index
JAL SetSpaceType
LI A1 2 ; Set back to Red Space

LI T0 RedSpaces_length ; Number of Red Spaces in array
BEQ S1 T0 exit ; If all Red Spaces reset, exit
NOP
ADDIU S0 S0 1 ; Add 1 to get next Red Space
J LoopFix
ADDIU S1 S1 1 ; Add 1 to loop counter

exit:
JAL RedrawSpaces ; Visually redraw spaces
NOP

LW RA 36(SP)
LW S0 32(SP)
LW S1 28(SP)
JR RA
ADDIU SP SP 40

.align 16
RedSpaceArray:
.byte RedSpaces

Red Space Ruleset (KBC).code:
; NAME: Red Space Ruleset (KBC)
; GAMES: MP3_USA
; EXECUTION: Direct

ADDIU SP SP -40
SW RA 36(SP)
SW S0 32(SP)

; S0 = Changed Space Type

;===Check Last 5 Turns Ruleset===
LUI T0 0x800C ; 0x800C0000
ORI T0 T0 0xD0A8 ; 0x800CD0A8, Last 5 Turns New Ruleset Address
LBU T0 0(T0) ; Load ruleset into T0
LI T1 2 ; Red Space ruleset value
BNE T0 T1 exit ; If Red Space ruleset is not in place, exit
NOP
; else, Red Space ruleset is in place

;===Sound Effect===
JAL PlaySound
LI A0 0x143 ; Shining Star

JAL SleepProcess
LI A0 60 ; Wait 60 frames for sound (and anticipation)

;===Determine Space Change===
JAL GetRandomByte ; Get random byte (0-255) at V0
NOP
SLTI T0 V0 200 ; If V0 < 200, T0 = 1
BEQZ T0 exit ; If T0 = 0, V0 > 200, exit
NOP
; else, Red Space will change types

;===Determine Space Type===
JAL GetRandomByte ; Get random byte (0-255) at V0
NOP
SLTI T0 V0 64 ; If V0 < 64, T0 = 1
BNEZ T0 ChangeToBowser ; If T0 = 1, change to Bowser Space
NOP
SLTI T0 V0 128 ; If V0 < 128, T0 = 1
BNEZ T0 ChangeToBattle ; If T0 = 1, change to Battle Space
NOP
SLTI T0 V0 192 ; If V0 < 192, T0 = 1
BNEZ T0 ChangeToGameGuy ; If T0 = 1, change to Game Guy Space
NOP
; else, change to Chance Time Space

;===Get Space Types===
J ChangeRedSpace
LI S0 0x05 ; Chance Time Space value

ChangeToBowser:
J ChangeRedSpace
LI S0 0x0C ; Bowser Space value

ChangeToBattle:
J ChangeRedSpace
LI S0 0x09 ; Battle Space value

ChangeToGameGuy:
LI S0 0x0F ; Game Guy Space value

;===Change Red Space===
ChangeRedSpace:
JAL GetCurrentSpaceIndex ; Get current space index at V0
NOP
MOVE A0 V0 ; Pass current space index on A0
JAL SetSpaceType
MOVE A1 S0 ; Pass changed space value on A1

JAL RedrawSpaces ; Redraw spaces visually
NOP

;===Prepare Changed Message===
LUI T0 hi(SpaceStrings)
ADDIU T0 T0 lo(SpaceStrings)
SLL A2 S0 5 ; Multiply space value by 32 (distance between space strings)
ADDU A2 A2 T0 ; A2 now contains space string pointer

LUI A0 hi(ChangedMessageHolder)
ADDIU A0 A0 lo(ChangedMessageHolder) ; Parse destination
LUI A1 hi(ChangedMessage)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(ChangedMessage) ; String formatter (%s)
; Pass space string pointer on A2
JAL sprintf
LI A3 0 ; Terminator byte

;===Changed Message===
SW R0 16(SP) ; A4
SW R0 20(SP) ; A5
SW R0 24(SP) ; A6
LI A0 -1 ; ; Character image (-1 for none)
; Visit the following link to get the full list of Character Images
; https://github.com/PartyPlanner64/PartyPlanner64/wiki/Displaying-Messages
; If you use a character image, check the bottom of the code
LUI A1 hi(ChangedMessageHolder)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(ChangedMessageHolder) ; Display ChangedMessage with printed strings
LI A2 0
JAL ShowMessage
LI A3 0

; Obligatory message box closing/cleanup calls.
JAL 0x800EC9DC
NOP
JAL CloseMessage
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6EC
NOP

exit:
LW RA 36(SP)
LW S0 32(SP)
JR RA
ADDIU SP SP 40

;===Message Text===
.align 16
ChangedMessage:
.ascii "The"
.byte 0x03 ; Red font
.ascii " Red Space"
.byte 0x08 ; White font
.ascii " turned into"
.byte 0x0A ; New line (writes below)
.ascii "a "
.ascii "%s" ; Space string
.byte 0x08,0xC2 ; White font, Exclamation mark (!)
.byte 0xFF,0 ; Wait, press A to confirm

; Here's a list of the most common bytes you'll need
; .byte 0x01 ; Black font
; .byte 0x03 ; Red font
; .byte 0x04 ; Purple font
; .byte 0x05 ; Green font
; .byte 0x06 ; Blue font
; .byte 0x07 ; Yellow font
; .byte 0x08 ; White font
; .byte 0x85 ; Period (.)
; .byte 0xC2 ; Exclamation mark (!)
; .byte 0xC3 ; Question mark (?)
; .byte 0x82 ; Comma (,)
; .byte 0x0A ; New line (writes below)
; .byte 0x5C ; Apostrophe (')
; .byte 0x29 ; Coin icon
; .byte 0x3D ; Minus (-)
; .byte 0x3E ; Multiply (x)
; .byte 0xFF,0 ; Wait, press A to confirm

; If your message has an image, use this at the start of each line
; .byte 0x1A,0x1A,0x1A,0x1A ; Padding for character image

;===Space Strings===
.align 32
SpaceStrings:
.byte 0x05 ; Green font
.asciiz "blank space" ; 0x00
.align 32
.byte 0x06 ; Blue font
.asciiz "Blue Space" ; 0x01
.align 32
.byte 0x03 ; Red font
.asciiz "Red Space" ; 0x02
.align 32
.byte 0x08 ; White font
.asciiz "blank space" ; 0x03
.align 32
.byte 0x05 ; Green font
.asciiz "Happening Space" ; 0x04
.align 32
.byte 0x05 ; Green font
.asciiz "Chance Time Space" ; 0x05
.align 32
.byte 0x05 ; Green font
.asciiz "Item Space" ; 0x06
.align 32
.byte 0x05 ; Green font
.asciiz "Bank Space" ; 0x07
.align 32
.byte 0x08 ; White font
.asciiz "blank space" ; 0x08
.align 32
.byte 0x05 ; Green font
.asciiz "Battle Space" ; 0x09
.align 32
.byte 0x08 ; White font
.asciiz "blank space" ; 0x0A
.align 32
.byte 0x08 ; White font
.asciiz "blank space" ; 0x0B
.align 32
.byte 0x03 ; Red font
.asciiz "Bowser Space" ; 0x0C
.align 32
.byte 0x08 ; White font
.asciiz "blank space" ; 0x0D
.align 32
.byte 0x01 ; Black font
.asciiz "blank space" ; 0x0E
.align 32
.byte 0x05 ; Green font
.asciiz "Game Guy Space" ; 0x0F

;===Changed Message Holder===
.align 16
ChangedMessageHolder:
.fill 0x1024,0

Blue Space Ruleset (KBC).code:
; NAME: Blue Space Ruleset (KBC)
; GAMES: MP3_USA
; EXECUTION: Direct

ADDIU SP SP -40
SW RA 36(SP)
SW S0 32(SP)

; S0 = HB Address

;===Check Last 5 Turns Ruleset===
LUI T0 0x800C ; 0x800C0000
ORI T0 T0 0xD0A8 ; 0x800CD0A8, Last 5 Turns New Ruleset Address
LBU T0 0(T0) ; Load ruleset into T0
LI T1 1 ; Blue Space Ruleset
BNE T0 T1 exit ; If Blue Space Ruleset not active, exit
NOP

;===Check Player Placement===
JAL GetCurrentPlayerIndex ; Get current player index at V0
NOP
JAL GetPlayerPlacement
MOVE A0 V0 ; Get current player placement at V0
LI T0 3 ; 4th place
BNE V0 T0 exit ; If player isn't last, exit
NOP

;===Check to Get Star HB===
JAL GetCurrentPlayerIndex
NOP
JAL GetPlayerPlacementAtEndOfGame
MOVE A0 V0 ; Get current player placement w/ bonus stars at V0

LI T0 10
MULT T0 V0 ; Multiply T0 by V0
MFLO A0 ; Move the result into A0
JAL RNGPercentChance
ADDIU A0 A0 10 ; Base 10% chance of Star HB

BNEZ V0 GetStarBlock ; If V0 = 1, get star block
NOP
; else, get item or coin block

JAL RNGPercentChance
LI A0 50 ; 50% chance of V0 = 1

BNEZ V0 GetCoinBlock ; If V0 = 1, get coin block
NOP
; else, get item block

;===Get Hidden Block===
GetItemBlock:
LUI S0 0x800C ; 0x800C0000
J StoreHB
ORI S0 S0 0xC4E5 ; 0x800CC4E5, Item HB Address

GetStarBlock:
LUI S0 0x800D ; 0x800D0000
J StoreHB
ORI S0 S0 0x124F ; 0x800D124F, Star HB Address

GetCoinBlock:
LUI S0 0x800C ; 0x800C0000
ORI S0 S0 0xE1C5 ; 0x800CE1C5, Coin HB Address

;===Store Hidden Block===
StoreHB:
JAL GetCurrentSpaceIndex ; Get current space index at V0
NOP
SB V0 0(S0) ; Put HB onto current space

exit:
LW RA 36(SP)
LW S0 32(SP)
JR RA
ADDIU SP SP 40

Koopa Bank Ruleset (KBC).code:
; NAME: Koopa Bank Ruleset (KBC)
; GAMES: MP3_USA
; EXECUTION: Direct
; PARAM: Space|Bank

ADDIU SP SP -40
SW RA 36(SP)
SW S0 32(SP)
SW S1 28(SP)

; S0 = Current Player Struct
; S1 = Bank Fee

;===Check Last 5 Turns Ruleset===
LUI T0 0x800C ; 0x800C0000
ORI T0 T0 0xD0A8 ; 0x800CD0A8, Last 5 Turns New Ruleset Address
LBU T0 0(T0) ; Load ruleset into T0
LI T1 3 ; Bank ruleset
BNE T0 T1 exit ; If Bank ruleset is not active, exit
NOP

;===Check for Coins===
JAL GetPlayerStruct
LI A0 -1 ; Get current player struct at V0
MOVE S0 V0 ; Copy V0 to S0

LBU A0 0x1D(S0) ; Pass current player index on A0
JAL PlayerHasCoins
LI A1 1 ; Check for 1 coin

BEQZ V0 exit ; If player doesn't have coins, exit
NOP

;===Get Player Placement===
JAL GetPlayerPlacement
LBU A0 0x1D(S0) ; Pass current player index on A0
LUI T0 hi(BankFees)
ADDIU T0 T0 lo(BankFees)
ADDU T0 T0 V0 ; Add placement offset to Bank Fees
LBU S1 0(T0) ; Load bank fee into S1
BEQZ S1 exit ; If player is 4th, no extra fees, exit
NOP
; else, start the event

;===Hide Dice Roll===
JAL 0x800DBEC0 ; HideDiceRoll
LBU A0 0x1D(S0) ; Pass current player index on A0

;===Set Player Idle Animation===
LI A0 -1 ; Set current player
LI A1 -1 ; Set idle animation
JAL SetBoardPlayerAnimation
LI A2 2 ; Loop the animation

;===Rotate Toward Bank===
LI A0 -1 ; Set current player
LI A1 8 ; Rotate in 8 frames
JAL RotatePlayerModel
LI A2 Bank ; Face Bank

;===Prepare Message===
LUI A0 hi(CoinString)
ADDIU A0 A0 lo(CoinString) ; Parse destination
LUI A1 hi(percent_d)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(percent_d) ; String formatter
JAL sprintf
MOVE A2 S1 ; Pass no. of coins (bank fee) on A2

;===Display Message===
JAL PlaySound
LI A0 0x259 ; Koopa voice

SW R0 16(SP) ; A4
SW R0 20(SP) ; A5
SW R0 24(SP) ; A6
LI A0 0x2 ; Character image (-1 for none, 0x2 for Koopa)
; Visit the following link to get the full list of Character Images
; https://github.com/PartyPlanner64/PartyPlanner64/wiki/Displaying-Messages
; If you use a character image, check the bottom of the code
LUI A1 hi(KoopaMessage)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(KoopaMessage) ; Display KoopaMessage
LUI A2 hi(CoinString)
ADDIU A2 A2 lo(CoinString) ; Pass CoinString as String #1
JAL ShowMessage
LI A3 0

; Obligatory message box closing/cleanup calls.
JAL 0x800EC9DC
NOP
JAL CloseMessage
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6EC
NOP

;===Check Player Coins===
LBU A0 0x1D(S0) ; Pass current player index on A0
JAL PlayerHasCoins
MOVE A1 S1 ; Check for bank fee

BEQL V0 R0 TakeCoins ; If player doesn't have enough coins, take coins
LHU S1 0xA(S0) ; Load player's coins into S1 (on likely)

;===Take Coins===
TakeCoins:
LBU A0 0x1D(S0) ; Pass current player index on A0
JAL AdjustPlayerCoinsGradual
SUBU A1 R0 S1 ; Lose coins

LBU A0 0x1D(S0) ; Pass current player index on A0
JAL ShowPlayerCoinChange
SUBU A1 R0 S1 ; Lose coins

JAL SleepProcess
LI A0 30 ; Wait 30 frames for coin change

;===Add Coins to Bank===
LUI T0 hi(bank_coin_total)
ADDIU T0 T0 lo(bank_coin_total)
LHU T1 0(T0) ; Load bank coin total into T1
ADDU T1 T1 S1 ; Add bank fee to T1
SH T1 0(T0) ; Store new bank coin total

;===Show Dice Roll===
JAL 0x800DB884 ; ShowDiceRoll
LBU A0 0x1D(S0) ; Pass current player index on A0
JAL SleepProcess
LI A0 10 ; Wait 10 frames for dice roll to show

exit:
LW RA 36(SP)
LW S0 32(SP)
LW S1 28(SP)
JR RA
ADDIU SP SP 40

;===Prep for Displaying Coin String===
.align 16
percent_d:
.asciiz "%d" ; 0x25640000

.align 16
CoinString:
.fill 8

;===Fee Table===
.align 16
BankFees:
.byte 9 ; 1st place pays 9 coins
.byte 6 ; 2nd place pays 6 coins
.byte 3 ; 3rd place pays 3 coins
.byte 0 ; 4th place pays 0 coins

.align 16
KoopaMessage:
.byte 0x1A,0x1A,0x1A,0x1A ; Padding for character image
.ascii "Following our newly added policies"
.byte 0x82 ; Comma (,)
.byte 0x0A,0x1A,0x1A,0x1A,0x1A ; New line + character image
.ascii "an added fee of "
.byte 0x03 ; Red font
.byte 0x11 ; String #1 stored in A2 (Coin String)
.ascii " coins"
.byte 0x08 ; White font
.ascii " is now"
.byte 0x0A,0x1A,0x1A,0x1A,0x1A ; New line + character image
.ascii "required to access your account"
.byte 0x85 ; Period (.)
.byte 0x0A,0x1A,0x1A,0x1A,0x1A ; New line + character image
.ascii "Thank you for your understanding"
.byte 0x85 ; Period (.)
.byte 0xFF,0 ; Wait, press A to confirm

; Here's a list of the most common bytes you'll need
; .byte 0x01 ; Black font
; .byte 0x03 ; Red font
; .byte 0x04 ; Purple font
; .byte 0x05 ; Green font
; .byte 0x06 ; Blue font
; .byte 0x07 ; Yellow font
; .byte 0x08 ; White font
; .byte 0x85 ; Period (.)
; .byte 0xC2 ; Exclamation mark (!)
; .byte 0xC3 ; Question mark (?)
; .byte 0x82 ; Comma (,)
; .byte 0x0A ; New line (writes below)
; .byte 0x5C ; Apostrophe (')
; .byte 0x29 ; Coin icon
; .byte 0x3D ; Minus (-)
; .byte 0x3E ; Multiply (x)
; .byte 0xFF,0 ; Wait, press A to confirm

; If your message has an image, use this at the start of each line
; .byte 0x1A,0x1A,0x1A,0x1A ; Padding for character image

Boo Buddy Ruleset.code:
; NAME: Boo Buddy Ruleset
; GAMES: MP3_USA
; EXECUTION: Direct

;===Main Function===
.align 4
Main:
ADDIu SP SP -40
SW RA 36(SP)
SW S0 32(SP)

; S0 = Current Player Struct

; Write Lady Bow pointer to board RAM
LUI T0 hi(LadyBow)
ADDIU T0 T0 lo(LadyBow)
LUI T1 0x800C ; 0x800C0000
ORI T1 T1 0xD0A4 ; 0x800CD0A4, Lady Bow Pointer Address
SW T0 0(T1) ; Store pointer to Lady Bow

; Check Last 5 Turns Ruleset
LUI T0 0x800C ; 0x800C0000
ORI T0 T0 0xD0A8 ; 0x800CD0A8, Last 5 Turns New Ruleset Address
LBU T0 0(T0) ; Load ruleset into T0
LI T1 4 ; Boo Buddy Ruleset
BNE T0 T1 MainExit ; If Boo Buddy Ruleset is not active, exit
NOP

; Get player struct
JAL GetPlayerStruct
LI A0 -1 ; Get current player struct at V0
MOVE S0 V0 ; Copy V0 to S0

; Get player placement
JAL GetPlayerPlacement
LBU A0 0x1D(S0) ; Pass current player index on A0
LI T0 3 ; 4th place
BNE V0 T0 MainExit ; If player isn't 4th, exit
NOP

; Display Boo Buddy Prompt
StartBooBuddyPrompt:
JAL DisplayBooBuddyPrompt
NOP

; Change the player's destination based on the choice.
BEQZ V0 CallBoo ; If V0 = 0, call Boo
NOP
LI T0 1
BEQ V0 T0 CallLadyBow ; If V0 = 1, call Lady Bow
NOP
LI T0 2
BEQ V0 T0 CallPrizeExchange ; If V0 = 2, call Prize Exchange
NOP
LI T0 3
BEQ V0 T0 MainExit ; If V0 = 3, exit
NOP
; else pick "View map"
JAL ViewBoardMap
NOP
J StartBooBuddyPrompt
NOP

CallBoo:
JAL GetCurrentSpaceIndex ; Get current space index at V0
NOP
LUI T0 hi(0x80102C58)
ADDIU T0 T0 lo(0x80102C58) ; Boo Event Pointer Address
LW T0 0(T0) ; Load pointer into T0
JALR T0 ; Call Boo function
SB V0 0xBF(T0) ; Store Boo's space

J MainExit
NOP

CallLadyBow:
JAL LadyBow ; Call Lady Bow function
MOVE A0 S0 ; Pass current player struct on A0
J MainExit
NOP

CallPrizeExchange:
LBU A0 0xF(S0) ; Load player current chain index
JAL GetAbsSpaceIndexFromChainSpaceIndex
LBU A1 0x10(S0) ; Load player current chain space index

LUI T0 0x800C ; 0x800C0000
ORI T0 T0 0xD0A0 ; 0x800CD0A0, Prize Exchange Pointer Address
LW T0 0(T0) ; Load pointer into T0

MOVE A0 S0 ; Pass current player struct on A0
JALR T0 ; Call Prize Exchange function
MOVE A1 V0 ; Pass current space on A1

MainExit:
LI A0 -1 ; Set current player
LI A1 -1 ; Set idle animation
JAL SetBoardPlayerAnimation
LI A2 2 ; Loop the animation

LW RA 36(SP)
LW S0 32(SP)
JR RA
ADDIU SP SP 40

;===Display Boo Buddy Prompt===
.align 4
DisplayBooBuddyPrompt:
ADDIU SP SP -40
SW RA 36(SP)
SW S0 32(SP)

; S0 = Prompt Choice

SW R0 16(SP) ; A4
SW R0 20(SP) ; A5
SW R0 24(SP) ; A6
LI A0 -1 ; Character image (-1 for none)
; Visit the following link to get the full list of Character Images
; https://github.com/PartyPlanner64/PartyPlanner64/wiki/Displaying-Messages
; If you use a character image, check the bottom of the code
LUI A1 hi(BooBuddyPrompt)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(BooBuddyPrompt) ; Display BooBuddyPrompt
LI A2 0
JAL ShowMessage
LI A3 0

JAL BooBuddyLogic
NOP

; Get the selection, either from the player or CPU.
; If A0 is a pointer to AI data, AI logic is ran to pick for CPUs.
; If A0 is 0 or 1, the 0th or 1st option is chosen by CPUs.
; If A0 is 2, then the value of A1 is the CPUs option index choice.
LI A0 2
JAL GetBasicPromptSelection
MOVE A1 V0 ; A1 now has the AI's decision
MOVE S0 V0 ; S0 now has the chosen option index

JAL MessageCleanup
NOP
MOVE V0 S0 ; Copy S0 to V0

LW RA 36(SP)
LW S0 32(SP)
JR RA
ADDIU SP SP 40

;===Boo Buddy Logic===
.align 4
BooBuddyLogic:
ADDIU SP SP -40
SW RA 36(SP)
SW S0 32 (SP)

; S0 = Current Player Struct

JAL GetPlayerStruct
LI A0 -1 ; Get current player struct at V0
MOVE S0 V0 ; Copy V0 to S0

; Check items
LBU A0 0x1D(S0) ; Pass current player index on A0
JAL PlayerHasItem
LI A1 0x01 ; Skeleton Key index
LI T0 -1
BNEL V0 T0 BooBuddyLogicExit ; If player has a key, exit
LI V0 2 ; Select Prize Exchange (on likely)

; Check coins
LBU A0 0x1D(S0) ; Pass current player index on A0
JAL PlayerHasCoins
LI A1 50 ; Check for 50 coins

BNEZL V0 BooBuddyLogicExit ; If player has 50 coins, exit
LI V0 0 ; Select Boo (on likely)

LBU A0 0x1D(S0) ; Pass current player index on A0
JAL PlayerHasCoins
LI A1 12 ; Check for 12 coins

BNEZL V0 BooBuddyLogicExit ; If player has 12 coins, exit
LI V0 1 ; Select Lady Bow (on likely)

; Randomize
JAL RNGPercentChance
LI A0 50 ; 50% chance of V0 = 1

BooBuddyLogicExit:
LW RA 36(SP)
LW S0 32(SP)
JR RA
ADDIU SP SP 40

;===Lady Bow===
.align 4
LadyBow:
ADDIU SP SP -40
SW RA 36(SP)
SW S0 32(SP)

; A0 / S0 = Current Player Struct

MOVE S0 A0 ; Copy A0 to S0

; Display greeting message
JAL PlaySound
LI A0 0x257 ; Boo laugh

LI A0 0 ; Display message
LUI A1 hi(GreetingMessage)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(GreetingMessage) ; Display GreetingMessage
LBU A2 3(S0) ; Load character value into A2
JAL CallMessage
ADDIU A2 A2 0x1C00 ; Add character value to MARIO string

; Get total logic
JAL GetTotalLogic
MOVE A0 S0 ; Pass current player struct on A0
LW T0 0(V0) ; Load total logic into T0
BEQZ T0 ExitMessage ; If all skills are disabled, exit
NOP
; else, prepare to display main prompt

; Prepare and display main prompt
StartMainPrompt:
LUI A0 hi(LogicArray)
JAL PrepareMainPrompt
ADDIU A0 A0 lo(LogicArray) ; Pass logic array on A0

JAL DisplayMainPrompt
MOVE A0 S0 ; Pass current player struct on A0

; Change the player's destination based on the choice.
BEQZ V0 StartSmack ; If V0 = 0, start Smack
NOP
LI T0 1
BEQ V0 T0 StartOuttaSight ; If V0 = 1, start Outta Sight
NOP
LI T0 2
BEQ V0 T0 StartSpook ; If V0 = 2, start Spook
NOP
LI T0 3
BEQ V0 T0 StartFanSmack ; If V0 = 3, start Fan Smack
NOP
LI T0 4
BEQ V0 T0 ExitMessage ; If V0 = 4, exit
NOP
; else pick "View map"
JAL ViewBoardMap
NOP
J StartMainPrompt
NOP

; Start Smack
StartSmack:
LUI A0 hi(SmackLogic)
JAL StartTargetPrompt
ADDIU A0 A0 lo(SmackLogic) ; Pass Smack logic on A0

; Change the player's destination based on the choice.
LI T0 5
BEQ V0 T0 StartMainPrompt
NOP
LI T0 6
BNE V0 T0 ContinueSmack
NOP
; else pick "View map"
JAL ViewBoardMap
NOP
J StartSmack
NOP

; Continue Smack
ContinueSmack:
MOVE A0 S0 ; Pass current player struct on A0
JAL Smack
MOVE A1 V0 ; Pass target player index on A1

J ExitMessage
NOP

; Start Outta Sight
StartOuttaSight:
LUI A0 hi(OuttaSightLogic)
JAL StartTargetPrompt
ADDIU A0 A0 lo(OuttaSightLogic) ; Pass Outta Sight logic on A0

; Change the player's destination based on the choice.
LI T0 5
BEQ V0 T0 StartMainPrompt
NOP
LI T0 6
BNE V0 T0 ContinueOuttaSight
NOP
; else pick "View map"
JAL ViewBoardMap
NOP
J StartOuttaSight
NOP

; Continue Outta Sight
ContinueOuttaSight:
LBU A0 0x1D(S0) ; Pass current player index on A0
JAL OuttaSight
MOVE A1 V0 ; Pass target player index on A1

JAL HappyVoice
LBU A0 3(S0) ; Pass current player character value on A0

J ExitMessage
NOP

; Start Spook
StartSpook:
LUI A0 hi(SpookLogic)
JAL StartTargetPrompt
ADDIU A0 A0 lo(SpookLogic) ; Pass Spook logic on A0

; Change the player's destination based on the choice.
LI T0 5
BEQ V0 T0 StartMainPrompt
NOP
LI T0 6
BNE V0 T0 ContinueSpook
NOP
; else pick "View map"
JAL ViewBoardMap
NOP
J StartSpook
NOP

; Continue Spook
ContinueSpook:
LBU A0 0x1D(S0) ; Pass current player index on A0
JAL Spook
MOVE A1 V0 ; Pass target player index on A1

JAL HappyVoice
LBU A0 3(S0) ; Pass current player character value on A0

J ExitMessage
NOP

; Start Fan Smack
StartFanSmack:
LUI A0 hi(FanSmackLogic)
JAL StartTargetPrompt
ADDIU A0 A0 lo(FanSmackLogic) ; Pass Fan Smack logic on A0

; Change the player's destination based on the choice.
LI T0 5
BEQ V0 T0 StartMainPrompt
NOP
LI T0 6
BNE V0 T0 ContinueFanSmack
NOP
; else pick "View map"
JAL ViewBoardMap
NOP
J StartFanSmack
NOP

;Continue Fan Smack
ContinueFanSmack:
MOVE A0 S0 ; Pass current player struct on A0
JAL FanSmack
MOVE A1 V0 ; Pass target player index on A1

J ExitMessage
NOP

; Exit message
ExitMessage:
JAL PlaySound
LI A0 0x257 ; Boo laugh

LI A0 0 ; Display message
LUI A1 hi(GoodbyeMessage)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(GoodbyeMessage) ; Display GoodbyeMessage
JAL CallMessage
LI A2 0 ; No string

LW RA 36(SP)
LW S0 32(SP)
JR RA
ADDIU SP SP 40

;===Call Message===
.align 4
CallMessage:
ADDIU SP SP -40
SW RA 36(SP)
SW S0 32(SP)

; A0 / S0 = Message or Prompt (0 or 1)
; A1 = Message Address
; A2 = String #1

MOVE S0 A0 ; Copy A0 to S0
SW R0 16(SP) ; A4
SW R0 20(SP) ; A5
SW R0 24(SP) ; A6
LI A0 0x7 ; Character image (-1 for none, 0x7 for Boo)
; Visit the following link to get the full list of Character Images
; https://github.com/PartyPlanner64/PartyPlanner64/wiki/Displaying-Messages
; If you use a character image, check the bottom of the code
; Pass message address on A1
; Pass string #1 on A2
JAL ShowMessage
LI A3 0

BNEZ S0 CallMessageExit ; If displaying prompt, don't close message
NOP

JAL 0x800EC9DC
NOP
JAL MessageCleanup
NOP

CallMessageExit:
LW RA 36(SP)
LW S0 32(SP)
JR RA
ADDIU SP SP 40

;===Message Cleanup===
.align 4
MessageCleanup:
ADDIU SP SP -32
SW RA 28(SP)

; Obligatory message box closing/cleanup calls.
JAL CloseMessage
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6EC
NOP

LW RA 28(SP)
JR RA
ADDIU SP SP 32

;===Get Total Logic===
.align 4
GetTotalLogic:
ADDIU SP SP -40
SW RA 36(SP)
SW S0 32(SP)
SW S1 28(SP)

; A0 / S0 = Current Player Struct
; S1 / V0 = Logic Array

LUI S1 hi(LogicArray)
ADDIU S1 S1 lo(LogicArray)

; Pass current player struct on A0
JAL GetSmackLogic
MOVE S0 A0 ; Copy A0 to S0
SB V0 0(S1) ; Store Smack logic into logic array

JAL GetOuttaSightLogic
LBU A0 0x1D(S0) ; Pass current player index on A0
SB V0 1(S1) ; Store Outta Sight logic into logic array

JAL GetSpookLogic
LBU A0 0x1D(S0) ; Pass current player index on A0
SB V0 2(S1) ; Store Outta Sight logic into logic array

JAL GetFanSmackLogic
MOVE A0 S0 ; Pass current player struct on A0
SB V0 3(S1) ; Store Fan Smack logic into logic array

MOVE V0 S1 ; Copy S1 to V0

LW RA 36(SP)
LW S0 32(SP)
LW S1 28(SP)
JR RA
ADDIU SP SP 40

.align 4
LogicArray:
.fill 4

;===Get Smack Logic===
.align 4
GetSmackLogic:
ADDIU SP SP -40
SW RA 36(SP)
SW S0 32(SP)

; A0 / S0 = Current Player Struct
; V0 = Disable Flag (0 = Disabled, 1 = Enabled)

MOVE S0 A0 ; Copy A0 to S0

; Check if player can afford Smack
LBU A0 0x1D(S0) ; Pass current player index on A0
JAL PlayerHasCoins
LI A1 4 ; Check for 4 coins

BEQZ V0 GetSmackLogicExit ; If V0 = 0, player doesn't have coins, exit
NOP

; Check if opponents have coins
MOVE A0 S0 ; Pass current player struct on A0
LUI A1 hi(SmackLogic)
JAL TallyAllCoins
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(SmackLogic) ; Write coins to SmackLogic

BNEZL V0 GetSmackLogicExit ; If opponents have coins, enable Smack
LI V0 1 ; Enable Smack (on likely)

GetSmackLogicExit:
LW RA 36(SP)
LW S0 32(SP)
JR RA
ADDIU SP SP 40

.align 4
SmackLogic:
.fill 4

;===Tally All Coins===
.align 4
TallyAllCoins:
ADDIU SP SP -40
SW RA 36(SP)
SW S0 32(SP)

; A0 = Current Player Struct
; A1 = Logic Array
; S0 = Loop Counter
; V0 = Total Opponents' Coins

LBU T2 0x1D(A0) ; Load current player index from offset of player struct
LI S0 0 ; Start counter at 0
LI V0 0 ; Start with 0 total coins
LUI T0 hi(p1_coins)
ADDIU T0 T0 lo(p1_coins) ; Start with P1

TallyAllCoinsLoop:
BEQL T2 S0 TallyAllCoinsNext ; If checking current player, skip them
SB R0 0(A1) ; Store 0 coins into logic array (on likely)
LBU T1 1(T0) ; Load coins into T1
SB T1 0(A1) ; Store coins into logic array
ADDU V0 V0 T1 ; Add coins to total

TallyAllCoinsNext:
LI T3 3
BEQ S0 T3 TallyAllCoinsExit ; If all players checked, exit
ADDIU T0 T0 0x38 ; Add 0x38 to get next player's coins
ADDIU A1 A1 1 ; Add 1 to logic array
J TallyAllCoinsLoop
ADDIU S0 S0 1 ; Add 1 to loop counter

TallyAllCoinsExit:
LW RA 36(SP)
LW S0 32(SP)
JR RA
ADDIU SP SP 40

;===Get Outta Sight Logic===
.align 4
GetOuttaSightLogic:
ADDIU SP SP -48
SW RA 44(SP)
SW S0 40(SP)
SW S1 36(SP)
SW S2 32(SP)

; A0 / S0 = Current Player Index
; S1 = Outta Sight Logic
; S2 = Target Index
; V0 = Disable Flag (0 = Disabled, 1 = Enabled)

; Check if player can afford Outta Sight
MOVE S0 A0 ; Passing current player index on A0
JAL PlayerHasCoins
LI A1 8 ; Check for 8 coins

BEQZ V0 GetOuttaSightLogicExit ; If V0 = 0, player doesn't have coins, exit
NOP

; Check if opponents have Skeleton Key
LUI S1 hi(OuttaSightLogic)
ADDIU S1 S1 lo(OuttaSightLogic)
LI S2 0 ; Start with P1

GetOuttaSightLogicLoop:
BEQL S0 S2 GetOuttaSightLogicNext ; If current player, skip them
SB R0 0(S1) ; Store no key into Outta Sight logic (on likely)
JAL CheckKey
MOVE A0 S2 ; Pass target index on A0
SB V0 0(S1) ; Store Outta Sight logic
GetOuttaSightLogicNext:
LI T0 3
BEQ S2 T0 GetOuttaSightLogicFinish ; If all players checked, finish
NOP
ADDIU S1 S1 1 ; Add 1 to logic array
J GetOuttaSightLogicLoop
ADDIU S2 S2 1 ; Add 1 to loop counter

GetOuttaSightLogicFinish:
LUI S1 hi(OuttaSightLogic)
ADDIU S1 S1 lo(OuttaSightLogic)
LW V0 0(S1) ; Load Outta Sight logic into V0
BNEZL V0 GetOuttaSightLogicExit ; If opponents have keys, enable Outta Sight
LI V0 1 ; Enable Outta Sight (on likely)

GetOuttaSightLogicExit:
LW RA 44(SP)
LW S0 40(SP)
LW S1 36(SP)
LW S2 32(SP)
JR RA
ADDIU SP SP 48

.align 4
OuttaSightLogic:
.fill 4

;===Check Key===
.align 4
CheckKey:
ADDIU SP SP -32
SW RA 28(SP)

; A0 = Player Index
; V0 = Key Flag (0 = No Keys, 1 = Has Key)

; Pass player index on A0
JAL PlayerHasItem
LI A1 0x01 ; Skeleton Key index

ADDIU V0 V0 1 ; Add 1 to result (-1,0-2 -> 0,1-3)
BNEZL V0 CheckKeyExit ; If player has key, enable Outta Sight logic
LI V0 1 ; Enable Outta Sight logic (on likely)

CheckKeyExit:
LW RA 28(SP)
JR RA
ADDIU SP SP 32

;===Get Spook Logic===
.align 4
GetSpookLogic:
ADDIU SP SP -32
SW RA 28(SP)

; A0 = Current Player Index
; V0 = Disable Flag (0 = Disabled, 1 = Enabled)

LUI T0 hi(SpookLogic)
ADDIU T0 T0 lo(SpookLogic)
LUI T1 0x0101 ; 0x01010000
ORI T1 T1 0x0101 ; 0x01010101
SW T1 0(T0) ; Reset SpookLogic

ADDU T0 T0 A0 ; Add current player offset to Spook logic
SB R0 0(T0) ; Disable current player from Spook logic

; Pass current player index on A0
JAL PlayerHasCoins
LI A1 12 ; Check for 12 coins

LW RA 28(SP)
JR RA
ADDIU SP SP 32

.align 4
SpookLogic:
.fill 4,1

;===Get Fan Smack Logic===
.align 4
GetFanSmackLogic:
ADDIU SP SP -40
SW RA 36(SP)
SW S0 32(SP)

; A0 / S0 = Current Player Struct
; V0 = Disable Flag (0 = Disabled, 1 = Enabled)

MOVE S0 A0 ; Copy A0 to S0

; Check if player can afford Fan Smack
LBU A0 0x1D(S0) ; Pass current player index on A0
JAL PlayerHasCoins
LI A1 12 ; Check for 12 coins

BEQZ V0 GetFanSmackLogicExit ; If V0 = 0, player doesn't have coins, exit
NOP

; Check if opponents have coins
MOVE A0 S0 ; Pass current player struct on A0
LUI A1 hi(FanSmackLogic)
JAL TallyAllCoins
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(FanSmackLogic) ; Write coins to FanSmackLogic

BNEZL V0 GetFanSmackLogicExit ; If opponents have coins, enable Fan Smack
LI V0 1 ; Enable Fan Smack (on likely)

GetFanSmackLogicExit:
LW RA 36(SP)
LW S0 32(SP)
JR RA
ADDIU SP SP 40

.align 4
FanSmackLogic:
.fill 4

;===Prepare Main Prompt===
.align 4
PrepareMainPrompt:
ADDIU SP SP -32
SW RA 28(SP)

; A0 = Logic Array

; Pass logic array on A0
JAL GetPromptColours
NOP

; Print colours to prompt
LUI A0 hi(MainPromptPlaceholder)
ADDIU A0 A0 lo(MainPromptPlaceholder) ; Parse destination
LUI A1 hi(MainPrompt)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(MainPrompt) ; String formatter (%s)
MOVE A2 V0 ; Pass Smack colour pointer on A2
MOVE A3 V1 ; Pass Outta Sight colour pointer on A3
SW T2 16(SP) ; Pass Spook colour pointer on A4
SW T3 20(SP) ; Pass Fan Smack colour pointer on A5
JAL sprintf
SW R0 24(SP) ; Terminator byte

LW RA 28(SP)
JR RA
ADDIU SP SP 32

;===Get Prompt Colours===
.align 4
GetPromptColours:
ADDIU SP SP -32
SW RA 28(SP)

; A0 = Logic Array

LUI V0 hi(BlackColour)
ADDIU V0 V0 lo(BlackColour) ; Default to black font
MOVE V1 V0 ; Copy V0 to V1
MOVE T2 V0 ; Copy V0 to T2
MOVE T3 V0 ; Copy V0 to T3

LBU T0 0(A0) ; Load 0th logic into T0
BEQZ T0 GetPromptColours2 ; If T0 = 0, keep black font
NOP
; else get white font
LUI V0 hi(WhiteColour)
ADDIU V0 V0 lo(WhiteColour)

GetPromptColours2:
LBU T0 1(A0) ; Load 1st logic into T0
BEQZ T0 GetPromptColours3 ; If T0 = 0, keep black font
NOP
; else get white font
LUI V1 hi(WhiteColour)
ADDIU V1 V1 lo(WhiteColour)

GetPromptColours3:
LBU T0 2(A0) ; Load 2nd logic into T0
BEQZ T0 GetPromptColours4 ; If T0 = 0, keep black font
NOP
; else get white font
LUI T2 hi(WhiteColour)
ADDIU T2 T2 lo(WhiteColour)

GetPromptColours4:
LBU T0 3(A0) ; Load 3rd logic into T0
BEQZ T0 GetPromptColoursExit ; If T0 = 0, keep black font
NOP
; else get white font
LUI T3 hi(WhiteColour)
ADDIU T3 T3 lo(WhiteColour)

GetPromptColoursExit:
LW RA 28(SP)
JR RA
ADDIU SP SP 32

.align 4
BlackColour:
.byte 0x01,0

.align 4
WhiteColour:
.byte 0x08,0

;===Display Main Prompt===
.align 4
DisplayMainPrompt:
ADDIU SP SP -40
SW RA 36(SP)
SW S0 32(SP)

; A0 / S0 = Current Player Struct
; S0 / V0 = Prompt Choice

MOVE S0 A0 ; Copy A0 to S0
LI A0 1 ; Display prompt
LUI A1 hi(MainPromptPlaceholder)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(MainPromptPlaceholder) ; Display Mainprompt with strings
JAL CallMessage
LI A2 0 ; No string

LUI A0 hi(LogicArray)
JAL DisablePromptOptions
ADDIU A0 A0 lo(LogicArray) ; Pass Logic Array on A0

JAL MainAILogic
NOP

; Get the selection, either from the player or CPU.
; If A0 is a pointer to AI data, AI logic is ran to pick for CPUs.
; If A0 is 0 or 1, the 0th or 1st option is chosen by CPUs.
; If A0 is 2, then the value of A1 is the CPUs option index choice.
LI A0 2
JAL GetBasicPromptSelection
MOVE A1 V0 ; A1 now has the AI's decision
MOVE S0 V0 ; S0 now has the chosen option index

JAL MessageCleanup
NOP
MOVE V0 S0 ; Copy S0 to V0

LW RA 36(SP)
LW S0 32(SP)
JR RA
ADDIU SP SP 40

;===Disable Prompt Options===
.align 4
DisablePromptOptions:
ADDIU SP SP -40
SW RA 36(SP)
SW S0 32(SP)
SW S1 28(SP)

; A0 / S0 = Logic Array
; S1 = Prompt Option

MOVE S0 A0 ; Copy A0 to S0
LI S1 0 ; Start with 0th option
DisablePromptOptionsLoop:
LBU T0 0(S0) ; Load logic value into T0
BNEZ T0 DisablePromptOptionsCheck ; If not disabled, check
LI A0 2 ; Window ID
JAL DisablePromptOption
MOVE A1 S1 ; Disable nth option
DisablePromptOptionsCheck:
LI T1 3
BEQ S1 T1 DisablePromptOptionsExit ; If all options checked, exit
ADDIU S0 S0 1 ; Add 1 to get next logic
J DisablePromptOptionsLoop
ADDIU S1 S1 1 ; Add 1 to get next prompt option

DisablePromptOptionsExit:
LW RA 36(SP)
LW S0 32(SP)
LW S1 28(SP)
JR RA
ADDIU SP SP 40

;===Main Prompt AI Logic===
.align 4
MainAILogic:
ADDIU SP SP -40
SW RA 36(SP)
SW S0 32(SP)

; V0 = Prompt Choice

; Get random byte
JAL GetRand
LI A0 8 ; Get random byte (0-8) at V0
SRL V0 V0 1 ; Shift right by 1 (divide by 2, round down)

; Check logic array
LUI T0 hi(LogicArray)
ADDIU T0 T0 lo(LogicArray)
ADDU T0 T0 V0 ; Add option byte to array (0-3)

MainAILogicLoop:
LI T2 4
BEQ V0 T2 MainAILogicExit ; If V0 = 4, select exit
NOP
LBU T1 0(T0) ; Load matching logic value into T1
BNEZ T1 MainAILogicExit ; If matching logic enabled, exit
NOP
ADDIU T0 T0 1 ; Add 1 to get next logic
J MainAILogicLoop
ADDIU V0 V0 1 ; Add 1 to select next option

MainAILogicExit:
LW RA 36(SP)
LW S0 32(SP)
JR RA
ADDIU SP SP 40

;===Rain's Get Random Byte===
.align 4
GetRand: ; returns on V0

; A0 = max byte

ADDIU sp, sp, -0x18
SW ra, 0x0010 (sp)
BLTZL a0, label1_func0
SUBU a0, r0, a0
label1_func0:
BEQZ a0, End1
DADDU v0, r0, r0
ADDIU v0, r0, 0x0001
BNEL a0, v0, label2_func0
ADDIU v0, r0, 0x0064
JAL Function1
ADDIU a0, r0, 0x03E8
SLTI v0, v0, 0x01F5
J End1
XORI v0, v0, 0x0001
label2_func0:
BEQ a0, v0, label3_func0
NOP
JAL Function1
NOP
J End1
NOP
label3_func0:
JAL Function1
ADDIU a0, r0, 0x03F1
LUI v1, 0x6666
ORI v1, v1, 0x6667
MULT v0, v1
SRA v0, v0, 31
MFHI a1
SRA v1, a1, 2
SUBU v0, v1, v0
End1:
LW ra, 0x0010 (sp)
JR RA
ADDIU sp, sp, 0x18
//
Function1:
ADDIU sp, sp, -0x20
SW s0, 0x0010 (sp)
ADDIU s0, r0, 0xFFFF
SW s1, 0x0014 (sp)
ADDIU s1, a0, 0x0001
BNEZ s1, label1_func1
DIVU s0, s1
BREAK 0x01C00
label1_func1:
MFLO s0
BNEZ s0, label2_func1
SW ra, 0x0018 (sp)
ADDIU s0, r0, 0x0001
label2_func1:
JAL Function2
NOP
BNEZ s0, label3_func1
DIVU v0, s0
BREAK 0x01C00
label3_func1:
MFLO v1
SLTU v0, v1, s1
BEQZ v0, label2_func1
DADDU v0, v1, r0
LW ra, 0x0018 (sp)
LW s1, 0x0014 (sp)
LW s0, 0x0010 (sp)
JR RA
ADDIU sp, sp, 0x20
//
Function2:
LUI v0, 0x8009
LW v0, 0x7650 (v0)
LUI v1, 0x41C6
ORI v1, v1, 0x4E6D
MULT v0, v1
MFLO v0
ADDIU v0, v0, 0x3039
LUI v1, 0x8009
JR RA
SW v0, 0x7650 (v1)

;===Start Target Prompt===
.align 4
StartTargetPrompt:
ADDIU SP SP -40
SW RA 36(SP)
SW S0 32(SP)
SW S1 28(SP)

; A0 / S0 = Logic Array
; S1 / V0 = Prompt Choice

; Pass current player index on A0
JAL PrepareTargetPrompt
MOVE S0 A0 ; Passing logic array on A0

JAL GetPlayerNames ; Get player names at V0, V1, T2, T3
NOP

; Display target prompt
SW T2 16(SP) ; A4, P3 name
SW T3 20(SP) ; A5, P4 name
SW R0 24(SP) ; A6
LI A0 0x7 ; Character image (-1 for none, 0x7 for Boo)
; Visit the following link to get the full list of Character Images
; https://github.com/PartyPlanner64/PartyPlanner64/wiki/Displaying-Messages
; If you use a character image, check the bottom of the code
LUI A1 hi(TargetPromptPlaceholder)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(TargetPromptPlaceholder) ; Display TargetPrompt with strings
MOVE A2 V0 ; String #1 (P1 name)
JAL ShowMessage
MOVE A3 V1 ; String #2 (P2 name)

JAL DisablePromptOptions
MOVE A0 S0 ; Pass logic array on A0

JAL TargetPromptLogic
MOVE A0 S0 ; Pass logic array on A0

; Get the selection, either from the player or CPU.
; If A0 is a pointer to AI data, AI logic is ran to pick for CPUs.
; If A0 is 0 or 1, the 0th or 1st option is chosen by CPUs.
; If A0 is 2, then the value of A1 is the CPUs option index choice.
LI A0 2 ; Pick whatever is in A1 as AI's Choice
JAL GetBasicPromptSelection
MOVE A1 V0 ; A1 now has the AI's decision
MOVE S1 V0 ; S1 now has the chosen option index

JAL MessageCleanup
NOP

LI T0 4 ; Your choice
BNEL S1 T0 StartTargetPromptExit ; If not selecting "Your choice", exit
MOVE V0 S1 ; Copy S1 to V0
; else, decide the target

JAL TargetPromptLogic
MOVE A0 S0 ; Pass logic array on A0

StartTargetPromptExit:
LW RA 36(SP)
LW S0 32(SP)
LW S1 28(SP)
JR RA
ADDIU SP SP 40

;===Prepare Target Prompt===
.align 4
PrepareTargetPrompt:
ADDIU SP SP -32
SW RA 28(SP)

; A0 = Logic Array

; Pass logic array on A0
JAL GetPromptColours
NOP

; Print colours to prompt
LUI A0 hi(TargetPromptPlaceholder)
ADDIU A0 A0 lo(TargetPromptPlaceholder) ; Parse destination
LUI A1 hi(TargetPrompt)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(TargetPrompt) ; String formatter (%s)
MOVE A2 V0 ; Pass P1 colour pointer on A2
MOVE A3 V1 ; Pass P2 colour pointer on A3
SW T2 16(SP) ; Pass P3 colour pointer on T4
SW T3 20(SP) ; Pass P4 colour pointer on T5
JAL sprintf
SW R0 24(SP) ; Terminator byte

LW RA 28(SP)
JR RA
ADDIU SP SP 32

;===Get Player Names===
.align 4
GetPlayerNames:
ADDIU SP SP -32
SW RA 28(SP)

; V0 = P1 Name
; V1 = P2 Name
; T2 = P3 Name
; T3 = P4 Name

LUI V0 hi(p1_char)
ADDIU V0 V0 lo(p1_char)
LBU V0 0(V0) ; Load P1 character value into V0
ADDIU V0 V0 0x1C00 ; Add P1 character value to MARIO string

LUI V1 hi(p2_char)
ADDIU V1 V1 lo(p2_char)
LBU V1 0(V1) ; Load P2 character value into V1
ADDIU V1 V1 0x1C00 ; Add P2 character value to MARIO string

LUI T2 hi(p3_char)
ADDIU T2 T2 lo(p3_char)
LBU T2 0(T2) ; Load P3 character value into T2
ADDIU T2 T2 0x1C00 ; Add P3 character value to MARIO string

LUI T3 hi(p4_char)
ADDIU T3 T3 lo(p4_char)
LBU T3 0(T3) ; Load P4 character value into T3
ADDIU T3 T3 0x1C00 ; Add P4 character value to MARIO string

LW RA 28(SP)
JR RA
ADDIU SP SP 32

;===Target Prompt Logic===
.align 4
TargetPromptLogic:
ADDIU SP SP -48
SW RA 44(SP)
SW S0 40(SP)
SW S1 36(SP)
SW S2 32(SP)

; A0 / S0 = Logic Array / Target Index Counter
; S1 = Target Logic
; S2 = Loop Counter (Placement Check)
; V0 = Prompt Choice

; Store player placements
MOVE S0 A0 ; Copy A0 to S0
LUI S1 hi(TargetLogic)
ADDIU S1 S1 lo(TargetLogic)
LI S2 0 ; Start with P1
TargetPromptLogicLoop:
LBU T0 0(S0) ; Load player logic into T0
LI T4 4
BEQL T0 R0 TargetPromptLogicNext ; If player is disabled, check next
SB T4 0(S1) ; Store null placement into TargetLogic (on likely)
JAL GetPlayerPlacement 
MOVE A0 S2 ; Get player placement at V0
SB V0 0(S1) ; Store placement into TargetLogic
TargetPromptLogicNext:
LI T0 3
BEQL S2 T0 TargetPromptLogicCheck ; If all players placed, check
LI S2 0 ; Reset loop counter (on likely)
ADDIU S0 S0 1 ; Add 1 to get next logic
ADDIU S1 S1 1 ; Add 1 to store next logic
J TargetPromptLogicLoop
ADDIU S2 S2 1 ; Add 1 to check next player

; Select a target
TargetPromptLogicCheck:
LI S0 0 ; Start with P1
ADDIU S1 S1 -3 ; Reset TargetLogic
TargetPromptLogicCheckLoop:
LBU T0 0(S1) ; Load player placement into T0
BEQL S2 T0 TargetPromptLogicExit ; If placement matches, select target
MOVE V0 S0 ; Pass target index on V0 (on likely)
LI T0 3
BEQL S0 T0 TargetPromptLogicCheckReset ; If all players checked, check again
ADDIU S2 S2 1 ; Add 1 to check next placement (on likely)
ADDIU S0 S0 1 ; Add 1 to get next player
J TargetPromptLogicCheckLoop
ADDIU S1 S1 1 ; Add 1 to get next player placement

TargetPromptLogicCheckReset:
LI T0 4
BEQL S2 T0 TargetPromptLogicExit ; If all placements checked, exit
LI V0 5 ; Select exit (on likely) - failsafe
J TargetPromptLogicCheck
NOP

TargetPromptLogicExit:
LW RA 44(SP)
LW S0 40(SP)
LW S1 36(SP)
LW S2 32(SP)
JR RA
ADDIU SP SP 48

.align 4
TargetLogic:
.fill 4,4

;===Smack===
.align 4
Smack:
ADDIU SP SP -56
SW RA 52(SP)
SW S0 48(SP)
SW S1 44(SP)
SW S2 40(SP)
SW S3 36(SP)
SW S4 32(SP)

; A0 / S0 = Current Player Struct
; A1 / S1 = Target Player Index / Struct
; S2 = Current Player Placement
; S3 = Smack Chances Table / No. of Smacks
; S4 = Smack Counter

; Get struct and payment
MOVE S0 A0 ; Copy A0 to S0
JAL GetPlayerStruct
MOVE A0 A1 ; Get target player struct at V0
MOVE S1 V0 ; Copy V0 to S1

LBU A0 0x1D(S0) ; Pass current player index on A0
JAL CoinChange
LI A1 -4 ; Lose 4 coins

; Smack message
JAL PlaySound
LI A0 0x257 ; Boo laugh

LI A0 0 ; Display message
LUI A1 hi(SmackMessage)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(SmackMessage) ; Display SmackMessage
LBU A2 3(S1) ; Load target character value into A2
JAL CallMessage
ADDIU A2 A2 0x1C00 ; Add target character value to MARIO string

JAL BooFadeOut
NOP

; Get Smack chances
JAL GetPlayerPlacement
LBU A0 0x1D(S0) ; Get current player placement (0-3) at V0
MOVE S2 V0 ; Copy V0 to S2

LUI S3 hi(SmackChancesTable)
ADDIU S3 S3 lo(SmackChancesTable)
SLL T0 S2 4 ; Multiply placement by 4 (distance between tables)
ADDU S3 S3 T0 ; Add distance between chances tables

JAL GetRand
LI A0 9 ; Get random byte (0-9) at V0

LI T0 0 ; Start with 0 extra smacks
SmackChanceCheck:
LBU T3 0(S3) ; Load chance value into T3
SLT T2 V0 T3 ; If V0 < T3, T2 = 1
BNEZ T2 GetSmacks
NOP
ADDIU T0 T0 1 ; Add 1 smack
J SmackChanceCheck
ADDIU S3 S3 1 ; Add 1 to check next chance value

GetSmacks:
ADDIU S3 T0 4 ; Base number of smacks is 4
LI S4 1 ; Start smack counter at 1

; Play Smack sounds
SmackSoundLoop:
JAL PlaySound
LI A0 0x0F ; Popping sound
JAL SleepProcess
LI A0 15 ; Wait 15 frames for sound
BEQ S3 S4 SmackStealer
NOP
J SmackSoundLoop
ADDIU S4 S4 1 ; Add 1 to smack counter

SmackStealer:
JAL BooFadeIn
NOP

; Get coins per smack
LI T0 10
MULT S2 T0 ; Multiply S2 by T0
MFLO A0 ; Move result into A0
JAL RNGPercentChance
ADDIU A0 A0 10 ; Base 10% chance of double coins

MOVE A0 S0 ; Pass current player struct on A0
MOVE A1 S1 ; Pass target player struct on A1
MOVE A2 S3 ; Pass number of smacks on A2
JAL StealCoins
ADDIU A3 V0 1 ; Coins per smack (0,1 => 1,2)

LW RA 52(SP)
LW S0 48(SP)
LW S1 44(SP)
LW S2 40(SP)
LW S3 36(SP)
LW S4 32(SP)
JR RA
ADDIU SP SP 56

;===Smack 1st Chances Table===
.align 16
SmackChancesTable:
.byte 5 ; 4 smacks (50%)
.byte 8 ; 5 smacks (30%)
.byte 10 ; 6 smacks (20%)

;===Smack 2nd Chances Table===
.align 16
.byte 3 ; 4 smacks (30%)
.byte 8 ; 5 smacks (50%)
.byte 10 ; 6 smacks (20%)

;===Smack 3rd Chances Table===
.align 16
.byte 2 ; 4 smacks (20%)
.byte 7 ; 5 smacks (50%)
.byte 10 ; 6 smacks (30%)

;===Smack 4th Chances Table===
.align 16
.byte 2 ; 4 smacks (20%)
.byte 5 ; 5 smacks (30%)
.byte 10 ; 6 smacks (50%)

;===Coin Change===
.align 4
CoinChange:
ADDIU SP SP -40
SW RA 36(SP)
SW S0 32(SP)
SW S1 28(SP)

; A0 / S0 = Current Player Index
; A1 / S1 = Coins to Gain/Lose

MOVE S0 A0 ; Passing current player index on A0
JAL AdjustPlayerCoinsGradual
MOVE S1 A1 ; Passing coins to gain/lose on A1

MOVE A0 S0 ; Pass current player index on A0
JAL ShowPlayerCoinChange
MOVE A1 S1 ; Pass coins to gain/lose on A1

JAL SleepProcess
LI A0 30 ; Wait 30 frames for coin change

LW RA 36(SP)
LW S0 32(SP)
LW S1 28(SP)
JR RA
ADDIU SP SP 40

;===Boo Fade-out===
.align 4
BooFadeOut:
ADDIU SP SP -32
SW RA 28(SP)

LI A0 12 ; Boo fade-out
JAL InitFadeOut ; Fade to black
LI A1 16 ; Assigns 16 frames of fade-out

JAL SleepProcess
LI A0 17 ; Wait 17 frames for fade-out

LW RA 28(SP)
JR RA
ADDIU SP SP 32

;===Boo Fade-in===
.align 4
BooFadeIn:
ADDIU SP SP -32
SW RA 28(SP)

LI A0 12 ; Boo fade-in
JAL InitFadeIn ; Fade from black
LI A1 16 ; Assign 16 frames of fade-in

JAL SleepProcess
LI A0 17 ; Wait 17 frames for fade-in

LW RA 28(SP)
JR RA
ADDIU SP SP 32

;===Steal Coins===
.align 4
StealCoins:
ADDIU SP SP -48
SW RA 44(SP)
SW S0 40(SP)
SW S1 36(SP)
SW S2 32(SP)

; A0 / S0 = Current Player Struct
; A1 / S1 = Target Player Struct
; A2 = Number of Smacks
; A3 = Coins per Smack
; S2 = Total Coins to Lose

MOVE S0 A0 ; Copy A0 to S0
MOVE S1 A1 ; Copy A1 to S1
MULT A2 A3 ; Multiply A2 by A3
MFLO S2 ; Move the result into S2

LHU T0 0xA(S1) ; Load target coins from offset of player struct
SLT T1 T0 S2 ; If opponent coins < coins to lose, T1 = 1
BNEZL T1 StealCoinsNext
MOVE S2 T0 ; Overwrite coins to lose with all of opponent's coins (on likely)

StealCoinsNext:
LBU A0 0x1D(S1) ; Take coins from target
JAL AdjustPlayerCoinsGradual
SUBU A1 R0 S2 ; Subtract coins

LBU A0 0x1D(S1) ; Take coins from target
JAL 0x800E1F28 ; ShowPlayerCoinChangeHUD
SUBU A1 R0 S2 ; Subtract coins

LBU A0 0x1D(S0) ; Give current player coins
JAL CoinChange
MOVE A1 S2 ; Give coins

JAL HappyVoice
LBU A0 3(S0) ; Pass current player character value on A0

LW RA 44(SP)
LW S0 40(SP)
LW S1 36(SP)
LW S2 32(SP)
JR RA
ADDIU SP SP 48

;===Happy Voice===
.align 4
HappyVoice:
ADDIU SP SP -32
SW RA 28(SP)

; A0 = Character Value

JAL PlaySound
ADDIU A0 A0 0x2BE ; Add character value to Mario's happy voice
; Character voices are their "character value" distance away from
; Mario's, e.g. Luigi's character value = 1, so Luigi's happy voice
; is 1 away from Mario's.
; 0x2BE = Happy Voice, 0x287 = Sad Voice

LI A0 -1 ; Set current player
LI A1 5 ; Set joy animation
JAL SetBoardPlayerAnimation
LI A2 0 ; Do not loop animation

JAL SleepProcess
LI A0 40 ; Wait 40 frames for animation

LW RA 28(SP)
JR RA
ADDIU SP SP 32

;===Outta Sight===
.align 4
OuttaSight:
ADDIU SP SP -40
SW RA 36(SP)
SW S0 32(SP)

; A0 = Current Player Index
; A1 / S0 = Target Player Index / Struct

; Get struct and payment
MOVE S0 A1 ; Copy A1 to S0
; Pass current player index on A0
JAL CoinChange
LI A1 -8 ; Lose 8 coins

JAL GetPlayerStruct
MOVE A0 S0 ; Get target player struct at V0
MOVE S0 V0 ; Copy V0 to S0

; Outta Sight message
JAL PlaySound
LI A0 0x257 ; Boo laugh

LI A0 0 ; Display message
LUI A1 hi(OuttaSightMessage)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(OuttaSightMessage)
LBU A2 3(S0) ; Load target character value into A2
JAL CallMessage
ADDIU A2 A2 0x1C00 ; Add target character value to MARIO string

JAL BooFadeOut
NOP

; Remove key
LBU A0 0x1D(S0) ; Pass target player index on A0
JAL PlayerHasItem
LI A1 0x01 ; Check for Skeleton Key

ADDU V0 S0 V0 ; Add item slot offset to player struct
LI T0 0xFF ; No item index
SB T0 0x18(V0) ; Delete item from offset of player struct

JAL FixUpPlayerItemSlots
LBU A0 0x1D(S0) ; Pass target player index on A0
JAL FixUpPlayerItemSlots
LBU A0 0x1D(S0) ; Pass target player index on A0
JAL RefreshHUD
LBU A0 0x1D(S0) ; Pass target player index on A0

JAL PlaySound
LI A0 0x25E ; Boo cry

JAL SleepProcess
LI A0 10 ; Wait 10 frames for sound

LBU A0 3(S0) ; Load target character value into A0
JAL PlaySound
ADDIU A0 A0 0x287 ; Add character value to Mario's sad voice
; Character voices are their "character value" distance away from
; Mario's, e.g. Luigi's character value = 1, so Luigi's happy voice
; is 1 away from Mario's.
; 0x2BE = Happy Voice, 0x287 = Sad Voice

JAL SleepProcess
LI A0 30 ; Wait 30 frames for sound

JAL BooFadeIn
NOP

LW RA 36(SP)
LW S0 32(SP)
JR RA
ADDIU SP SP 40

;===Spook===
.align 4
Spook:
ADDIU SP SP -40
SW RA 36(SP)
SW S0 32(SP)

; A0 = Current Player Index
; A1 / S0 = Target Player Index / Struct

; Get struct and payment
MOVE S0 A1 ; Copy A1 to S0
; Pass current player index on A0
JAL CoinChange
LI A1 -12 ; Subtract 12 coins

JAL GetPlayerStruct
MOVE A0 S0 ; Get target player struct at V0
MOVE S0 V0 ; Copy V0 to S0

; Spook message
JAL PlaySound
LI A0 0x257 ; Boo laugh

LI A0 0 ; Display message
LUI A1 hi(SpookMessage)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(SpookMessage) ; Display SpookMessage
LBU A2 3(S0) ; Load target character value into A2
JAL CallMessage
ADDIU A2 A2 0x1C00 ; Add target character value to MARIO string

JAL BooFadeOut
NOP

; Spook the target
LUI T0 0x800C ; 0x800C0000
ORI T0 T0 0xD096 ; 0x800CD096, Item Curse Address
LBU T1 0x1D(S0) ; Load target player index into T1
ADDU T0 T0 T1 ; Add to get target player's flag
LI T2 2 ; Spook flag
SB T2 0(T0) ; Store Spook flag

JAL PlaySound
LI A0 0x25E ; Boo cry

JAL SleepProcess
LI A0 10 ; Wait 10 frames for sound

LBU A0 3(S0) ; Load target character value into A0
JAL PlaySound
ADDIU A0 A0 0x287 ; Add character value to Mario's sad voice
; Character voices are their "character value" distance away from
; Mario's, e.g. Luigi's character value = 1, so Luigi's happy voice
; is 1 away from Mario's.
; 0x2BE = Happy Voice, 0x287 = Sad Voice

JAL SleepProcess
LI A0 30 ; Wait 30 frames for sound

JAL BooFadeIn
NOP

LW RA 36(SP)
LW S0 32(SP)
JR RA
ADDIU SP SP 40

;===Fan Smack===
.align 4
FanSmack:
ADDIU SP SP -48
SW RA 44(SP)
SW S0 40(SP)
SW S1 36(SP)
SW S2 32(SP)
SW S3 28(SP)

; A0 / S0 = Current Player Struct
; A1 / S1 = Target Player Index / Struct
; S2 = Fan Smack Chances Table / Coins per Smack
; S3 = Smack Counter

; Get struct and payment
MOVE S0 A0 ; Copy A0 to S0
JAL GetPlayerStruct
MOVE A0 A1 ; Get target player struct at V0
MOVE S1 V0 ; Copy V0 to S1

LBU A0 0x1D(S0) ; Pass current player index on A0
JAL CoinChange
LI A1 -12 ; Lose 12 coins

; Fan Smack message
JAL PlaySound
LI A0 0x257 ; Boo laugh

LI A0 0 ; Display message
LUI A1 hi(FanSmackMessage)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(FanSmackMessage)
LBU A2 3(S1) ; Load target character value into A2
JAL CallMessage
ADDIU A2 A2 0x1C00 ; Add target character value to MARIO string

JAL BooFadeOut
NOP

; Get Fan Smack chances
JAL GetPlayerPlacement
LBU A0 0x1D(S0) ; Get current player placement (0-3) at V0

LUI S2 hi(FanSmackChancesTable)
ADDIU S2 S2 lo(FanSmackChancesTable)
SLL V0 V0 4 ; Multiply placement by 16 (distance between tables)
ADDU S2 S2 V0 ; Add distance between chances tables

JAL GetRand
LI A0 99 ; Get random byte from 0-99 at V0

LI T2 2 ; Base 2 coins per smack
FanSmackChanceCheck:
LBU T1 0(S2) ; Load chance value into T1
SLT T0 V0 T1 ; If V0 < T1, T0 = 1
BNEZ T0 GetFanSmacks
NOP
ADDIU T2 T2 1 ; Add 1 coin per smack
J FanSmackChanceCheck
ADDIU S2 S2 1 ; Add 1 to check next chance value

GetFanSmacks:
MOVE S2 T2 ; Copy T2 to S2
LI S3 1 ; Start smack counter at 1

; Play Fan Smack sounds
FanSmackSoundLoop:
JAL PlaySound
LI A0 0x0F ; Popping sound
JAL SleepProcess
LI A0 15 ; Wait 15 frames for sound
LI T0 5
BEQ S3 T0 FanSmackStealer ; If all 5 smacks done, steal coins
NOP
J FanSmackSoundLoop
ADDIU S3 S3 1 ; Add 1 to smack counter

FanSmackStealer:
JAL BooFadeIn
NOP

; Get coins per smack
MOVE A0 S0 ; Pass current player struct on A0
MOVE A1 S1 ; Pass target player struct on A1
LI A2 5 ; Pass no. of smacks (5) on A2
JAL StealCoins
MOVE A3 S2 ; Pass coins per smack on A3

LW RA 44(SP)
LW S0 40(SP)
LW S1 36(SP)
LW S2 32(SP)
LW S3 28(SP)
JR RA
ADDIU SP SP 48

Lady Bow v2 (Chocolate).code:
; NAME: Lady Bow v2 (Chocolate)
; GAMES: MP3_USA
; EXECUTION: Direct
; PARAM: Space|LadyBowSpace

;===Main Function===
.align 4
Main:
ADDIU SP SP -40
SW RA 36(SP)
SW S0 32(SP)

; S0 = Current Player Struct

; Get current player struct
JAL GetPlayerStruct
LI A0 -1 ; Get current player struct at V0
MOVE S0 V0 ; Copy V0 to S0

; Setup passing prereqs (hide dice roll, idle animation, rotation)
JAL PassingPrereqs
MOVE A0 S0 ; Pass current player struct on A0

; Call Lady Bow from pointer
LUI T0 0x800C ; 0x800C0000
ORI T0 T0 0xD0A4 ; 0x800CD0A4, Lady Bow Pointer Address
LW T0 0(T0) ; Load Lady Bow pointer into T0
JALR T0 ; Call Lady Bow function
MOVE A0 S0 ; Pass current player struct on A0

; Show dice roll
JAL 0x800DB884 ; ShowDiceRoll
LBU A0 0x1D(S0) ; Pass current player index on A0
JAL SleepProcess
LI A0 10 ; Wait 10 frames for dice roll to show

LW RA 36(SP)
LW S0 32(SP)
JR RA
ADDIU SP SP 40

;===Passing Event Prereqs===
.align 4
PassingPrereqs:
ADDIU SP SP -32
SW RA 28(SP)

; A0 = Current Player Struct

; Hide dice roll
JAL 0x800DBEC0 ; HideDiceRoll
LBU A0 0x1D(A0) ; Pass current player index on A0

; Set player idle animation
LI A0 -1 ; Set current player
LI A1 -1 ; Set idle animation
JAL SetBoardPlayerAnimation
LI A2 2 ; Loop the animation

; Rotate toward Lady Bow Space
LI A0 -1 ; Set current player
LI A1 8 ; Rotate in 8 frames
JAL RotatePlayerModel
LI A2 LadyBowSpace ; Face LadyBowSpace

LW RA 28(SP)
JR RA
ADDIU SP SP 32

Prize Exchange v3.1 (Chocolate).code:
; NAME: Prize Exchange v3.1 (Chocolate)
; GAMES: MP3_USA
; EXECUTION: Direct
; PARAM: Space|PrizeExchange

;===Main Function===
.align 4
Main:
ADDIU SP SP -40
SW RA 36(SP)
SW S0 32(SP)

; S0 = Current Player Struct

; Hide dice roll
JAL GetPlayerStruct
LI A0 -1 ; Get current player struct at V0
MOVE S0 V0 ; Copy V0 to S0

JAL 0x800DBEC0 ; HideDiceRoll
LBU A0 0x1D(S0) ; Pass current player index on A0

; Set player idle animation
LI A0 -1 ; Set current player
LI A1 -1 ; Set idle animation
JAL SetBoardPlayerAnimation
LI A2 2 ; Loop the animation

; Rotate toward Prize Exchange
LI A0 -1 ; Set current player
LI A1 8 ; Rotate in 8 frames
JAL RotatePlayerModel
LI A2 PrizeExchange ; Face PrizeExchange

; Call Prize Exchange
LUI T0 hi(StartPrizeExchange)
ADDIU T0 T0 lo(StartPrizeExchange)
LUI T1 0x800C ; 0x800C0000
ORI T1 T1 0xD0A0 ; 0x800CD0A0, Prize Exchange Pointer Address
SW T0 0(T1) ; Store Prize Exchange pointer

MOVE A0 S0 ; Pass current player struct on A0
JALR T0 ; Call Prize Exchange function
LI A1 PrizeExchange ; Pass PrizeExchange on A1

; Show dice roll
JAL 0x800DB884 ; ShowDiceRoll
LBU A0 0x1D(S0) ; Pass current player index on A0

JAL SleepProcess
LI A0 10 ; Wait 10 frames for dice roll to show

LW RA 36(SP)
LW S0 32(SP)
JR RA
ADDIU SP SP 40

;===Start Prize Exchange===
.align 4
StartPrizeExchange:
ADDIU SP SP -80
SW RA 76(SP)
SW S0 72(SP)
SW S1 68(SP)
SW S2 64(SP)
SW S3 60(SP)
SW S4 56(SP)
SW S5 52(SP)

; A0 / S0 = Current Player Struct
; S1 = Prompt Choice
; S2 = First Key Item Slot
; S3 = Offset Player Struct for Key Item Slot
; S4 = Offset Player Struct for 2nd Key Item Slot / Player's Stars
; A1 / S5 = Star Space

MOVE S0 A0 ; Copy A0 to S0
MOVE S5 A1 ; Copy A1 to S5
JAL PlaySound
LI A0 0x257 ; Boo laugh

LUI A0 hi(WelcomeMessage)
JAL CallMessage
ADDIU A0 A0 lo(WelcomeMessage) ; Display WelcomeMessage

;===Check for Skeleton Key===
LBU A0 0x1D(S0) ; Pass current player index on A0
JAL PlayerHasItem
LI A1 0x01 ; Check for Skeleton Key

BLTZ V0 BadExit ; If V0 < 0 (no key), go to BadExit
NOP
MOVE S2 V0 ; Copy V0 to S2

;===Main Prompt===
MainPrompt:
SW R0 16(SP) ; A4
SW R0 20(SP) ; A5
SW R0 24(SP) ; A6
LI A0 0x7 ; Character image (-1 for none, 0x7 for Boo)
; Visit the following link to get the full list of Character Images
; https://github.com/PartyPlanner64/PartyPlanner64/wiki/Displaying-Messages
; If you use a character image, check the bottom of the code
LUI A1 hi(Prompt)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(Prompt) ; Display Prompt
LI A2 0
JAL ShowMessage
LI A3 0

JAL AILogic ; Returns AI's choice at V0
MOVE A0 S0 ; Pass current player struct on A0

; Get the selection, either from the player or CPU.
; If A0 is a pointer to AI data, AI logic is ran to pick for CPUs.
; If A0 is 0 or 1, the 0th or 1st option is chosen by CPUs.
; If A0 is 2, then the value of A1 is the CPU's option index choice.
LI A0 2
JAL GetBasicPromptSelection
MOVE A1 V0 ; A1 now has the AI's decision
MOVE S1 V0 ; S1 now has the chosen option index

; Obligatory message box closing/cleanup calls.
JAL CloseMessage
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6EC
NOP

; Change the player's destination based on the choice.
BEQZ S1 GetCoins
NOP
LI T0 1
BEQ S1 T0 GetMushrooms
NOP
LI T0 2
BEQ S1 T0 GetStar
NOP
LI T0 3
BEQ S1 T0 exit
NOP
; else pick "View map"
JAL ViewBoardMap
NOP
J MainPrompt
NOP

;===Get Coins===
GetCoins:
LI T0 0xFF ; No item index
ADDU S3 S0 S2 ; Add key slot offset to player struct
SB T0 0x18(S3) ; Store no item index into key slot

JAL FixUpPlayerItemSlots
LBU A0 0x1D(S0) ; Pass current player index on A0
JAL FixUpPlayerItemSlots
LBU A0 0x1D(S0) ; Pass current player index on A0
JAL RefreshHUD
LBU A0 0x1D(S0) ; Pass current player index on A0

LBU A0 0x1D(S0) ; Give current player coins
JAL AdjustPlayerCoinsGradual
LI A1 10 ; Give 10 coins

LBU A0 0x1D(S0) ; Give current player coins
JAL ShowPlayerCoinChange
LI A1 10 ; Give 10 coins

J HappyVoice
NOP

;===Get Mushrooms===
GetMushrooms:
MOVE S3 S0 ; Copy S0 to S3
LI T1 0x01 ; Skeleton Key index
LBU T0 0x18(S3) ; Load item #1 from offset of player struct
BEQ T0 T1 GetMushrooms1
NOP
ADDIU S3 S3 1 ; Add 1 to check next item slot
LBU T0 0x18(S3) ; Load item #2 from offset of player struct
BEQ T0 T1 GetMushrooms2
NOP
; else, player does not have two keys
J FailedCheck
NOP

GetMushrooms1:
ADDIU S4 S3 1 ; Add 1 to check next item slot (preserve S3)
LBU T0 0x18(S4) ; Load item #2 from offset of player struct
BEQ T0 T1 ReceiveMushrooms
NOP
ADDIU S4 S4 1 ; Add 1 to check next item slot
LBU T0 0x18(S4) ; Load item #3 from offset of player struct
BEQ T0 T1 ReceiveMushrooms
NOP
; else, player does not have two keys
J FailedCheck
NOP

GetMushrooms2:
ADDIU S4 S3 1 ; Add 1 to check next item slot (preserve S3)
LBU T0 0x18(S4) ; Load item #3 from offset of player struct
BEQ T0 T1 ReceiveMushrooms
NOP
; else, player does not have two keys

;===Failed Check===
FailedCheck:
JAL PlaySound
LI A0 0x25E ; Boo cry

LUI A0 hi(FailedCheckMessage)
JAL CallMessage
ADDIU A0 A0 lo(FailedCheckMessage) ; Display FailedCheckMessage

J MainPrompt
NOP

;===Receive Mushrooms===
ReceiveMushrooms:
LI T0 0x0A ; Golden Mushroom index
SB T0 0x18(S3) ; Store Golden Mushroom into 1st key slot
SB T0 0x18(S4) ; Store Golden Mushroom into 2nd key slot

JAL PlaySound
LI A0 0x11 ; Mushroom sound

JAL RefreshHUD
LBU A0 0x1D(S0) ; Pass current player index on A0

JAL SleepProcess
LI A0 20 ; Wait 20 frames for sound

;===Play Happy Voice and Animation===
HappyVoice:
LBU A0 3(S0) ; Load character value from offset of player struct
JAL PlaySound
ADDIU A0 A0 0x2BE ; Add character value to Mario's happy voice
; Character voices are their "character value" distance away from
; Mario's, e.g. Luigi's character value = 1, so Luigi's happy voice
; is 1 away from Mario's.
; 0x2BE = Happy Voice, 0x287 = Sad Voice

LI A0 -1 ; Set current player
LI A1 5 ; Set joy animation
JAL SetBoardPlayerAnimation
LI A2 0 ; Do not loop animation

JAL SleepProcess
LI A0 40 ; Wait 40 frames for animation

J GoodExit
NOP

;===Get Star===
GetStar:
LI T1 0x01 ; Skeleton Key index
LBU T0 0x18(S0) ; Load item #1 from offset of player struct
BNE T0 T1 FailedCheck
NOP
LBU T0 0x19(S0) ; Load item #2 from offset of player struct
BNE T0 T1 FailedCheck
NOP
LBU T0 0x1A(S0) ; Load item #3 from offset of player struct
BNE T0 T1 FailedCheck
NOP
; else, player has three keys

;===Check for Max Stars===
LI T0 99
LBU S4 0xE(S0) ; Load player stars into S4
BEQ S4 T0 MaxStars ; If S4 = T0, go to MaxStars
NOP

;===Remove Keys and Receive Star===
LI T0 0xFF ; No item index
SB T0 0x18(S0) ; Store no item into item slot #1
SB T0 0x19(S0) ; Store no item into item slot #2
SB T0 0x1A(S0) ; Store no item into item slot #3

JAL RefreshHUD
LBU A0 0x1D(S0) ; Pass current player index on A0

;===Prepare Star Coords===
JAL GetSpaceData
MOVE A0 S5 ; Get star space data at V0

LUI A0 hi(StarCoords)
ADDIU A0 A0 lo(StarCoords) ; Pass pointer to star coords
ADDIU A0 A0 12 ; Pass pointer to star coords on A0
JAL 0x80089A20 ; StoreCoords
ADDIU A1 V0 8 ; Pass space coords on A1

;===Get Star===
LUI A0 hi(StarCoords)
JAL 0x80106A9C ; GetStar
ADDIU A0 A0 lo(StarCoords) ; Pass star coords on A0

JAL SleepProcess
LI A0 30 ; Wait 30 frames for fanfare and animation

JAL GetBoardAudioIndex
NOP
JAL PlayMusic
MOVE A0 V0 ; Play board's music

;===Good Exit Message===
GoodExit:
JAL PlaySound
LI A0 0x257 ; Boo laugh

LUI A0 hi(GoodExitMessage)
JAL CallMessage
ADDIU A0 A0 lo(GoodExitMessage) ; Display GoodExitMessage

J exit
NOP

;===Max Stars Message===
MaxStars:
JAL PlaySound
LI A0 0x25E ; Boo cry

LUI A0 hi(MaxStarsMessage)
JAL CallMessage
ADDIU A0 A0 lo(MaxStarsMessage) ; Display MaxStarsMessage

J MainPrompt
NOP

;===Bad Exit Message===
BadExit:
JAL PlaySound
LI A0 0x25E ; Boo cry

LUI A0 hi(BadExitMessage)
JAL CallMessage
ADDIU A0 A0 lo(BadExitMessage) ; Display BadExitMessage

exit:
LW RA 76(SP)
LW S0 72(SP)
LW S1 68(SP)
LW S2 64(SP)
LW S3 60(SP)
LW S4 56(SP)
LW S5 52(SP)
JR RA
ADDIU SP SP 80

;===Mini Func to Call Message===
.align 4
CallMessage:
ADDIU SP SP -40
SW RA 36(SP)

; A0 = Message Address

MOVE A1 A0 ; Copy A0 to A1
SW R0 16(SP) ; A4
SW R0 20(SP) ; A5
SW R0 24(SP) ; A6
LI A0 0x7 ; Character image (-1 for none, 0x7 for Boo)
; Visit the following link to get the full list of Character Images
; https://github.com/PartyPlanner64/PartyPlanner64/wiki/Displaying-Messages
; If you use a character image, check the bottom of the code
LI A2 0
JAL ShowMessage
LI A3 0

; Obligatory message box closing/cleanup calls.
JAL 0x800EC9DC
NOP
JAL CloseMessage
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6EC
NOP

LW RA 36(SP)
JR RA
ADDIU SP SP 40

;===Mini Func to Determine AI Logic===
.align 4
AILogic:
ADDIU SP SP -40
SW RA 36(SP)

; A0 = Current Player Struct

LI T2 0 ; Set tally to 0
LI T1 0x01 ; Skeleton Key index

LBU T0 0x18(A0) ; Load item #1 from offset of player struct
BEQL T0 T1 AILogic2 ; If item #1 isn't Skeleton Key, go to AILogic2
ADDIU T2 T2 1 ; If T0 = T1, add 1 to tally (on likely)

AILogic2:
LBU T0 0x19(A0) ; Load item #2 from offset of player struct
BEQL T0 T1 AILogic3 ; If item #2 isn't Skeleton Key, go to AILogic3
ADDIU T2 T2 1 ; If T0 = T1, add 1 to tally (on likely)

AILogic3:
LBU T0 0x1A(A0) ; Load item #3 from offset of player struct
BEQL T0 T1 CheckTally ; If item #3 isn't Skeleton Key, go to CheckTally
ADDIU T2 T2 1 ; If T0 = T1, add 1 to tally (on likely)

CheckTally:
BEQL T2 R0 AILogicExit ; If T2 = 0, select exit
LI V0 3 ; AI will select 3rd option (exit)
LI T0 3
BEQ T0 T2 SelectStar ; If T2 = 3, select star
NOP
LI T0 2
BEQ T0 T2 ThreeWays ; If T2 = 2, go to ThreeWays
NOP
; else T2 = 1, CPU has 1 Key
JAL RNGPercentChance
LI A0 50 ; 50% chance of V0 = 1
BNEZ V0 AILogicExit ; If V0 = 1, select exit
LI V0 3 ; AI will select 3rd option (exit)
; else, V0 = 0, AI will select 0th option (coins)
J AILogicExit
LI V0 0 ; AI will select 0th option (coins)

ThreeWays:
JAL RNGPercentChance
LI A0 33 ; 33% chance of V0 = 1
BNEZ V0 AILogicExit ; If V0 = 1, select exit
LI V0 3 ; AI will select 3rd option (exit)

JAL RNGPercentChance
LI A0 50 ; 50% chance of V0 = 1
J AILogicExit ; AI will select 0th or 1st option (coins or mushrooms)
NOP

SelectStar:
LI T1 99
LBU T0 0xE(A0) ; Load player stars into T0
BEQ T0 T1 ThreeWays ; If CPU has max stars, pick another option
NOP
LI V0 2 ; AI will select 2nd option (star)

AILogicExit:
LW RA 36(SP)
JR RA
ADDIU SP SP 40

;===Star Coords===
.align 32
StarCoords:
.word 0x8012EA10 ; Star model
.word 0x80134E20 ; Star model
.word 0x0A020008 ; Star model
.word 0x00000000 ; X coords
.word 0x00000000 ; Y coords
.word 0x00000000 ; Z coords

;===Message Text===
.align 16
WelcomeMessage:
.byte 0x1A,0x1A,0x1A,0x1A ; Padding for character image
.ascii "Welcome to the prize exchange"
.byte 0xC2 ; Exclamation mark (!)
.byte 0xFF,0 ; Wait, press A to confirm

.align 16
Prompt:
.byte 0x1A,0x1A,0x1A,0x1A ; Padding for character image
.ascii "What will you do"
.byte 0xC3 ; Question mark (?)
.byte 0x0A,0x0A ; Two new lines
.byte 0x1A,0x1A,0x1A,0x1A,0x1A,0x1A ; Character image + option indent
.byte 0x0C ; Start option
.ascii "Trade in for"
.byte 0x07 ; Yellow font
.ascii " 10 coins"
.byte 0x08,0x0D ; White font, End option
.byte 0x0A ; New line
.byte 0x1A,0x1A,0x1A,0x1A,0x1A,0x1A ; Character image + option indent
.byte 0x0C ; Start option
.ascii "Trade in for"
.byte 0x06 ; Blue font
.ascii " Golden Mushrooms"
.byte 0x08,0x0D ; White font, End option
.byte 0x0A ; New line
.byte 0x1A,0x1A,0x1A,0x1A,0x1A,0x1A ; Character image + option indent
.byte 0x0C ; Start option
.ascii "Trade in for a"
.byte 0x07 ; Yellow font
.ascii " Star"
.byte 0x08,0x0D ; White font, End option
.byte 0x0A ; New line
.byte 0x1A,0x1A,0x1A,0x1A,0x1A,0x1A ; Character image + option indent
.byte 0x0C ; Start option
.ascii "Nothing for now"
.byte 0x0D ; End option
.byte 0x0A ; New line
.byte 0x1A,0x1A,0x1A,0x1A,0x1A,0x1A ; Character image + option indent
.byte 0x0C ; Start option
.ascii "View map"
.byte 0x0D ; End option
.byte 0 ; End prompt

.align 16
FailedCheckMessage:
.byte 0x1A,0x1A,0x1A,0x1A ; Padding for character image
.ascii "You don"
.byte 0x5C ; Apostrophe (')
.ascii "t have enough"
.byte 0x06 ; Blue font
.ascii " tickets"
.byte 0x08 ; White font
.ascii " for that option"
.byte 0xC2 ; Exclamation mark (!)
.byte 0x0A,0x1A,0x1A,0x1A,0x1A ; New line + character image padding
.ascii "Collect more"
.byte 0x06 ; Blue font
.ascii " Skeleton Keys"
.byte 0x08 ; White font
.ascii " first"
.byte 0x85 ; Period (.)
.byte 0xFF,0 ; Wait, press A to confirm

.align 16
GoodExitMessage:
.byte 0x1A,0x1A,0x1A,0x1A ; Padding for character image
.ascii "Thank you for your patronage"
.byte 0xC2 ; Exclamation mark (!)
.byte 0x0A,0x1A,0x1A,0x1A,0x1A ; New line + character image padding
.ascii "Hope you have fun at"
.byte 0x04 ; Purple font
.ascii " King Boo Carnival"
.byte 0x08,0xC2 ; White font, Exclamation mark (!)
.byte 0xFF,0 ; Wait, press A to confirm

.align 16
MaxStarsMessage:

.ascii "You can"
.byte 0x5C ; Apostrophe (')
.ascii "t carry any more"
.byte 0x07 ; Yellow font
.ascii " Stars"
.byte 0x08,0xC2 ; Exclamation mark (!)
.byte 0x0A,0x1A,0x1A,0x1A,0x1A ; New line + character image padding
.ascii "Please choose another option"
.byte 0xC2 ; Exclamation mark (!)
.byte 0xFF,0 ; Wait, press A to confirm

.align 16
BadExitMessage:
.byte 0x1A,0x1A,0x1A,0x1A ; Padding for character image
.ascii "You don"
.byte 0x5C ; Apostrophe (')
.ascii "t have any"
.byte 0x06 ; Blue font

.byte 0x0A,0x1A,0x1A,0x1A,0x1A ; New line + character image padding

.ascii "ve collected"
.byte 0x0A,0x1A,0x1A,0x1A,0x1A ; New line + character image padding
.ascii "a"

.byte 0x08,0x85 ; White font, Period (.)
.ascii "You can"
.byte 0x0A,0x1A,0x1A,0x1A,0x1A ; New line + character image padding
.ascii "trade them here for"
.byte 0x07 ; Yellow font
.ascii " prizes"
.byte 0x08,0xC2 ; White font, Exclamation mark (!)
.byte 0xFF,0 ; Wait, press A to confirm
