Ticket Booth v3.1 (Chocolate).code:
; NAME: Ticket Booth v3.1 (Chocolate)
; GAMES: MP3_USA
; EXECUTION: Direct
; PARAM: Space|TicketBooth

ADDIU SP SP -40
SW RA 36(SP)
SW S0 32(SP)
SW S1 28(SP)

; S0 = Current Player Struct
; S1 = Empty Item Slot Offset of Player Struct / Bad Exit Message

;===Hide Dice Roll===
JAL GetPlayerStruct
LI A0 -1 ; Get current player struct
MOVE S0 V0 ; Copy V0 to S0
MOVE S1 S0 ; Copy S0 to S1

JAL 0x800DBEC0 ; HideDiceRoll
LBU A0 0x1D(S0) ; Pass current player index on A0

;===Set Player Idle Animation===
LI A0 -1 ; Set current player
LI A1 -1 ; Set idle animation
JAL SetBoardPlayerAnimation
LI A2 2 ; Loop the animation

;===Rotate Toward Ticket Booth===
LI A0 -1 ; Set current player
LI A1 8 ; Rotate in 8 frames
JAL RotatePlayerModel
LI A2 TicketBooth ; Face TicketBooth

;===Check for Empty Item Slot===
JAL PlayerHasEmptyItemSlot
LBU A0 0x1D(S0) ; Pass current player index on A0

BLTZ V0 TooManyItems ; If V0 < 0, go to TooManyItems
NOP
MOVE S1 V0 ; Copy V0 to S1

;===Check If Player Has Key===
EmptySlot:
LBU A0 0x1D(S0) ; Pass current player index on A0
JAL PlayerHasItem
LI A1 0x01 ; Check for Skeleton Key

ADDIU V0 V0 1 ; Add 1 to correct
BGTZ V0 HasKey ; If V0 > 0, player already has key
NOP

; 0x00 = Mushroom
; 0x01 = Skeleton Key
; 0x02 = Poison Mushroom
; 0x03 = Reverse Mushroom
; 0x04 = Cellular Shopper
; 0x05 = Warp Block
; 0x06 = Plunder Chest
; 0x07 = Bowser Phone
; 0x08 = Dueling Glove
; 0x09 = Lucky Lamp
; 0x0A = Golden Mushroom
; 0x0B = Boo Bell
; 0x0C = Boo Repellant
; 0x0D = Bowser Suit
; 0x0E = Magic Lamp
; 0x0F = Koopa Card
; 0x10 = Barter Box
; 0x11 = Lucky Coin
; 0x12 = Wacky Watch

;===Check Player Coins===
LBU A0 0x1D(S0) ; Pass current player index on A0
JAL PlayerHasCoins ; If player has enough coins, V0 = 1
LI A1 10 ; Check if player has 10 coins

BEQZ V0 NotEnoughCoins ; If V0 = 0, player does not have enough coins
NOP
; else, player can pay for key

;===Ticket Booth Message===
JAL PlaySound
LI A0 0x257 ; Boo laugh
; Use the Audio Player on PP64 to find other sound indexes to use
; Then use the following link to know what Sound Index you need
; https://pastebin.com/H1jxNFqr

LUI A0 hi(TicketBoothMessage)
JAL CallMessage
ADDIU A0 A0 lo(TicketBoothMessage) ; Display TicketBoothMessage

;===Take Coins===
LBU A0 0x1D(S0) ; Take coins from current player
JAL AdjustPlayerCoinsGradual
LI A1 -10 ; Subtract 10 coins

LBU A0 0x1D(S0) ; Take coins from current player
JAL ShowPlayerCoinChange
LI A1 -10 ; Subtract 10 coins

JAL SleepProcess
LI A0 30 ; Wait 30 frames for coin change

;===Get Key===
LI T0 0x01 ; T0 has Skeleton Key value
ADDU S1 S0 S1 ; Add empty slot offset to player struct
SB T0 0x18(S1) ; Store T0 into empty item slot offset from player struct

JAL PlaySound
LI A0 0x10C ; Turn Start sound

JAL SleepProcess
LI A0 10 ; Wait 10 frames for sound

LBU T0 0x1E(S0) ; Load ticket star from offset of player struct
ADDIU T0 T0 1 ; Add 1 to ticket star
SB T0 0x1E(S0) ; Store ticket star into offset of player struct

J exit
NOP

;===Too Many Items Message===
TooManyItems:
LUI S1 hi(TooManyItemsMessage)
J BadExit
ADDIU S1 S1 lo(TooManyItemsMessage) ; Display TooManyItemsMessage

;===Player Has Key Message===
HasKey:
LUI S1 hi(HasKeyMessage)
J BadExit
ADDIU S1 S1 lo(HasKeyMessage) ; Display HasKeyMessage

;===Not Enough Coins Message===
NotEnoughCoins:
LUI S1 hi(NoCoinsMessage)
ADDIU S1 S1 lo(NoCoinsMessage) ; Display NoCoinsMessage

BadExit:
JAL PlaySound
LI A0 0x25E ; Boo cry

JAL CallMessage
MOVE A0 S1 ; Pass message address on A0

exit:
JAL 0x800DB884 ; ShowDiceRoll
LBU A0 0x1D(S0) ; Pass current player index on A0

JAL SleepProcess
LI A0 10 ; Wait 10 frames for dice roll to show

LW RA 36(SP)
LW S0 32(SP)
LW S1 28(SP)
JR RA
ADDIU SP SP 40

;===Mini Func to Call Message===
.align 4
CallMessage:
ADDIU SP SP -40
SW RA 36(SP)

; A0 = Message Address

MOVE A1 A0 ; Copy A0 to A1
SW R0 16(SP) ; A4
SW R0 20(SP) ; A5
SW R0 24(SP) ; A6
LI A0 0x7 ; Character image (-1 for none, 0x7 for Boo)
; Visit the following link to get the full list of Character Images
; https://github.com/PartyPlanner64/PartyPlanner64/wiki/Displaying-Messages
; If you use a character image, check the bottom of the code
LI A2 0
JAL ShowMessage
LI A3 0

; Obligatory message box closing/cleanup calls.
JAL 0x800EC9DC
NOP
JAL CloseMessage
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6EC
NOP

LW RA 36(SP)
JR RA
ADDIU SP SP 40

;===Message Text===
.align 16
TicketBoothMessage:
.byte 0x1A,0x1A,0x1A,0x1A ; Padding for character image
.ascii "Welcome to King Boo Carnival"
.byte 0xC2 ; Exclamation mark (!)
.byte 0x0A,0x1A,0x1A,0x1A,0x1A ; New line + character image padding
.ascii "Please take this"
.byte 0x06 ; Blue font
.ascii " ticket"
.byte 0x08 ; White font
.ascii " as proof of entry"
.byte 0x85 ; Period (.)
.byte 0xFF,0 ; Wait, press A to confirm

.align 16
TooManyItemsMessage:
.byte 0x1A,0x1A,0x1A,0x1A ; Padding for character image
.ascii "You have no space for a"
.byte 0x06 ; Blue font
.ascii " ticket"
.byte 0x08 ; White font
.byte 0xC3 ; Question mark (?)
.byte 0x0A,0x1A,0x1A,0x1A,0x1A ; New line + character image padding
.ascii "Well"
.byte 0x82 ; Comma (,)
.ascii " I"
.byte 0x5C ; Apostrophe (')
.ascii "ll let you in anyway"
.byte 0x85 ; Period (.)
.byte 0xFF,0 ; Wait, press A to confirm

.align 16
HasKeyMessage:
.byte 0x1A,0x1A,0x1A,0x1A ; Padding for character image
.ascii "You already have a"
.byte 0x06 ; Blue font
.ascii " ticket"
.byte 0x08 ; White font
.byte 0xC2 ; Exclamation mark (!)
.byte 0x0A,0x1A,0x1A,0x1A,0x1A ; New line + character image padding
.ascii "You don"
.byte 0x5C ; Apostrophe (')
.ascii "t need another one from me"
.byte 0x85 ; Period (.)
.byte 0xFF,0 ; Wait, press A to confirm

.align 16
NoCoinsMessage:
.byte 0x1A,0x1A,0x1A,0x1A ; Padding for character image
.ascii "You don"
.byte 0x5C ; Apostrophe (')
.ascii "t have enough"
.byte 0x0A,0x1A,0x1A,0x1A,0x1A ; New line + character image padding
.byte 0x07 ; Yellow font
.ascii "coins"
.byte 0x08 ; White font
.ascii " to buy a"
.byte 0x06 ; Blue font
.ascii " ticket"
.byte 0x08 ; White font
.byte 0xC3 ; Question mark (?)
.byte 0x0A,0x1A,0x1A,0x1A,0x1A ; New line + character image padding
.ascii "Hey"
.byte 0x82 ; Comma (,)
.ascii " this ain"
.byte 0x5C ; Apostrophe (')
.ascii "t a charity"
.byte 0xC2 ; Exclamation mark (!)
.byte 0xFF,0 ; Wait, press A to confirm

; Here's a list of the most common bytes you'll need
; .byte 0x01 ; Black font
; .byte 0x03 ; Red font
; .byte 0x04 ; Purple font
; .byte 0x05 ; Green font
; .byte 0x06 ; Blue font
; .byte 0x07 ; Yellow font
; .byte 0x08 ; White font
; .byte 0x85 ; Period (.)
; .byte 0xC2 ; Exclamation mark (!)
; .byte 0xC3 ; Question mark (?)
; .byte 0x82 ; Comma (,)
; .byte 0x0A ; New line (writes below)
; .byte 0x5C ; Apostrophe (')
; .byte 0x29 ; Coin icon
; .byte 0x3D ; Minus (-)
; .byte 0x3E ; Multiply (x)
; .byte 0xFF,0 ; Wait, press A to confirm

; If your message has an image, use this at the start of each line
; .byte 0x1A,0x1A,0x1A,0x1A ; Padding for character image

Gachapon v3.1 (Chocolate).code:
; NAME: Gachapon v3.1 (Chocolate)
; GAMES: MP3_USA
; EXECUTION: Direct
; PARAM: Space|Gachapon

ADDIU SP SP -80
SW RA 76(SP)
SW S0 72(SP)
SW S1 68(SP)
SW S2 64(SP)
SW S3 60(SP)
SW S4 56(SP)
SW S5 52(SP)
SW S6 48(SP)

; S0 = Current Player Struct
; S1 = PromptChoice
; S2 = Current Player Placement / Coin Bonus to Add
; S3 = Chances Table
; S4 = Empty Item Slot (0-2) + Offset of Player Struct
; S5 = Player's Stars / Item Received / Coin Value
; S6 = Item String Pointer

;===Hide Dice Roll===
JAL GetPlayerStruct
LI A0 -1 ; Get current player struct at V0
MOVE S0 V0 ; Copy V0 to S0

JAL 0x800DBEC0 ; HideDiceRoll
LBU A0 0x1D(S0) ; Pass current player index on A0

;===Set Player Idle Animation===
LI A0 -1 ; Set current player
LI A1 -1 ; Set idle animation
JAL SetBoardPlayerAnimation
LI A2 2 ; Loop the animation

;===Rotate Toward Gachapon===
LI A0 -1 ; Set current player
LI A1 8 ; Rotate in 8 frames
JAL RotatePlayerModel
LI A2 Gachapon ; Face Gachapon

;===Check for Player Coins===
LBU A0 0x1D(S0) ; Pass current player index on A0
JAL PlayerHasCoins ; Returns 1 if player has enough coins
LI A1 5 ; Check if player has 5 coins

BEQZ V0 NotEnoughCoins ; If V0 = 0, player does not have 5 coins
NOP

;===Main Prompt===
MainPrompt:
SW R0 16(SP) ; A4
SW R0 20(SP) ; A5
SW R0 24(SP) ; A6
LI A0 -1 ; Character image (-1 for none)
; Visit the following link to get the full list of Character Images
; https://github.com/PartyPlanner64/PartyPlanner64/wiki/Displaying-Messages
; If you use a character image, check the bottom of the code
LUI A1 hi(Prompt)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(Prompt) ; Display Prompt
LI A2 0
JAL ShowMessage
LI A3 0

JAL AILogic
LBU A0 0x1D(S0) ; Pass current player index on A0

; Get the selection, either from the player or CPU.
; If A0 is a pointer to AI data, AI logic is ran to pick for CPUs.
; If A0 is 0 or 1, the 0th or 1st option is chosen by CPUs.
; If A0 is 2, then the value of A1 is the CPUs option index choice.
LI A0 2
JAL GetBasicPromptSelection
MOVE A1 V0 ; A1 now has the AI's decision
MOVE S1 V0 ; S1 now has the chosen option index

; Obligatory message box closing/cleanup calls.
JAL CloseMessage
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6EC
NOP

; Change the player's destination based on the choice.
BEQZ S1 Pay
NOP
LI T0 1
BEQ S1 T0 exit
NOP
; else pick "View map"
JAL ViewBoardMap
NOP
J MainPrompt
NOP

;===Pay Coins===
Pay:
LBU A0 0x1D(S0) ; Take coins from current player
JAL AdjustPlayerCoinsGradual
LI A1 -5 ; Subtract 5 coins

LBU A0 0x1D(S0) ; Take coins from current player
JAL ShowPlayerCoinChange
LI A1 -5 ; Subtract 5 coins

JAL SleepProcess
LI A0 30 ; Wait 30 frames for coin change

;===Check Turn Count===
LUI T0 hi(total_turns)
ADDIU T0 T0 lo(total_turns)
LBU T0 0(T0) ; Load total turns into T0

LUI T1 hi(current_turn)
ADDIU T1 T1 lo(current_turn)
LBU T1 0(T1) ; Load current turn into T1

SUBU T2 T0 T1 ; Subtract current turn from total turns into T2
LI T1 5
SLT T0 T2 T1 ; If T2 < T1, T0 = 1 (last 5 turns)

BEQZ T0 GetBasicTable ; If T0 = 0, go to GetBasicTable
NOP
; else, T0 = 1, it's last 5 turns

;===Get Last 5 Turns Table===
JAL GetPlayerPlacementAtEndOfGame
LBU A0 0x1D(S0) ; Get current player placement (0-3) with bonus stars
MOVE S2 V0 ; Copy V0 to S2

LI T0 16 ; Distance between chances tables
MULT V0 T0 ; Multiply V0 by T0
MFLO T3 ; Move the result to T3

LUI S3 hi(LastFirstTable)
ADDIU S3 S3 lo(LastFirstTable)
J Randomizer
ADDU S3 S3 T3 ; Add distance between chances tables

;===GetBasicTable===
GetBasicTable:
JAL GetPlayerPlacement
LBU A0 0x1D(S0) ; Get current player placement (0-3) at V0
MOVE S2 V0 ; Copy V0 to S2

LI T0 16 ; Distance between chances tables
MULT V0 T0 ; Multiply V0 by T0
MFLO T3 ; Move the result to T3

LUI S3 hi(BasicFirstTable)
ADDIU S3 S3 lo(BasicFirstTable)
ADDU S3 S3 T3 ; Add distance between chances tables

;===Outcome Randomizer===
Randomizer:
JAL GetRand
ORI A0 R0 99 ; Get random byte (0-99) at V0
LI T1 0 ; Set outcome value to 0

RandomLoop:
LBU T3 0(S3) ; Load chance value into T3
SLT T0 V0 T3 ; If V0 < T3, T0 = 1
BNEZ T0 SelectOutcome ; If T0 = 1, go to SelectOutcome
NOP
ADDIU S3 S3 1 ; Add 1 to chances table to check next chance value
J RandomLoop
ADDIU T1 T1 1 ; Add 1 to select next outcome

;===Select Outcome===
SelectOutcome:
BEQZ T1 GetNothing ; If T1 = 0, get nothing
NOP
LI T2 1
BEQ T1 T2 GetSmallItem ; If T1 = 1, get small item
NOP
LI T2 2
BEQ T1 T2 GetSmallCoins ; If T1 = 2, get small coins
NOP
LI T2 3
BEQ T1 T2 GetBigItem ; If T1 = 3, get big item
NOP
LI T2 4
BEQ T1 T2 GetBigCoins ; If T1 = 4, get big coins
NOP
LI T2 5
BEQ T1 T2 GetHugeItem ; If T1 = 5, get huge item
NOP
LI T2 6
BEQ T1 T2 GetHugeCoins ; If T1 = 6, get huge coins
NOP
; else, T1 = 7, get star

;===Get Star===
LB S5 0xE(S0) ; Load player stars from offset of player struct
LI T0 99
BEQ S5 T0 GetHugeCoins ; If S6 = T0, go to GetHugeCoins
NOP
; else, player gets a star

;===Show Star Message and Receive Star===
LUI A0 hi(StarMessage)
ADDIU A0 A0 lo(StarMessage)
JAL CallMessage
LI A1 0 ; No string

;===Prepare Star Coords===
JAL GetSpaceData
LI A0 Gachapon ; Get Gachapon data at V0

LUI A0 hi(StarCoords)
ADDIU A0 A0 lo(StarCoords) ; Pass pointer to star coords
ADDIU A0 A0 12 ; Pass pointer to star coords on A0
JAL 0x80089A20 ; StoreCoords
ADDIU A1 V0 8 ; Pass space coords on A1

;===Get Star===
LUI A0 hi(StarCoords)
JAL 0x80106A9C ; GetStar
ADDIU A0 A0 lo(StarCoords) ; Pass star coords on A0

JAL SleepProcess
LI A0 30 ; Wait 30 frames for fanfare and animation

JAL GetBoardAudioIndex
NOP
JAL PlayMusic
MOVE A0 V0 ; Play board's music

J exit
NOP

;===Get Nothing===
GetNothing:
JAL GetRandomByte ; Get random byte (0-255) at V0
NOP
LI T0 5
DIVU V0 T0 ; Divide V0 by T0
MFHI T1 ; Move remainder into T1

BEQZ T1 ReceiveNothing ; If T1 = 0, receive nothing
NOP
LI T0 1
BEQ T0 T1 ReceiveDango ; If T0 = T1, receive dango
NOP
LI T0 2
BEQ T0 T1 ReceiveBalloon ; If T0 = T1, receive balloon
NOP
LI T0 3
BEQ T0 T1 ReceiveMiracle ; If T0 = T1, receive Miracle Capsule
NOP
; else, receive Koopa Kid Orb
LUI A0 hi(KoopaKidMessage)
J ReceivedNothing
ADDIU A0 A0 lo(KoopaKidMessage) ; Display KoopaKidMessage

ReceiveNothing:
LUI A0 hi(NothingMessage)
J ReceivedNothing
ADDIU A0 A0 lo(NothingMessage) ; Display NothingMessage

ReceiveDango:
LUI A0 hi(DangoMessage)
J ReceivedNothing
ADDIU A0 A0 lo(DangoMessage) ; Display DangoMessage

ReceiveBalloon:
LUI A0 hi(BalloonMessage)
J ReceivedNothing
ADDIU A0 A0 lo(BalloonMessage) ; Display BalloonMessage

ReceiveMiracle:
LUI A0 hi(MiracleMessage)
ADDIU A0 A0 lo(MiracleMessage) ; Display MiracleMessage

ReceivedNothing:
JAL CallMessage
LI A1 0

J exit
NOP

;===Get Small Item===
GetSmallItem:
JAL PlayerHasEmptyItemSlot
LBU A0 0x1D(S0) ; Check if current player has empty item slot

BLTZ V0 GetSmallCoins ; If no empty item slot, get coins instead
NOP
MOVE S4 V0 ; else, V0 = 0-2

JAL RNGPercentChance
LI A0 50 ; 50% chance of V0 = 1

BNEZL V0 ReceiveItem ; If V0 = 1, receive Skeleton Key
LI S5 0x01 ; Skeleton Key index at S5 (on likely)

JAL RNGPercentChance
LI A0 50 ; 50% chance of V0 = 1

BNEZL V0 ReceiveItem ; If V0 = 1, receive Mushroom
LI S5 0x00 ; Mushroom index at S5 (on likely)
; else, get Poison Mushroom
J ReceiveItem
LI S5 0x02 ; Poison Mushroom index at S5

;===Get Small Coins===
GetSmallCoins:
J ReceiveCoins
LI S5 5 ; Get base 5 coins

;===Get Big Item===
GetBigItem:
JAL PlayerHasEmptyItemSlot
LBU A0 0x1D(S0) ; Check if current player has empty item slot

BLTZ V0 GetBigCoins ; If no empty item slot, get coins instead
NOP
MOVE S4 V0 ; else, V0 = 0-2

JAL RNGPercentChance
LI A0 50 ; 50% chance of V0 = 1

BNEZ V0 PickMushrooms ; If V0 = 1, go to PickMushrooms
NOP

JAL RNGPercentChance
LI A0 50 ; 50% chance of V0 = 1

BNEZL V0 ReceiveItem ; If V0 = 1, receive Dueling Glove
LI S5 0x08 ; Dueling Glove index at S5 (on likely)
; else, get Bowser Suit
J ReceiveItem
LI S5 0x0D ; Bowser Suit index at S5

PickMushrooms:
JAL RNGPercentChance
LI A0 65 ; 65% chance of V0 = 1

BNEZL V0 ReceiveItem ; If V0 = 1, receive Golden Mushroom
LI S5 0x0A ; Golden Mushroom index at S5 (on likely)
; else, get Reverse Mushroom
J ReceiveItem
LI S5 0x03 ; Reverse Mushroom index at S5

;===Get Big Coins===
GetBigCoins:
J ReceiveCoins
LI S5 10 ; Get base 10 coins

;===Get Huge Item===
GetHugeItem:
JAL PlayerHasEmptyItemSlot
LBU A0 0x1D(S0) ; Check if current player has empty item slot

BLTZ V0 GetHugeCoins ; If no empty item slot, get coins instead
NOP
MOVE S4 V0 ; else, V0 = 0-2

JAL RNGPercentChance
LI A0 75 ; 75% chance of V0 = 1

BEQZ V0 PickRareItem ; If V0 = 0, pick rare item
NOP

JAL RNGPercentChance
LI A0 50 ; 50% chance of V0 = 1

BNEZL V0 ReceiveItem ; If V0 = 1, receive Boo Bell
LI S5 0x0B ; Boo Bell index at S5 (on likely)
; else, get Magic Lamp
J ReceiveItem
LI S5 0x0E ; Magic Lamp index at S5

PickRareItem:
JAL RNGPercentChance
LI A0 65 ; 65% chance of V0 = 1

BNEZL V0 ReceiveItem ; If V0 = 1, receive Koopa Kard
LI S5 0x0F ; Koopa Kard index at S5 (on likely)
; else, get Lucky Charm
J ReceiveItem
LI S5 0x11 ; Lucky Charm index at S5

;===Get Huge Coins===
GetHugeCoins:
LI S5 25 ; Get base 25 coins

;===Receive Coins===
ReceiveCoins:
JAL RNGPercentChance
LI A0 50 ; 50% chance of V0 = 1
ADDU S2 S2 V0 ; Add S2 and V0, store in S2

JAL RNGPercentChance
LI A0 50 ; 50% chance of V0 = 1
ADDU S2 S2 V0 ; Add S2 and V0, store in S2

ADDU S5 S2 S5 ; Add S2 and S5, store in S5 (total coins to gain)

;===Prepare Coin String to Display in Message===
LUI A0 hi(CoinString)
ADDIU A0 A0 lo(CoinString) ; Saves # of coins to CoinString
LUI A1 hi(percent_d)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(percent_d) ; String formatter
JAL sprintf ; Converts to a text string
MOVE A2 S5 ; Converts the number of coins to a string

;===Show Coins Message and Get Coins===
LUI A0 hi(CoinsMessage)
ADDIU A0 A0 lo(CoinsMessage) ; Display CoinsMessage
LUI A1 hi(CoinString)
JAL CallMessage
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(CoinString) ; Load CoinString into A1 (String #1)

LBU A0 0x1D(S0) ; Give current player coins
JAL AdjustPlayerCoinsGradual
MOVE A1 S5 ; Pass coins to gain on A1

LBU A0 0x1D(S0) ; Give current player coins
JAL ShowPlayerCoinChange
MOVE A1 S5 ; Pass coins to gain on A1

J HappyVoice
NOP

;===Format Item Message===
ReceiveItem:
LI T0 0x01 ; Skeleton Key index
BNE S5 T0 FormatItemMessage ; If not Skeleton Key, format item message
NOP
; else, got Skeleton Key, add to ticket star
LBU T0 0x1E(S0) ; Load ticket star from offset of player struct
ADDIU T0 T0 1 ; Add 1 to ticket star
SB T0 0x1E(S0) ; Store ticket star into offset of player struct

FormatItemMessage:
LUI T0 hi(ItemStrings)
ADDIU T0 T0 lo(ItemStrings)
SLL T1 S5 5 ; Multiply item index by 32 (distance between item strings)
ADDU S6 T0 T1 ; S6 now contains item string pointer

LUI A0 hi(ItemMessageHolder)
ADDIU A0 A0 lo(ItemMessageHolder) ; Print destination
LUI A1 hi(ItemMessage)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(ItemMessage) ; String formatter (%s)
MOVE A2 S6 ; Convert item string to text
JAL sprintf ; Converts to text string
LI A3 0 ; Terminator byte

;===Show Item Message and Receive Item===
LUI A0 hi(ItemMessageHolder)
ADDIU A0 A0 lo(ItemMessageHolder) ; Display ItemMessage with strings
JAL CallMessage
LI A1 0

ADDU S4 S0 S4 ; Add empty slot offset to player struct
SB S5 0x18(S4) ; Store item into empty slot offset of player struct

JAL PlaySound
LI A0 0x10C ; Turn Start sound

;===Play Happy Voice and Animation===
HappyVoice:
LBU A0 3(S0) ; Load character value from offset of player struct
JAL PlaySound
ADDIU A0 A0 0x2BE ; Add character value to Mario's happy voice
; Character voices are their "character value" distance away from
; Mario's, e.g. Luigi's character value = 1, so Luigi's happy voice
; is 1 away from Mario's.
; 0x2BE = Happy Voice, 0x287 = Sad Voice

LI A0 -1 ; Set current player
LI A1 5 ; Set joy animation
JAL SetBoardPlayerAnimation
LI A2 0 ; Do not loop animation

JAL SleepProcess
LI A0 40 ; Wait 40 frames for animation

J exit
NOP

;===Not Enough Coins Message===
NotEnoughCoins:
LUI A0 hi(NotEnoughCoinsMessage)
ADDIU A0 A0 lo(NotEnoughCoinsMessage) ; Display NotEnoughCoinsMessage
JAL CallMessage
LI A1 0

exit:
JAL 0x800DB884 ; ShowDiceRoll
LBU A0 0x1D(S0) ; Pass current player index on A0

JAL SleepProcess
LI A0 10 ; Wait 10 frames for dice roll to show

LW RA 76(SP)
LW S0 72(SP)
LW S1 68(SP)
LW S2 64(SP)
LW S3 60(SP)
LW S4 56(SP)
LW S5 52(SP)
JR RA
ADDIU SP SP 80

;===Mini Func to Determine AI Logic===
.align 4
AILogic:
ADDIU SP SP -40
SW RA 36(SP)
SW S0 32(SP)

; A0 / S0 = Current Player Index

MOVE S0 A0 ; Check CPU
JAL PlayerHasCoins
LI A1 17 ; Check if CPU has 17 coins

BEQZ V0 AILogicExit ; If CPU has 5-16 coins, select yes
NOP

MOVE A0 S0 ; Check CPU
JAL PlayerHasCoins
LI A1 25 ; Check if CPU has 25 coins

BNEZL V0 AILogicExit ; If CPU has 25 coins, select yes
LI V0 0 ; Select yes (on likely)
; else, CPU selects no
LI V0 1

AILogicExit:
LW RA 36(SP)
LW S0 32(SP)
JR RA
ADDIU SP SP 40

;===Mini Func to Get Random Byte===
.align 4
GetRand: ; returns on V0

; A0 = max byte

ADDIU sp, sp, -0x18
SW ra, 0x0010 (sp)
BLTZL a0, label1_func0
SUBU a0, r0, a0
label1_func0:
BEQZ a0, End1
DADDU v0, r0, r0
ADDIU v0, r0, 0x0001
BNEL a0, v0, label2_func0
ADDIU v0, r0, 0x0064
JAL Function1
ADDIU a0, r0, 0x03E8
SLTI v0, v0, 0x01F5
J End1
XORI v0, v0, 0x0001
label2_func0:
BEQ a0, v0, label3_func0
NOP
JAL Function1
NOP
J End1
NOP
label3_func0:
JAL Function1
ADDIU a0, r0, 0x03F1
LUI v1, 0x6666
ORI v1, v1, 0x6667
MULT v0, v1
SRA v0, v0, 31
MFHI a1
SRA v1, a1, 2
SUBU v0, v1, v0
End1:
LW ra, 0x0010 (sp)
JR RA
ADDIU sp, sp, 0x18
//
Function1:
ADDIU sp, sp, -0x20
SW s0, 0x0010 (sp)
ADDIU s0, r0, 0xFFFF
SW s1, 0x0014 (sp)
ADDIU s1, a0, 0x0001
BNEZ s1, label1_func1
DIVU s0, s1
BREAK 0x01C00
label1_func1:
MFLO s0
BNEZ s0, label2_func1
SW ra, 0x0018 (sp)
ADDIU s0, r0, 0x0001
label2_func1:
JAL Function2
NOP
BNEZ s0, label3_func1
DIVU v0, s0
BREAK 0x01C00
label3_func1:
MFLO v1
SLTU v0, v1, s1
BEQZ v0, label2_func1
DADDU v0, v1, r0
LW ra, 0x0018 (sp)
LW s1, 0x0014 (sp)
LW s0, 0x0010 (sp)
JR RA
ADDIU sp, sp, 0x20
//
Function2:
LUI v0, 0x8009
LW v0, 0x7650 (v0)
LUI v1, 0x41C6
ORI v1, v1, 0x4E6D
MULT v0, v1
MFLO v0
ADDIU v0, v0, 0x3039
LUI v1, 0x8009
JR RA
SW v0, 0x7650 (v1)

;===Mini Func to Call Message===
.align 4
CallMessage:
ADDIU SP SP -40
SW RA 36(SP)

; A0 = Message Address
; A1 = String #1

MOVE A2 A1 ; Copy A1 to A2
MOVE A1 A0 ; Copy A0 to A1
SW R0 16(SP) ; A4
SW R0 20(SP) ; A5
SW R0 24(SP) ; A6
LI A0 -1 ; Character image (-1 for none)
; Visit the following link to get the full list of Character Images
; https://github.com/PartyPlanner64/PartyPlanner64/wiki/Displaying-Messages
; If you use a character image, check the bottom of the code
JAL ShowMessage
LI A3 0

; Obligatory message box closing/cleanup calls.
JAL 0x800EC9DC
NOP
JAL CloseMessage
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6EC
NOP

LW RA 36(SP)
JR RA
ADDIU SP SP 40

;===Message Text===
.align 16
Prompt:
.ascii "Would you like to use the capsule machine"
.byte 0xC3 ; Question mark (?)
.byte 0x0A,0x0A,0x1A,0x1A ; Two new lines + option indent
.byte 0x0C ; Start option
.ascii "Yes"
.byte 0x82 ; Comma (,)
.ascii " I"
.byte 0x5C ; Apostrophe (')
.ascii "m feeling lucky"
.byte 0xC2 ; Exclamation mark (!)
.byte 0x1A,0x1A ; Tabs
.byte 0x29,0x3E ; Coin icon, Multiply (x)
.ascii " 5"
.byte 0x0D ; End option
.byte 0x0A,0x1A,0x1A ; New line + option indent
.byte 0x0C ; Start option
.ascii "No"
.byte 0x82 ; Comma (,)
.ascii " I"
.byte 0x5C ; Apostrophe (')
.ascii "d rather not"
.byte 0x85 ; Period (.)
.byte 0x0D ; End option
.byte 0x0A,0x1A,0x1A ; New line + option indent
.byte 0x0C ; Start option
.ascii "View map"
.byte 0x0D ; End option
.byte 0 ; End prompt

.align 16
StarMessage:
.ascii "Inside the capsule"
.byte 0x82 ; Comma (,)
.ascii " you found a"
.byte 0x07 ; Yellow font
.ascii " Star"
.byte 0x08,0xC2,0xC2 ; White font, Two exclamation marks (!!)
.byte 0xFF,0 ; Wait, press A to confirm

.align 16
KoopaKidMessage:
.ascii "A"
.byte 0x04 ; Purple font
.ascii " Koopa Kid Orb"
.byte 0x08 ; White font
.ascii " came out of the capsule machine"
.byte 0xC2 ; Exclamation mark (!)
.byte 0x0A ; New line (writes below)
.ascii "Let"
.byte 0x5C ; Apostrophe (')
.ascii "s chuck it away before anyone notices"
.byte 0x85,0x85,0x85 ; Three periods (...)
.byte 0xFF,0 ; Wait, press A to confirm

.align 16
NothingMessage:
.byte 0x85,0x85,0x85 ; Three periods (...)
.byte 0x0A ; New line (writes below)
.ascii "Nothing came out of the capsule machine"
.byte 0x85,0x85,0x85 ; Three periods (...)
.byte 0xFF,0 ; Wait, press A to confirm

.align 16
DangoMessage:
.ascii "Inside the capsule"
.byte 0x82 ; Comma (,)
.ascii " you found a dango"
.byte 0x85 ; Period (.)
.byte 0x0A ; New line (writes below)
.ascii "It was so delicious"
.byte 0x82 ; Comma (,)
.ascii " you swallowed it whole"
.byte 0xC2 ; Exclamation mark (!)
.byte 0xFF,0 ; Wait, press A to confirm

.align 16
BalloonMessage:
.ascii "Inside the capsule"
.byte 0x82 ; Comma (,)
.ascii " you found a deflated balloon"
.byte 0x85 ; Period (.)
.byte 0x0A ; New line (writes below)
.ascii "Too bad"
.byte 0xC2 ; Exclamation mark (!)
.byte 0xFF,0 ; Wait, press A to confirm

.align 16
MiracleMessage:
.ascii "A"
.byte 0x05 ; Green font
.ascii " Miracle Capsule"
.byte 0x08 ; White font
.ascii " came out of the capsule machine"
.byte 0xC2 ; Exclamation mark (!)
.byte 0x0A ; New line (writes below)
.ascii "But it"
.byte 0x5C ; Apostrophe (')
.ascii "s useless in this game"
.byte 0x82 ; Comma (,)
.ascii " so you tossed it"
.byte 0x85 ; Period (.)
.byte 0xFF,0 ; Wait, press A to confirm

.align 16
ItemMessage:

.byte 0x08,0xC2 ; White font, Exclamation mark (!)

.align 16
CoinsMessage:

.align 16
NotEnoughCoinsMessage:

.ascii " 5 coins"

.ascii " to use the capsule machine"

.byte 0xFF,0 ; Wait, press A to confirm

Strength Test v1.1 (Chocolate).code:
; NAME: Strength Test v1.1 (Chocolate)
; GAMES: MP3_USA
; EXECUTION: Direct
; PARAM: Space|StrengthTest
; PARAM: Space|StrengthTestBoo

ADDIU SP SP -80
SW RA 76(SP)
SW S0 72(SP)
SW S1 68(SP)
SW S2 64(SP)
SW S3 60(SP)
SW S4 56(SP)
SW S5 52(SP)

; S0 = Current Player Struct
; S1 = Window ID
; S2 = Points Haul / Coin Prize
; S3 = A or B to Press (0 or 1) / Key String Flag
; S4 = Button Deactivator Flag
; S5 = Timer / CPU Sound Loop Counter

;===Rotate Toward StrengthTestBoo===
LI A0 -1 ; Set current player
LI A1 8 ; Rotate in 8 frames
JAL RotatePlayerModel
LI A2 StrengthTestBoo ; Face StrengthTestBoo

;===Greeting Message===
JAL PlaySound
LI A0 0x257 ; Boo laugh

LI A0 0 ; No string
LUI A1 hi(GreetingMessage)
JAL CallMessage
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(GreetingMessage) ; Display GreetingMessage

;===Rotate Toward StrengthTest===
LI A0 -1 ; Set current player
LI A1 8 ; Rotate in 8 frames
JAL RotatePlayerModel
LI A2 StrengthTest ; Face StrengthTest

;===Starting Message===
JAL PlaySound
LI A0 0x257 ; Boo laugh

LI A0 0 ; No string
LUI A1 hi(StartingMessage)
JAL CallMessage
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(StartingMessage) ; Display StartingMessage

;===Fade Out===
LI A0 4 ; Happening fade-out
JAL InitFadeOut ; Fade to black
LI A1 16 ; Assigns 16 frames of fade-out

JAL SleepProcess
LI A0 17 ; Wait 17 frames for fade-out

;===Randomize Starting Time===
JAL GetRandomByte ; Get random byte (0-255) at V0
NOP

JAL SleepProcess
SRL A0 V0 1 ; Divide V0 by 2 (wait that many frames)

;===Decide Button to Press and Format String===
JAL RNGPercentChance
LI A0 50 ; 50% chance of V0 = 1
MOVE S3 V0 ; Copy V0 to S3

LUI A2 hi(ButtonPointer)
ADDIU A2 A2 lo(ButtonPointer)
SLL V0 V0 4 ; Multiply V0 by 16 (distance between Button Pointers)
ADDU A2 A2 V0 ; Add distance between Button Pointers
LUI A0 hi(ActionMessageHolder)
ADDIU A0 A0 lo(ActionMessageHolder) ; Parse destination
LUI A1 hi(ActionMessage)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(ActionMessage) ; String formatter (%s)
JAL sprintf ; Converts string to text
LI A3 0 ; Terminator byte

;===Fade In===
LI A0 4 ; Happening fade-in
JAL InitFadeIn ; Fade from black
LI A1 16 ; Assigns 16 frames of fade-in

JAL SleepProcess
LI A0 17 ; Wait 17 frames for fade-in

;===Display Action Message===
JAL PlaySound
LI A0 0x317 ; Whistle

JAL PlaySound
LI A0 0x257 ; Boo laugh

SW R0 16(SP) ; A4
SW R0 20(SP) ; A5
SW R0 24(SP) ; A6
LI A0 0x7 ; Character image (-1 for none, 0x7 for Boo)
; Visit the following link to get the full list of Character Images
; https://github.com/PartyPlanner64/PartyPlanner64/wiki/Displaying-Messages
; If you use a character image, check the bottom of the code
LUI A1 hi(ActionMessageHolder)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(ActionMessageHolder) ; Display ActionMessage with strings
LI A2 0
JAL ShowMessage
LI A3 0

MOVE S1 A0 ; Copy A0 to S1

;===Get Current Player Struct===
JAL GetPlayerStruct
LI A0 -1 ; Get current player struct at V0
MOVE S0 V0 ; Copy V0 to S0

;===Convert Button Presses to Points===
LI S2 0 ; Start at 0 points
LI S4 0 ; Start flag at 0
LI S5 0 ; Start timer at 0

JAL PlayerIsCPU
LBU A0 0x1D(S0) ; Check if current player is CPU (V0 = 1)

BNEZ V0 CalculateHaul ; If player is CPU, calculate haul
NOP

ButtonLoop:
MOVE A0 S0 ; Pass current player struct on A0
JAL DetectABInput
MOVE A1 S3 ; Pass button flag on A1

BEQZ V0 NoPress ; If V0 = 0, no press registered
NOP

JAL PlaySound
LI A0 0x3B ; Whoosh sound

BNEZ S4 CountPress ; If S4 = 1, count the button press
NOP

J NoPress
LI S4 1 ; Count the next press

CountPress:
ADDIU S2 S2 1 ; Add 1 point
LI S4 0 ; Don't count the next press

NoPress:
JAL SleepVProcess
NOP

ADDIU S5 S5 1 ; Add 1 to the timer
SLTI T0 S5 150 ; ON if timer hasn't run out
BEQZ T0 exitloop
NOP

J ButtonLoop
NOP

;===Calculate CPU's Points Haul===
CalculateHaul:
JAL GetRandomByte ; Get random byte (0-255) at V0
NOP

LBU T0 1(S0) ; Load CPU difficulty from offset of player struct

BEQZ T0 GetCPUPoints ; Easy CPU
LI T1 8 ; Easy CPU base points
LI T2 1
BEQ T0 T2 GetCPUPoints ; Normal CPU
LI T1 15 ; Normal CPU base points
LI T2 2
BEQ T0 T2 GetCPUPoints ; Hard CPU
LI T1 21 ; Hard CPU base points
; else Super Hard
LI T1 28 ; Super Hard CPU base points

GetCPUPoints:
LI T0 5
DIVU V0 T0 ; Divide V0 by T0
MFHI S2 ; HI contains the remainder, pull that into S2
ADDU S2 S2 T1 ; Add to base points

SRL S5 S2 1 ; Divide points by 2

CPUSoundLoop:
JAL PlaySound
LI A0 0x3B ; Whoosh sound

JAL SleepProcess
LI A0 2 ; Wait 2 frames per sound

BEQZ S5 exitloop
NOP
J CPUSoundLoop
ADDIU S5 S5 -1

;===Exit Loop, Close Message, Fade-in===
exitloop:
MOVE A0 S1 ; Copy S1 to A0 (window ID)

; Obligatory message box closing/cleanup calls.
JAL 0x800EC9DC
NOP
JAL CloseMessage
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6EC
NOP

;===Calculate Points===
SLTI T0 S2 10 ; If points < 10, T0 = 1
BNEZ T0 NoPrize
NOP
SLTI T0 S2 20 ; If points < 20, T0 = 1
BNEZ T0 SmallPrize
NOP
SLTI T0 S2 30 ; If points < 30, T0 = 1
BNEZ T0 BigPrize
NOP
; else, get grand prize

;===Grand Prize===
JAL PlaySound
LI A0 0x0C ; Game Guy bell sound

JAL HappyVoice
MOVE A0 S0 ; Pass current player struct on A0

JAL PlayerHasEmptyItemSlot
LBU A0 0x1D(S0) ; Pass current player index on A0

LI S3 0
BLTZ V0 GrandPrizeCoins ; If V0 < 0 (no empty slots), get coins only
LI S2 40 ; Get 40 coins
; else, player can get a key

;===Get Key(s)===
LI S2 30 ; Start with 30 coins
ADDU T0 S0 V0 ; Add empty slot offset of player struct
GrandPrizeKeyLoop:
LI T1 0x01 ; Skeleton Key index
SB T1 0x18(T0) ; Store item in empty slot offset of player struct

LBU T3 0x1E(S0) ; Load ticket star from offset of player struct
ADDIU T3 T3 1 ; Add 1 to ticket star
SB T3 0x1E(S0) ; Store ticket star into offset of player struct

ADDIU S3 S3 1 ; Add 1 to A3 (Key String)

LI T2 2
BEQ V0 T2 GrandPrizeKeySound ; Once V0 = 2, stop giving keys
NOP

ADDIU V0 V0 1 ; Add 1 to V0 (loop counter)
ADDIU T0 T0 1 ; Add 1 to get next empty slot
J GrandPrizeKeyLoop
ADDIU S2 S2 -5 ; Subtract 5 coins from prize

GrandPrizeKeySound:
JAL PlaySound
LI A0 0x10C ; Turn Start sound

JAL SleepProcess
LI A0 20 ; Wait 20 frames for sound

;===Get Grand Prize===
GrandPrizeCoins:
LBU A0 0x1D(S0) ; Pass current player index on A0
LUI A1 hi(GrandPrizeMessage)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(GrandPrizeMessage) ; Display GrandPrizeMessage
MOVE A2 S2 ; Pass coin prize on A2
JAL GetPrize
MOVE A3 S3 ; Pass key string on A3

JAL HappyVoice
MOVE A0 S0 ; Pass current player struct on A0

J exit
NOP

;===No Prize===
NoPrize:
LI A0 -1 ; Set current player
LI A1 8 ; Rotate in 8 frames
JAL RotatePlayerModel
LI A2 StrengthTestBoo ; Face StrengthTestBoo

LI A0 0 ; No string
LUI A1 hi(NoPrizeMessage)
JAL CallMessage
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(NoPrizeMessage) ; Display NoPrizeMessage

LBU A0 3(S0) ; Load character value from offset of player struct
JAL PlaySound
ADDIU A0 A0 0x287 ; Add character value to Mario's sad voice
; Character voices are their "character value" distance away from
; Mario's, e.g. Luigi's character value = 1, so Luigi's sad voice
; is 1 away from Mario's.
; 0x2BE = Happy Voice, 0x287 = Sad Voice

LI A0 -1 ; Set current player
LI A1 3 ; Set lose animation
JAL SetBoardPlayerAnimation
LI A2 0 ; Do not loop animation

JAL SleepProcess
LI A0 80 ; Wait 80 frames for animation

J exit
NOP

;===Small Prize===
SmallPrize:
JAL PlaySound
LI A0 0x09 ; Coin sound

JAL HappyVoice
MOVE A0 S0 ; Pass current player struct on A0

JAL PlayerHasEmptyItemSlot
LBU A0 0x1D(S0) ; Pass current player index on A0

LI S3 0
BLTZ V0 SmallPrizeCoins ; If V0 < 0 (no empty slots), get coins only
LI S2 10 ; Get 10 coins
; else, player gets 1 key and 5 coins

;===Get Key===
ADDU V0 S0 V0 ; Add empty slot offset of player struct
LI T0 0x01 ; Skeleton Key index
SB T0 0x18(V0) ; Store item in empty slot offset of player struct

LBU T3 0x1E(S0) ; Load ticket star from offset of player struct
ADDIU T3 T3 1 ; Add 1 to ticket star
SB T3 0x1E(S0) ; Store ticket star into offset of player struct

LI S2 5 ; Get 5 coins
LI S3 1 ; Retrieve OneKeyString

JAL PlaySound
LI A0 0x10C ; Turn Start sound

JAL SleepProcess
LI A0 20 ; Wait 20 frames for sound

;===Get Small Prize===
SmallPrizeCoins:
LBU A0 0x1D(S0) ; Pass current player index on A0
LUI A1 hi(SmallPrizeMessage)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(SmallPrizeMessage) ; Display SmallPrizeMessage
MOVE A2 S2 ; Pass coin prize on A2
JAL GetPrize
MOVE A3 S3 ; Pass key string on A3

JAL HappyVoice
MOVE A0 S0 ; Pass current player struct on A0

J exit
NOP

;===Big Prize===
BigPrize:
JAL PlaySound
LI A0 0x15 ; Coin Bag sound

JAL HappyVoice
MOVE A0 S0 ; Pass current player struct on A0

JAL PlayerHasEmptyItemSlot
LBU A0 0x1D(S0) ; Pass current player index on A0

LI S3 0
BLTZ V0 BigPrizeCoins ; If V0 < 0 (no empty slots), get coins only
LI S2 20 ; Get 20 coins
; else, player can get a key

;===Get Key(s)===
LI T0 2
BEQ T0 V0 OneKeyBigPrize
NOP
ADDU V0 S0 V0 ; Add empty slot offset of player struct
LI T0 0x01 ; Skeleton Key index
SB T0 0x18(V0) ; Store item in empty slot offset of player struct
SB T0 0x19(V0) ; Store item in empty slot offset of player struct

LBU T3 0x1E(S0) ; Load ticket star from offset of player struct
ADDIU T3 T3 2 ; Add 2 to ticket star
SB T3 0x1E(S0) ; Store ticket star into offset of player struct

LI S2 10 ; Get 10 coins
J BigPrizeKeySound
LI S3 2 ; Retrieve TwoKeysString

OneKeyBigPrize:
ADDU V0 S0 V0 ; Add empty slot offset of player struct
LI T0 0x01 ; Skeleton Key index
SB T0 0x18(V0) ; Store item in empty slot offset of player struct

LBU T3 0x1E(S0) ; Load ticket star from offset of player struct
ADDIU T3 T3 1 ; Add 1 to ticket star
SB T3 0x1E(S0) ; Store ticket star into offset of player struct

LI S2 15 ; Get 15 coins
LI S3 1 ; Retrieve OneKeyString

BigPrizeKeySound:
JAL PlaySound
LI A0 0x10C ; Turn Start sound

JAL SleepProcess
LI A0 20 ; Wait 20 frames for sound

;===Get Big Prize===
BigPrizeCoins:
LBU A0 0x1D(S0) ; Pass current player index on A0
LUI A1 hi(BigPrizeMessage)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(BigPrizeMessage) ; Display BigPrizeMessage
MOVE A2 S2 ; Pass coin prize on A2
JAL GetPrize
MOVE A3 S3 ; Pass key string on A3

JAL HappyVoice
MOVE A0 S0 ; Pass current player struct on A0

exit:
LW RA 76(SP)
LW S0 72(SP)
LW S1 68(SP)
LW S2 64(SP)
LW S3 60(SP)
LW S4 56(SP)
LW S5 52(SP)
JR RA
ADDIU SP SP 80

;===Prep for Displaying Coin String===
.align 16
percent_d:
.asciiz "%d" ; 0x25640000

.align 16
CoinString:
.fill 8

;===Mini Func to Call Message===
.align 4
CallMessage:
ADDIU SP SP -40
SW RA 36(SP)

; A0 = String #1
; A1 = Message Address

MOVE A2 A0 ; Copy A0 to A1
SW R0 16(SP) ; A4
SW R0 20(SP) ; A5
SW R0 24(SP) ; A6
LI A0 0x7 ; Character image (-1 for none, 0x7 for Boo)
; Visit the following link to get the full list of Character Images
; https://github.com/PartyPlanner64/PartyPlanner64/wiki/Displaying-Messages
; If you use a character image, check the bottom of the code
JAL ShowMessage
LI A3 0

; Obligatory message box closing/cleanup calls.
JAL 0x800EC9DC
NOP
JAL CloseMessage
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6EC
NOP

LW RA 36(SP)
JR RA
ADDIU SP SP 40

;===Mini Func to Detect A/B Input===
.align 4
DetectABInput:
ADDIU SP SP -40
SW RA 36(SP)

; A0 = Current Player Struct
; A1 = A or B to Press (0 or 1)
; V0 = Press Detected (0 or 1)

LBU T0 2(A0) ; Load controller value from offset of player struct

LUI T1 hi(0x800C9520)
ADDIU T1 T1 lo(0x800C9520) ; Load port 1's Button Press Address
LI T2 0x2 ; Distance between each port's Button Press Address
MULT T2 T0 ;  Multiply controller value by 2
MFLO T0 ; Move the result into T0

ADDU T1 T1 T0 ; Add result to get current player's button press address
LBU T0 0(T1) ; Load button press value into T0

LI T1 0x80
SRLV T1 T1 A1 ; Shift right by 0 or 1 (0x80 for A, 0x40 for B)
BEQ T0 T1 DetectABInputexit
LI V0 1 ; Button press detected
; else, no button press detected
J DetectABInputexit
LI V0 0 ; No button press detected

DetectABInputexit:
LW RA 36(SP)
JR RA
ADDIU SP SP 40

;===Mini Func to Play Happy Effects===
.align 4
HappyVoice:
ADDIU SP SP -40
SW RA 36(SP)

; A0 = Current Player Struct

LBU A0 3(A0) ; Load character value from offset of player struct
JAL PlaySound
ADDIU A0 A0 0x2BE ; Add character value to Mario's happy voice
; Character voices are their "character value" distance away from
; Mario's, e.g. Luigi's character value = 1, so Luigi's happy voice
; is 1 away from Mario's.
; 0x2BE = Happy Voice, 0x287 = Sad Voice

LI A0 -1 ; Set current player
LI A1 5 ; Set joy animation
JAL SetBoardPlayerAnimation
LI A2 0 ; Do not loop animation

JAL SleepProcess
LI A0 40 ; Wait 40 frames for animation

LW RA 36(SP)
JR RA
ADDIU SP SP 40

;===Mini Func to Get Prize===
.align 4
GetPrize:
ADDIU SP SP -48
SW RA 44(SP)
SW S0 40(SP)
SW S1 36(SP)
SW S2 32(SP)
SW S3 28(SP)

; A0 / S0 = Current Player Index
; A1 / S1 = Prize Message Address
; A2 / S2 = Coin Prize
; A3 / S3 = Key String Flag (1-3)

MOVE S0 A0 ; Copy A0 to S0
MOVE S1 A1 ; Copy A1 to S1
MOVE S2 A2 ; Copy A2 to S2
MOVE S3 A3 ; Copy A3 to S3

LI A0 -1 ; Set current player
LI A1 8 ; Rotate in 8 frames
JAL RotatePlayerModel
LI A2 StrengthTestBoo ; Face StrengthTestBoo

LUI A0 hi(CoinString)
ADDIU A0 A0 lo(CoinString) ; Parse destination
LUI A1 hi(percent_d)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(percent_d) ; String formatter
MOVE A2 S2 ; Coins to convert to string (Coin Prize)
JAL sprintf ; Converts a number to a text string
LI A3 0 ; Terminator byte

BEQZ S3 SkipKeys
NOP
ADDIU S3 S3 -1 ; Subtract 1 (0-2)
BNEZ S3 SkipOneKey
NOP
LUI A2 hi(OneKeyString)
J PrintPrize
ADDIU A2 A2 lo(OneKeyString)

SkipKeys:
LUI A2 hi(NoKeyString)
J PrintPrize
ADDIU A2 A2 lo(NoKeyString)

SkipOneKey:
ADDIU S3 S3 -1 ; Subtract 1 (0-1)
BNEZ S3 PrintThreeKeys
NOP
LUI A2 hi(TwoKeysString)
J PrintPrize
ADDIU A2 A2 lo(TwoKeysString)

PrintThreeKeys:
LUI A2 hi(ThreeKeysString)
ADDIU A2 A2 lo(ThreeKeysString)

PrintPrize:
LUI A0 hi(PrizeMessageHolder)
ADDIU A0 A0 lo(PrizeMessageHolder) ; Parse destination
MOVE A1 S1 ; String formatter (%s)
; Pass key string to convert on A2
JAL sprintf ; Converts string to text
LI A3 0 ; Terminator byte

LUI A0 hi(CoinString)
ADDIU A0 A0 lo(CoinString) ; String #1 stored in A2 (CoinString)
LUI A1 hi(PrizeMessageHolder)
JAL CallMessage
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(PrizeMessageHolder) ; Dislay PrizeMessage with strings

MOVE A0 S0 ; Give coins to current player
JAL AdjustPlayerCoinsGradual
MOVE A1 S2 ; Give coins

MOVE A0 S0 ; Give coins to current player
JAL ShowPlayerCoinChange
MOVE A1 S2 ; Give coins

JAL SleepProcess
LI A0 30 ; Wait 30 frames for coin change

LW RA 44(SP)
LW S0 40(SP)
LW S1 36(SP)
LW S2 32(SP)
LW S3 28(SP)
JR RA
ADDIU SP SP 48

;===Message Text===
.align 16

.ascii "You"
.byte 0x5C ; Apostrophe (')
.ascii "ve come to the right place"

.byte 0x0A,0x1A,0x1A,0x1A,0x1A ; New line + character image padding
.ascii "Step right up and test your skills"
.byte 0x85 ; Period (.)
.byte 0x0A,0x1A,0x1A,0x1A,0x1A ; New line + character image padding
.ascii "You can win one of three"
.byte 0x07 ; Yellow font
.ascii " prizes"
.byte 0x08,0xC2 ; White font, Exclamation mark (!)

Teacups v3.1 (Chocolate).code:
; NAME: Teacups v3.1 (Chocolate)
; GAMES: MP3_USA
; EXECUTION: Direct

ADDIU SP SP -80
SW RA 76(SP)
SW S0 72(SP)
SW S1 68(SP)
SW S2 64(SP)
SW S3 60(SP)
SW S4 56(SP)
SW S5 52(SP)

; S0 = Current Player Struct
; S1 = Prompt Choice
; S2 = Item Chances Table
; S3 = Player Placement and Distance Between Tables / Item Table
; S4 = Empty Item Slot + Offset of Player Struct
; S5 = Item Received / Item String Pointer

;===Hide Dice Roll===
JAL GetPlayerStruct
LI A0 -1 ; Get current player struct at V0
MOVE S0 V0 ; Copy V0 to S0

JAL 0x800DBEC0 ; HideDiceRoll
LBU A0 0x1D(S0) ; Pass current player index on A0

;===Set Player Idle Animation===
Li A0 -1 ; Set current player
LI A1 -1 ; Set idle animation
JAL SetBoardPlayerAnimation
LI A2 2 ; Loop the animation

;===Greeting Message===
LI A0 0x7 ; Boo image
LUI A1 hi(GreetingMessage)
JAL CallMessage
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(GreetingMessage) ; Display GreetingMessage

;===Select Teacup Prompt===
SW R0 16(SP) ; A4
SW R0 20(SP) ; A5
SW R0 24(SP) ; A6
LI A0 0x7 ; Character image (-1 for none, 0x7 for Boo)
; Visit the following link to get the full list of Character Images
; https://github.com/PartyPlanner64/PartyPlanner64/wiki/Displaying-Messages
; If you use a character image, check the bottom of the code
LUI A1 hi(TeacupPrompt)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(TeacupPrompt) ; Display TeacupPrompt
LI A2 0
JAL ShowMessage
LI A3 0

; Get the selection, either from the player or CPU.
; If A0 is a pointer to AI data, AI logic is ran to pick for CPUs.
; If A0 is 0 or 1, the 0th or 1st option is chosen by CPUs.
; If A0 is 2, then the value of A1 is the CPUs option index choice.
LI A0 0
JAL GetBasicPromptSelection
LI A1 0 ; A1 now has the AI's decision
MOVE S1 V0 ; S1 now has the chosen option index

; Obligatory message box closing/cleanup calls.
JAL CloseMessage
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6EC
NOP

; Change the player's destination based on the choice.
BEQZ S1 PickCup
NOP
; else go to PickCup

;===Fade-Out and Set Player Animation===
PickCup:
LI A0 12 ; Assigns Boo fade-out
JAL InitFadeOut ; Fade to black
LI A1 16 ; Assigns 16 frames of fade-out

JAL SleepProcess
LI A0 17 ; Wait 17 frames for fade-out

LI A0 -1 ; Set current player
LI A1 4 ; Set dizzy animation
JAL SetBoardPlayerAnimation
LI A2 2 ; Loop the animation

JAL GetCurrentSpaceIndex ; Get current space index at V0
NOP

LI A0 -1 ; Set current player
LI A1 1 ; Rotate in 1 frame
JAL RotatePlayerModel
MOVE A2 V0 ; Face current space (south)

JAL PlaySound
LI A0 0x128 ; Swoosh sound

JAL SleepProcess
LI A0 50 ; Wait 50 frames for sound

;===Check for Empty Item Slot===
JAL PlayerHasEmptyItemSlot
LBU A0 0x1D(S0) ; Check if current player has empty item slot

BLTZ V0 GetNothing ; If V0 < 0 (no empty slsots), get nothing
NOP
MOVE S4 V0 ; Copy V0 to S4

;===Get Current Player Placement===
JAL GetPlayerPlacement
LBU A0 0x1D(S0) ; Get current player placement (0-3) at V0
LI T0 16 ; Distance between chances tables
MULT V0 T0 ; Multiply V0 by T0
MFLO S3 ; Store the result in S3

;===Randomize Teacup Outcome===
JAL GetRandomByte ; Get random byte (0-255) at V0
NOP

SLTI T0 V0 85 ; T0 = 1 if V0 < 85
BNEZ T0 GetNothing ; If T0 = 1, get nothing
NOP
SLTI T0 V0 170 ; T0 = 1 if V0 < 170
BNEZ T0 GetBigItem ; If T0 = 1, get big item
NOP
; else, get small item

;===Get Small Item Tables===
LUI S2 hi(SmallItemChancesTables)
ADDIU S2 S2 lo(SmallItemChancesTables)
ADDU S2 S2 S3 ; Add distance between chances tables

LUI S3 hi(SmallItemTable)
J Randomizer
ADDIU S3 S3 lo(SmallItemTable)

;===Get Big Item Tables===
GetBigItem:
LUI S2 hi(BigItemChancesTables)
ADDIU S2 S2 lo(BigItemChancesTables)
ADDU S2 S2 S3 ; Add distance between chances tables

LUI S3 hi(BigItemTable)
ADDIU S3 S3 lo(BigItemTable)

;===Randomize Item===
Randomizer:
JAL GetRand
ORI A0 R0 99 ; Get random byte (0-99) at V0

RandomLoop:
LBU S5 0(S3) ; Load item value into S5
LBU T2 0(S2) ; Load chance value into T2
SLT T0 V0 T2 ; If V0 < T2, T0 = 1
BNEZ T0 GetOutcome ; If T0 = 1, select outcome
NOP
ADDIU S2 S2 1 ; Add 1 to chances table to check next chance value
J RandomLoop
ADDIU S3 S3 1 ; Add 1 to item table to select next item

;===Fade-In and Receive Item===
GetOutcome:
LI A0 12 ; Assigns Boo fade-in
JAL InitFadeIn ; Fade from black
LI A1 16 ; Assigns 16 frames of fade-in

JAL SleepProcess
LI A0 17 ; Wait 17 frames for fade-in

ADDU S4 S0 S4 ; Add empty item slot offset to player struct
SB S5 0x18(S4) ; Store item into empty slot offset of player struct

JAL PlaySound
LI A0 0x10C ; Turn Start sound

LI T0 0x01 ; Skeleton Key index
BNE S5 T0 FormatItemMessage ; If item isn't a key, format item message
NOP
LBU T0 0x1E(S0) ; Load ticket star from offset of player struct
ADDIU T0 T0 1 ; Add 1 to ticket star
SB T0 0x1E(S0) ; Store ticket star into offset of player struct

;===Format Item Message===
FormatItemMessage:
LUI T0 hi(ItemStrings)
ADDIU T0 T0 lo(ItemStrings)
SLL T1 S5 5 ; Multiply item index by 32 (distance between item strings)
ADDU S5 T0 T1 ; S4 now contains item string pointer

LUI A0 hi(ItemMessageHolder)
ADDIU A0 A0 lo(ItemMessageHolder) ; Parse destination
LUI A1 hi(GetItemMessage)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(GetItemMessage) ; String formatter (%s)
MOVE A2 S5 ; Convert item string to text
JAL sprintf ; Converts to text string
LI A3 0 ; Terminator byte

;===Item Message===
LI A0 -1 ; No image
LUI A1 hi(ItemMessageHolder)
JAL CallMessage
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(ItemMessageHolder) ; Display ItemMessage with strings

;===Play Happy Voice and Animation===
LBU A0 3(S0) ; Load character value from offset of player struct
JAL PlaySound
ADDIU A0 A0 0x2BE ; Add character value to Mario's happy voice
; Character voices are their "character value" distance away from
; Mario's, e.g. Luigi's character value = 1, so Luigi's happy voice
; is 1 away from Mario's.
; 0x2BE = Happy Voice, 0x287 = Sad Voice

LI A0 -1 ; Set current player
LI A1 5 ; Set joy animation
JAL SetBoardPlayerAnimation
LI A2 0 ; Do not loop animation

JAL SleepProcess
LI A0 40 ; Wait 40 frames for animation

J exit
NOP

;===Get Nothing===
GetNothing:
LI A0 12 ; Assigns Boo fade-in
JAL InitFadeIn ; Fade from black
LI A1 16 ; Assigns 16 frames of fade-in

JAL SleepProcess
LI A0 17 ; Wait 17 frames for fade-in

JAL PlaySound
LI A0 0x257 ; Boo laugh

exit:
LI A0 0x7 ; Boo image
LUI A1 hi(EndingMessage)
JAL CallMessage
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(EndingMessage) ; Display EndingMessage

JAL 0x800DB884 ; ShowDiceRoll
LBU A0 0x1D(S0) ; Pass current player index on A0

JAL SleepProcess
LI A0 10 ; Wait 10 frames for dice roll to show

LW RA 76(SP)
LW S0 72(SP)
LW S1 68(SP)
LW S2 64(SP)
LW S3 60(SP)
LW S4 56(SP)
LW S5 52(SP)
JR RA
ADDIU SP SP 80

;===Mini Func to Call Message===
.align 4
CallMessage:
ADDIU SP SP -40
SW RA 36(SP)

; A0 = Character Image
; A1 = Message Address
; Character image (-1 for none, 0x7 for Boo)
; Visit the following link to get the full list of Character Images
; https://github.com/PartyPlanner64/PartyPlanner64/wiki/Displaying-Messages
; If you use a character image, check the bottom of the code

SW R0 16(SP) ; A4
SW R0 20(SP) ; A5
SW R0 24(SP) ; A6
LI A2 0
JAL ShowMessage
LI A3 0

; Obligatory message box closing/cleanup calls.
JAL 0x800EC9DC
NOP
JAL CloseMessage
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6EC
NOP

LW RA 36(SP)
JR RA
ADDIU SP SP 40

;===Mini Func to Get Random Byte===
.align 4
GetRand: ; returns on V0

; A0 = max byte

ADDIU sp, sp, -0x18
SW ra, 0x0010 (sp)
BLTZL a0, label1_func0
SUBU a0, r0, a0
label1_func0:
BEQZ a0, End1
DADDU v0, r0, r0
ADDIU v0, r0, 0x0001
BNEL a0, v0, label2_func0
ADDIU v0, r0, 0x0064
JAL Function1
ADDIU a0, r0, 0x03E8
SLTI v0, v0, 0x01F5
J End1
XORI v0, v0, 0x0001
label2_func0:
BEQ a0, v0, label3_func0
NOP
JAL Function1
NOP
J End1
NOP
label3_func0:
JAL Function1
ADDIU a0, r0, 0x03F1
LUI v1, 0x6666
ORI v1, v1, 0x6667
MULT v0, v1
SRA v0, v0, 31
MFHI a1
SRA v1, a1, 2
SUBU v0, v1, v0
End1:
LW ra, 0x0010 (sp)
JR RA
ADDIU sp, sp, 0x18
//
Function1:
ADDIU sp, sp, -0x20
SW s0, 0x0010 (sp)
ADDIU s0, r0, 0xFFFF
SW s1, 0x0014 (sp)
ADDIU s1, a0, 0x0001
BNEZ s1, label1_func1
DIVU s0, s1
BREAK 0x01C00
label1_func1:
MFLO s0
BNEZ s0, label2_func1
SW ra, 0x0018 (sp)
ADDIU s0, r0, 0x0001
label2_func1:
JAL Function2
NOP
BNEZ s0, label3_func1
DIVU v0, s0
BREAK 0x01C00
label3_func1:
MFLO v1
SLTU v0, v1, s1
BEQZ v0, label2_func1
DADDU v0, v1, r0
LW ra, 0x0018 (sp)
LW s1, 0x0014 (sp)
LW s0, 0x0010 (sp)
JR RA
ADDIU sp, sp, 0x20
//
Function2:
LUI v0, 0x8009
LW v0, 0x7650 (v0)
LUI v1, 0x41C6
ORI v1, v1, 0x4E6D
MULT v0, v1
MFLO v0
ADDIU v0, v0, 0x3039
LUI v1, 0x8009
JR RA
SW v0, 0x7650 (v1)

.ascii "Which teacup will you ride in"

.byte 0x0A,0x0A ; Two new lines

Fear House v3.1 (Chocolate).code:
; NAME: Fear House v3.1 (Chocolate)
; GAMES: MP3_USA
; EXECUTION: Direct
; PARAM: Space|FearHouse

ADDIU SP SP -80
SW RA 76(SP)
SW S0 72(SP)
SW S1 68(SP)

; S0 = Current Player Struct
; S1 = Coins to Gain / Lose

;===Hide Dice Roll===
JAL GetPlayerStruct
LI A0 -1 ; Get current player struct at V0
MOVE S0 V0 ; Copy V0 to S0

JAL 0x800DBEC0 ; HideDiceRoll
LBU A0 0x1D(S0) ; Pass current player index on A0

JAL 0x800F915C ; SetCameraType
LI A0 0 ; Stay where it is?

;===Set Player Idle Animation===
LI A0 -1 ; Set current player
LI A1 -1 ; Set idle animation
JAL SetBoardPlayerAnimation
LI A2 2 ; Loop the animation

;===Rotate Toward Fear House===
LI A0 -1 ; Set current player
LI A1 8 ; Rotate in 8 frames
JAL RotatePlayerModel
LI A2 FearHouse ; Face FearHouse

;===Check Player Coins===
LBU A0 0x1D(S0) ; Pass current player index on A0
JAL PlayerHasCoins
LI A1 5 ; Check for 5 coins

BEQZ V0 NoCoinsToPlay ; If V0 = 0, player does not have 5 coins
NOP

;===Entry Prompt===
JAL PlaySound
LI A0 0x257 ; Boo laugh

FirstPrompt:
LUI A0 hi(EntryPrompt)
ADDIU A0 A0 lo(EntryPrompt) ; Display EntryPrompt
LI A1 0
JAL CallPrompt
LI A2 0 ; Prompt flag

; Change the player's destination based on the choice.
BEQZ V0 FirstRound
NOP
LI T0 1
BEQ V0 T0 exit
NOP
; else pick "View map"
JAL ViewBoardMap
NOP
J FirstPrompt
NOP

;===First Round===
FirstRound:
LBU A0 0x1D(S0) ; Take coins from current player
JAL CoinChange
LI A1 -5 ; Subtract 5 coins

JAL PlaySound
LI A0 0x257 ; Boo laugh

LUI A0 hi(IntroMessage)
ADDIU A0 A0 lo(IntroMessage) ; Display IntroMessage
JAL CallMessage
LI A1 0

;===Randomize 1st Question===
JAL GetRand
ORI A0 R0 0x5 ; Get random byte from 0-5

BEQZ V0 Round1Prompt1
NOP
ADDIU V0 V0 -1
BEQZ V0 Round1Prompt2
NOP
ADDIU V0 V0 -1
BEQZ V0 Round1Prompt3
NOP
ADDIU V0 V0 -1
BEQZ V0 Round1Prompt4
NOP
ADDIU V0 V0 -1
BEQZ V0 Round1Prompt5
NOP
; else, get Prompt 6

;===Round 1 Prompt 6===
LUI A0 hi(Prompt6Round1)
ADDIU A0 A0 lo(Prompt6Round1)
LI A1 2 ; Correct option is 2
JAL CallPrompt
LI A2 1 ; Question flag

J CheckRound1
NOP

;===Round 1 Prompt 1===
Round1Prompt1:
LUI A0 hi(Prompt1Round1)
ADDIU A0 A0 lo(Prompt1Round1)
LI A1 0 ; Correct option is 0
JAL CallPrompt
LI A2 1 ; Question flag

J CheckRound1
NOP

;===Round 1 Prompt 2===
Round1Prompt2:

ADDIU A0 A0 lo(Prompt2Round1)
LI A1 1 ; Correct option is 1
JAL CallPrompt
LI A2 1 ; Question flag

NOP

JAL CallPrompt
LI A2 1 ; Question flag

;===Check Round 1 Answer===
CheckRound1:
BNE V0 V1 Fail
LI S1 5 ; Lose 5 coins
; else, player passed Round 1

;===Pass Round 1===
JAL HappySounds
MOVE A0 S0 ; Pass current player struct on A0

JAL PlaySound
LI A0 0x257 ; Boo laugh

LUI A0 hi(GetKeyMessage)
ADDIU A0 A0 lo(GetKeyMessage) ; Display GetKeyMessage
JAL CallMessage
LI A1 0

;===Check for Empty Slots===
JAL PlayerHasEmptyItemSlot
LBU A0 0x1D(S0) ; Pass current player index on A0

BLTZ V0 GetCoinsInstead ; If V0 < 0 (no empty slots), get coins
NOP

;===Get Key===
ADDU V0 V0 S0 ; Add empty slot offset of player struct
LI T0 0x01 ; Skeleton Key index
SB T0 0x18(V0) ; Store item into empty slot offset of player struct

LBU T0 0x1E(S0) ; Load ticket star from offset of player struct
ADDIU T0 T0 1 ; Add 1 to ticket star

NOP

LW RA 76(SP)

LW S1 68(SP)
JR RA
ADDIU SP SP 80

;===Prep for Displaying Coin String===
.align 16
percent_d:
.asciiz "%d" ; 0x25640000

.align 16
CoinString:
.fill 8

;===Mini Func to Call Prompt===
.align 4
CallPrompt:
ADDIU SP SP -48
SW RA 44(SP)
SW S0 40(SP)
SW S1 36(SP)
SW S2 32(SP)

; A0 = Message Prompt
; A1 / S0 / V1 = Correct Option
; A2 / S1 = Prompt or Question Flag
; S2 / V0 = Chosen Option

MOVE S1 A2 ; Copy A2 to S1
MOVE S0 A1 ; Copy A1 to S0
MOVE A1 A0 ; Copy A0 to A1
SW R0 16(SP) ; A4
SW R0 20(SP) ; A5
SW R0 24(SP) ; A6
LI A0 0x7 ; Character image (-1 for none, 0x7 for Boo)
; Visit the following link to get the full list of Character Images
; https://github.com/PartyPlanner64/PartyPlanner64/wiki/Displaying-Messages
; If you use a character image, check the bottom of the code
LI A2 0
JAL ShowMessage
LI A3 0

JAL RNGPercentChance
LI A0 25 ; 25% chance of V0 = 1

BEQZ S1 SkipLogic
NOP

JAL AILogic
MOVE A0 S0 ; Pass correct option on A0

SkipLogic:
; Get the selection, either from the player or CPU.
; If A0 is a pointer to AI data, AI logic is ran to pick for CPUs.
; If A0 is 0 or 1, the 0th or 1st option is chosen by CPUs.
; If A0 is 2, then the value of A1 is the CPUs option index choice.
LI A0 2
JAL GetBasicPromptSelection
MOVE A1 V0 ; A1 now has the AI's decision
MOVE S2 V0 ; S2 now has the chosen option index

; Obligatory message box closing/cleanup calls.
JAL CloseMessage
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6EC
NOP

MOVE V0 S2 ; Copy S2 to V0
MOVE V1 S0 ; Copy S0 to V1

LW RA 44(SP)
LW S0 40(SP)
LW S1 36(SP)
LW S2 32(SP)
JR RA
ADDIU SP SP 48

;===Mini Func to Determine AI Logic===
.align 4
AILogic:
ADDIU SP SP -40
SW RA 36(SP)
SW S0 32(SP)

; A0 / S0 = Correct Option

MOVE S0 A0 ; Copy A0 to S0
JAL GetPlayerStruct
LI A0 -1 ; Get current player struct at at V0

LBU T0 0x1(V0) ; Load CPU difficulty into T0
LI T1 25
MULT T0 T1 ; Multiply T0 by T1
MFLO A0 ; Move result into A0
JAL RNGPercentChance
NOP
BNEZL V0 AIExit ; If V0 = 1, select correct option
MOVE V0 S0 ; CPU will pick correct option (on likely)
; else, CPU will pick wrong option
BEQL S0 R0 AIExit ; If 0th option is correct, pick above
ADDIU V0 S0 2 ; Add 2 to S0 (pick 2 options above) (on likely)
J AIExit
ADDIU V0 S0 -1 ; Subtract 1 from S0 (pick option below)

AIExit:
LW RA 36(SP)
LW S0 32(SP)
JR RA
ADDIU SP SP 40

;===Mini Func to Get Random Byte===
.align 4
GetRand: ; returns on V0

; A0 = max byte

ADDIU sp, sp, -0x18
SW ra, 0x0010 (sp)
BLTZL a0, label1_func0
SUBU a0, r0, a0
label1_func0:
BEQZ a0, End1
DADDU v0, r0, r0
ADDIU v0, r0, 0x0001
BNEL a0, v0, label2_func0
ADDIU v0, r0, 0x0064
JAL Function1
ADDIU a0, r0, 0x03E8
SLTI v0, v0, 0x01F5
J End1
XORI v0, v0, 0x0001
label2_func0:
BEQ a0, v0, label3_func0
NOP
JAL Function1
NOP
J End1
NOP
label3_func0:
JAL Function1
ADDIU a0, r0, 0x03F1
LUI v1, 0x6666
ORI v1, v1, 0x6667
MULT v0, v1
SRA v0, v0, 31
MFHI a1
SRA v1, a1, 2
SUBU v0, v1, v0
End1:
LW ra, 0x0010 (sp)
JR RA
ADDIU sp, sp, 0x18
//
Function1:
ADDIU sp, sp, -0x20
SW s0, 0x0010 (sp)
ADDIU s0, r0, 0xFFFF
SW s1, 0x0014 (sp)
ADDIU s1, a0, 0x0001
BNEZ s1, label1_func1
DIVU s0, s1
BREAK 0x01C00
label1_func1:
MFLO s0
BNEZ s0, label2_func1
SW ra, 0x0018 (sp)
ADDIU s0, r0, 0x0001
label2_func1:
JAL Function2
NOP
BNEZ s0, label3_func1
DIVU v0, s0
BREAK 0x01C00
label3_func1:
MFLO v1
SLTU v0, v1, s1
BEQZ v0, label2_func1
DADDU v0, v1, r0
LW ra, 0x0018 (sp)
LW s1, 0x0014 (sp)
LW s0, 0x0010 (sp)
JR RA
ADDIU sp, sp, 0x20
//
Function2:
LUI v0, 0x8009
LW v0, 0x7650 (v0)
LUI v1, 0x41C6
ORI v1, v1, 0x4E6D
MULT v0, v1
MFLO v0
ADDIU v0, v0, 0x3039
LUI v1, 0x8009
JR RA
SW v0, 0x7650 (v1)

;===Mini Func to Play Happy Effects===
.align 4
HappySounds:
ADDIU SP SP -40
SW RA 36(SP)
SW S0 32(SP)

; A0 / S0 = Current Player Struct

MOVE S0 A0 ; Copy A0 to S0
JAL PlaySound
LI A0 0x3EC ; Drumroll sound

JAL SleepProcess
LI A0 25 ; Wait 25 frames for sound

JAL PlaySound
LI A0 0x3ED ; Drumroll end sound

JAL SleepProcess
LI A0 25 ; Wait 25 frames for sound

JAL PlaySound
LI A0 0x419 ; Fanfare (Curtain Call)

LBU A0 3(S0) ; Load character value from offset of player struct
JAL PlaySound
ADDIU A0 A0 0x2BE ; Add character value to Mario's happy voice
; Character voices are their "character value" distance away from
; Mario's, e.g. Luigi's character value = 1, so Luigi's happy voice
; is 1 away from Mario's.
; 0x2BE = Happy Voice, 0x287 = Sad Voice

LI A0 -1 ; Set current player
LI A1 5 ; Set joy animation
JAL SetBoardPlayerAnimation
LI A2 0 ; Do not loop animation

JAL SleepProcess
LI A0 40 ; Wait 40 frames for animation

LW RA 36(SP)
LW S0 32(SP)
JR RA
ADDIU SP SP 40

;===Mini Func to Play Sad Effects===
.align 4
SadSounds:
ADDIU SP SP -40
SW RA 36(SP)
SW S0 32(SP)

; A0 / S0 = Current Player Struct

MOVE S0 A0 ; Copy A0 to S0
JAL PlaySound
LI A0 0x3EC ; Drumroll sound

JAL SleepProcess
LI A0 25 ; Wait 25 frames for sound

JAL PlaySound
LI A0 0x3ED ; Drumroll end sound

JAL SleepProcess
LI A0 25 ; Wait 25 frames for sound

JAL PlaySound
LI A0 0x40F ; Buzzer sound

LBU A0 3(S0) ; Load character value from offset of player struct
JAL PlaySound
ADDIU A0 A0 0x287 ; Add character value to Mario's happy voice
; Character voices are their "character value" distance away from
; Mario's, e.g. Luigi's character value = 1, so Luigi's happy voice
; is 1 away from Mario's.
; 0x2BE = Happy Voice, 0x287 = Sad Voice

LI A0 -1 ; Set current player
LI A1 3 ; Set lose animation
JAL SetBoardPlayerAnimation
LI A2 0 ; Do not loop animation

JAL SleepProcess
LI A0 80 ; Wait 80 frames for animation

LW RA 36(SP)
LW S0 32(SP)
JR RA
ADDIU SP SP 40

;===Mini Func to Display Coin String in Message===
.align 4
PrepareString:
ADDIU SP SP -40
SW RA 36(SP)

; A0 = Coins to Lose / Gain

MOVE A2 A0 ; Pass coins to lose/gain on A2
LUI A0 hi(CoinString)
ADDIU A0 A0 lo(CoinString) ; Saves # of coins to CoinString
LUI A1 hi(percent_d)
JAL sprintf ; Converts a number to a text string
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(percent_d) ; String formatter

LW RA 36(SP)
JR RA
ADDIU SP SP 40

;===Mini Func to Call Message===
.align 4
CallMessage:
ADDIU SP SP -40
SW RA 36(SP)

; A0 = Message Address
; A1 = String #1

MOVE A2 A1 ; Copy A1 to A2
MOVE A1 A0 ; Copy A0 to A1
SW R0 16(SP) ; A4
SW R0 20(SP) ; A5
SW R0 24(SP) ; A6
LI A0 0x7 ; Character image (-1 for none, 0x7 for Boo)
; Visit the following link to get the full list of Character Images
; https://github.com/PartyPlanner64/PartyPlanner64/wiki/Displaying-Messages
; If you use a character image, check the bottom of the code
JAL ShowMessage
LI A3 0

; Obligatory message box closing/cleanup calls.
JAL 0x800EC9DC
NOP
JAL CloseMessage
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6EC
NOP

LW RA 36(SP)
JR RA
ADDIU SP SP 40

;===Mini Func to Give or Take Coins===
.align 4
CoinChange:
ADDIU SP SP -40
SW RA 36(SP)
SW S0 32(SP)
SW S1 28(SP)

; A0 / S0 = Current Player Index
; A1 / S1 = Coins to Gain or Lose

MOVE S0 A0 ; Set current player
JAL AdjustPlayerCoinsGradual
MOVE S1 A1 ; Set coins

MOVE A0 S0 ; Set current player
JAL ShowPlayerCoinChange
MOVE A1 S1 ; Set coins

JAL SleepProcess
LI A0 30 ; Wait 30 frames for coin change

LW RA 36(SP)
LW S0 32(SP)
LW S1 28(SP)
JR RA
ADDIU SP SP 40

; Here's a list of the most common bytes you'll need
; .byte 0x01 ; Black font
; .byte 0x03 ; Red font
; .byte 0x04 ; Purple font
; .byte 0x05 ; Green font
; .byte 0x06 ; Blue font

; .byte 0xC2 ; Exclamation mark (!)
; .byte 0xC3 ; Question mark (?)
; .byte 0x82 ; Comma (,)
; .byte 0x0A ; New line (writes below)
; .byte 0x5C ; Apostrophe (')
; .byte 0x29 ; Coin icon
; .byte 0x3D ; Minus (-)
; .byte 0x3E ; Multiply (x)
; .byte 0xFF,0 ; Wait, press A to confirm

; If your message has an image, use this at the start of each line
; .byte 0x1A,0x1A,0x1A,0x1A ; Padding for character image

Magic Show v3.1 (Chocolate).code:
; NAME: Magic Show v3.1 (Chocolate)
; GAMES: MP3_USA
; EXECUTION: Direct
; PARAM: Space|MagicShow

ADDIU SP SP -80
SW RA 76(SP)
SW S0 72(SP)
SW S1 68(SP)
SW S2 64(SP)
SW S3 60(SP)
SW S4 56(SP)
SW S5 52(SP)

; S0 = Current Player Struct
; S1 = Chosen Option / Item Slot to Remove/Replace
; S2 = Empty Item Slot / Chosen Item
; S3 = Initial Chances/Item Value Table (KamekPricesTable/BooItemsTable) / Prize (Coins)
; S4 = Happy Voice Flag
; S5 = Good/Bad Message Address / Boo Item Value Table (0-4)

;===Rotate Toward MagicShow===
LI A0 -1 ; Set current player
LI A1 8 ; Rotate in 8 frames
JAL RotatePlayerModel
LI A2 MagicShow ; Face MagicShow

;===Get Current Player Struct===
JAL GetPlayerStruct
LI A0 -1 ; Get current player struct at V0
MOVE S0 V0 ; Copy V0 to S0

;===Check Player Inventory===
JAL PlayerHasEmptyItemSlot
LBU A0 0x1D(S0) ; Pass current player index on A0

BEQZ V0 NoItems ; If slot #1 is empty, go to NoItems
NOP
MOVE S2 V0 ; Copy V0 to S2

;===Main Prompt===
JAL PlaySound
LI A0 0x257 ; Boo laugh

StartMainPrompt:
LBU A0 0x1D(S0) ; Pass current player index on A0
JAL PlayerHasCoins
LI A1 20 ; Check for 20 coins
; If CPU has 20 coins, pick Boo, else pick Kamek

MOVE A0 V0 ; Copy V0 to A0
LUI A1 hi(MainPrompt)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(MainPrompt) ; Display MainPrompt
LI A2 0 ; Do not disable options
JAL CallPrompt
LI A3 -1 ; Empty slot

; Change the player's destination based on the choice.
BEQZ V0 StartKamek
NOP
LI T0 1
BEQ V0 T0 StartBoo
NOP
; else pick "View map"
JAL ViewBoardMap
NOP
J StartMainPrompt
NOP

;===Start Kamek's Show===
StartKamek:
LUI A0 hi(KamekPrompt)
ADDIU A0 A0 lo(KamekPrompt) ; Pass KamekPrompt on A0
JAL PrepareItemStrings
MOVE A1 S0 ; Pass current player struct on A1

;===Kamek Prompt===
JAL PlaySound
LI A0 0x257 ; Boo laugh

BLTZ S2 Choose3KamekItems
NOP
; else, player has 1 or 2 items
JAL GetRand
ADDIU A0 S2 -1 ; Choose randomly from items for CPU
J StartKamekPrompt
NOP
Choose3KamekItems:
JAL GetRand
ORI A0 R0 2 ; Choose between item 0-2

StartKamekPrompt:
MOVE A0 V0 ; Pass item slot on A0
LUI A1 hi(PromptHolder)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(PromptHolder) ; Display Prompt with strings
LI A2 1 ; Check to disable options
JAL CallPrompt
MOVE A3 S2 ; Pass empty slot on A3

MOVE S1 V0 ; Prompt choice

; Change the player's destination based on the choice.
SLTI T0 S1 3 ; If S1 < 3, T0 = 1
BNEZ T0 KamekItem
NOP
LI T0 3
BEQ S1 T0 StartMainPrompt
NOP
; else pick "View map"
JAL ViewBoardMap
NOP
J StartKamekPrompt
NOP

;===Kamek Item===
KamekItem:
LI A0 4 ; Assigns Happening fade-out
JAL InitFadeOut ; Fade to black
LI A1 16 ; Assigns 16 frames of fade-out

JAL SleepProcess
LI A0 17 ; Wait 17 frames for fade-out

ADDU S1 S1 S0 ; Add item offset of player struct
LBU S2 0x18(S1) ; Load item from offset of player struct
LI T0 0xFF ; No item value
SB T0 0x18(S1) ; Store no item into item slot

;===Randomize Prices Table===
JAL GetPlayerPlacement
LBU A0 0x1D(S0) ; Get current player placement (0,1,2,3) at V0
SUBU V0 R0 V0 ; Invert (0,-1,-2,-3)
ADDIU V0 V0 3 ; Add 3 (3,2,1,0)
LI T0 5
MULT V0 T0 ; Multiply V0 by T0
MFLO V0 ; Move result into V0
ADDIU V0 V0 5 ; Base chances (10,15,20,25)

LUI S3 hi(KamekPricesTable)
ADDIU S3 S3 lo(KamekPricesTable)
ADDU S3 S2 S3 ; Add item offset to KamekPricesTable
LBU S3 0(S3) ; Load item price into S3

JAL RNGPercentChance
ADDU A0 V0 S3 ; Add item chance and base chance

BNEZ V0 GetBadPrices ; If V0 = 1, go to GetBadPrices
NOP
; else, get good prices

JAL PlaySound
LI A0 0x143 ; Successful magic sound

JAL SleepProcess
LI A0 30 ; Wait 30 frames for sound

;===Convert Item to Coins===
SLL S3 S3 1 ; Multiply price by 2
J KamekFadeIn
LI S4 0 ; Play happy voice and animation

GetBadPrices:
JAL PlaySound
LI A0 0x153 ; Failed magic sound

JAL SleepProcess
LI A0 30 ; Wait 30 frames for sound

LUI S3 hi(KamekBadPricesTable)
ADDIU S3 S3 lo(KamekBadPricesTable)
ADDU S3 S2 S3 ; Add item offset to KamekBadPricesTable
LBU S3 0(S3) ; Load bad item price into S3
LI S4 1 ; Skip happy voice and animation

;===Converted Item to Coins===
KamekFadeIn:
LI A0 4 ; Assigns Happening fade-in
JAL InitFadeIn ; Fade from black
LI A1 16 ; Assigns 16 frames of fade-in

JAL SleepProcess
LI A0 17 ; Wait 17 frames for fade-in

JAL FixUpPlayerItemSlots
LBU A0 0x1D(S0) ; Pass current player index on A0
JAL FixUpPlayerItemSlots
LBU A0 0x1D(S0) ; Pass current player index on A0
JAL RefreshHUD
LBU A0 0x1D(S0) ; Pass current player index on A0

LBU A0 0x1D(S0) ; Give current player coins
JAL AdjustPlayerCoinsGradual
MOVE A1 S3 ; Give coins

LBU A0 0x1D(S0) ; Give current player coins
JAL ShowPlayerCoinChange
MOVE A1 S3 ; Give coins

JAL SleepProcess
LI A0 30 ; Wait 30 frames for coin change

LUI S5 hi(BadAfterKamekMessage)
BNEZ S4 AfterKamek
ADDIU S5 S5 lo(BadAfterKamekMessage) ; Display BadAfterKamekMessage
; else, got good results

JAL HappyVoice
MOVE A0 S0 ; Copy S0 to A0
LUI S5 hi(AfterKamekMessage)
ADDIU S5 S5 lo(AfterKamekMessage) ; Display AfterKamekMessage

;===After Kamek Message===
AfterKamek:
LUI A0 hi(CoinString)
ADDIU A0 A0 lo(CoinString) ; Saves # of coins to CoinString
LUI A1 hi(percent_d)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(percent_d) ; String formatter
JAL sprintf ; Converts a number to a text string
MOVE A2 S3 ; Converts the number of coins to a string

LI T0 7 ; Distance between 0x257 and 0x25E
MULT S4 T0 ; Multiply S4 by T0
MFLO A0 ; Store result in A0
JAL PlaySound
ADDIU A0 A0 0x257 ; Get Boo laugh or Boo cry

MOVE A0 S5
LUI A1 hi(CoinString)
JAL CallMessage
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(CoinString) ; Load CoinString into string #1

J exit
NOP

;===Start Boo's Show===
StartBoo:
LUI A0 hi(BooPrompt)
ADDIU A0 A0 lo(BooPrompt) ; Pass BooPrompt on A0
JAL PrepareItemStrings
MOVE A1 S0 ; Pass current player struct on A1

;===Boo Prompt===
JAL PlaySound
LI A0 0x257 ; Boo laugh

BLTZ S2 Choose3BooItems
NOP
; else, player has 1 or 2 items
JAL GetRand
ADDIU A0 S2 -1 ; Choose randomly from items for CPU
J StartBooPrompt
NOP
Choose3BooItems:
JAL GetRand
ORI A0 R0 2 ; Choose between item 0-2

StartBooPrompt:
MOVE A0 V0 ; Pass item slot on A0
LUI A1 hi(PromptHolder)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(PromptHolder) ; Display Prompt with strings
LI A2 1 ; Check to disable options
JAL CallPrompt
MOVE A3 S2 ; Pass empty slot on A3

MOVE S1 V0 ; Prompt choice

; Change the player's destination based on the choice.
SLTI T0 S1 3 ; If S1 < 3, T0 = 1
BNEZ T0 BooItem
NOP
LI T0 3
BEQ S1 T0 StartMainPrompt
NOP
; else pick "View map"
JAL ViewBoardMap
NOP
J StartBooPrompt
NOP

;===Boo Item===
BooItem:
LI A0 4 ; Assigns Happening fade-out
JAL InitFadeOut ; Fade to black
LI A1 16 ; Assigns 16 frames of fade-out

JAL SleepProcess
LI A0 17 ; Wait 17 frames for fade-out

ADDU S1 S1 S0 ; Add item offset of player struct
LBU S2 0x18(S1) ; Load item from offset of player struct

;===Get Base Success Chance===
JAL GetPlayerPlacement
LBU A0 0x1D(S0) ; Get current player placement (0,1,2,3) at V0
LI T0 10
MULT V0 T0 ; Multiply V0 by T0
MFLO V0 ; Store result in V0
ADDIU V0 V0 25 ; Base chances (25,35,45,55)

;===Find Item Chance===
LUI S3 hi(BooItemsTable)
ADDIU S3 S3 lo(BooItemsTable)
LI S5 0 ; Checking Boo 5-Coin Items Table
PreBooTablesLoop:
MOVE T3 S3 ; Copy S3 to T3
LI T0 0 ; Set item check counter to 0

BooTablesLoop:
LBU T2 0(T3) ; Load item from value table
BEQ S2 T2 FoundBooItem ; If player's item is found, continue
NOP
LI T4 4 ; Check 5 items per table
BEQ T0 T4 CheckNextBooTable ; If all items in table checked, move on
NOP
ADDIU T3 T3 1 ; Add 1 to check next item
J BooTablesLoop
ADDIU T0 T0 1 ; Add 1 to counter

CheckNextBooTable:
ADDIU S5 S5 1 ; Add 1 to check next table
J PreBooTablesLoop
ADDIU S3 S3 16 ; Add distance between item value tables

;===Randomize Outcome===
FoundBooItem:
LBU T0 6(S3) ; Load chance value from current table into T0
JAL RNGPercentChance
ADDU A0 V0 T0 ; Add base chance and item chance

BEQZ V0 BooFail
NOP
; else, trade item for higher-value item

;===Boo Success===
JAL PlaySound
LI A0 0x143 ; Successful magic sound

JAL SleepProcess
LI A0 30 ; Wait 30 frames for sound

LI T3 4 ; Check if item is from rare item table
BEQ S5 T3 GetBooItem ; If item is rare item, skip upgrade
LI S4 0 ; Play happy voice and animation

J GetBooItem
ADDIU S3 S3 16 ; Add distance between item value tables

;===Boo Fail===
BooFail:
JAL PlaySound
LI A0 0x153 ; Failed magic sound

JAL SleepProcess
LI A0 30 ; Wait 30 frames for sound

BEQZ S5 GetBooItem ; If item is worth 5 coins, skip downgrade
LI S4 1 ; Skip happy voice and animation

ADDIU S3 S3 -16 ; Subtract distance between item value tables

;===Get Boo Item===
GetBooItem:
JAL GetRand
LBU A0 5(S3) ; Choose randomly between items in table

ADDU S3 S3 V0 ; Add random byte to item value table
LBU S2 0(S3) ; Load new item index from item value table

;===Boo Fade In===
LI A0 4 ; Assigns Happening fade-in
JAL InitFadeIn ; Fade from black
LI A1 16 ; Assigns 16 frames of fade-in

JAL SleepProcess
LI A0 17 ; Wait 17 frames for fade-in

SB S2 0x18(S1) ; Store new item into chosen item slot to replace
LI T1 0x01 ; Skeleton Key index
BNE S2 T1 AfterBooFadeIn ; If not key, continue
NOP
LBU T0 0x1E(S0) ; Load ticket star from offset of player struct
ADDIU T0 T0 1 ; Add 1 to ticket star
SB T0 0x1E(S0) ; Store ticket star into offset of player struct

AfterBooFadeIn:
JAL RefreshHUD
LBU A0 0x1D(S0) ; Pass current player index on A0

LUI S5 hi(BooFailMessage)
BNEZ S4 AfterBoo
ADDIU S5 S5 lo(BooFailMessage) ; Display BooFailMessage
; else, got good results

JAL HappyVoice
MOVE A0 S0 ; Copy S0 to A0
LUI S5 hi(BooSuccessMessage)
ADDIU S5 S5 lo(BooSuccessMessage) ; Display BooSuccessMessage

;===Prepare Item String===
LUI A0 hi(BooMessageHolder)
ADDIU A0 A0 lo(BooMessageHolder) ; Parse destination
MOVE A1 S5 ; String formatter (%s)
LUI A2 hi(ItemStrings)
ADDIU A2 A2 lo(ItemStrings)
SLL T0 S2 5 ; Multiply item index by 32 (distance between item strings)
ADDU A2 A2 T0 ; Add to get item string text to convert
JAL sprintf
LI A3 0 ; Terminator byte

LUI S5 hi(BooMessageHolder)
ADDIU S5 S5 lo(BooMessageHolder) ; Display BooMessage with strings

;===After Boo Message===
AfterBoo:
LI T0 7 ; Distance between 0x257 and 0x25E
MULT S4 T0 ; Multiply S4 by T0
MFLO A0 ; Store result in A0
JAL PlaySound
ADDIU A0 A0 0x257 ; Get Boo laugh or Boo cry

MOVE A0 S5 ; Display message
JAL CallMessage
LI A1 0

J exit
NOP

;===No Items Message===
NoItems:
JAL PlaySound
LI A0 0x25E ; Boo cry

LUI A0 hi(NoItemsMessage)
ADDIU A0 A0 lo(NoItemsMessage) ; Display NoItemsMessage
JAL CallMessage
LI A1 0

exit:
LW RA 76(SP)
LW S0 72(SP)
LW S1 68(SP)
LW S2 64(SP)
LW S3 60(SP)
LW S4 56(SP)
LW S5 52(SP)
JR RA
ADDIU SP SP 80

;===Prep for Displaying Coin String===
.align 16
percent_d:
.asciiz "%d" ; 0x25640000

.align 16
CoinString:
.fill 8

;===Mini Func to Call Prompt===
.align 4
CallPrompt:
ADDIU SP SP -48
SW RA 44(SP)
SW S0 40(SP)
SW S1 36(SP)
SW S2 32(SP)

; A0 / S0 / V0 = AI's Decision / Prompt Choice
; A1 = Prompt Address
; A2 / S1 = Target Flag (0 or 1)
; A3 / S2 = Empty Slot

MOVE S0 A0 ; Copy A0 to S0
MOVE S1 A2 ; Copy A2 to S1
MOVE S2 A3 ; Copy A3 to S2

SW R0 16(SP) ; A4
SW R0 20(SP) ; A5
SW R0 24(SP) ; A6
LI A0 0x7 ; Character image (-1 for none, 0x7 for Boo)
; Visit the following link to get the full list of Character Images
; https://github.com/PartyPlanner64/PartyPlanner64/wiki/Displaying-Messages
; If you use a character image, check the bottom of the code
LI A2 0
JAL ShowMessage
LI A3 0

BEQZ S1 SkipDisablePrompt ; If S1 = 0, skip DisablePrompt
NOP

; Pass window ID on A0
JAL DisablePrompt
MOVE A1 S2 ; Pass empty slot on A1

SkipDisablePrompt:
; Get the selection, either from the player or CPU.
; If A0 is a pointer to AI data, AI logic is ran to pick for CPUs.
; If A0 is 0 or 1, the 0th or 1st option is chosen by CPUs.
; If A0 is 2, then the value of A1 is the CPUs option index choice.
LI A0 2
JAL GetBasicPromptSelection
MOVE A1 S0 ; A1 now has the AI's decision
MOVE S0 V0 ; S0 now has the chosen option index

; Obligatory message box closing/cleanup calls.
JAL CloseMessage
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6EC
NOP

MOVE V0 S0 ; Copy S0 to V0

LW RA 44(SP)
LW S0 40(SP)
LW S1 36(SP)
LW S2 32(SP)
JR RA
ADDIU SP SP 48

;===Mini Func to Prepare Item Strings===
.align 4
PrepareItemStrings:
ADDIU SP SP -40
SW RA 36(SP)

; A0 = Message Address
; A1 = Current Player Struct

LUI A3 hi(BlueColor_ptr)
ADDIU A3 A3 lo(BlueColor_ptr) ; Default to blue font (item #2)
MOVE T5 A3 ; Copy A2 to T4 (item #3 font colour)

LUI T0 hi(ItemStrings)
ADDIU T0 T0 lo(ItemStrings)
LBU T1 0x18(A1) ; Load item #1 from offset of player struct
LBU T2 0x19(A1) ; Load item #2 from offset of player struct
LBU T3 0x1A(A1) ; Load item #3 from offset of player struct
LI T7 0xFF ; No item index

SLL A2 T1 5 ; Multiply by 32 (distance between item strings)
ADDU A2 T0 A2 ; A2 now contains item string #1 pointer

BEQ T2 T7 GetNullStringTwice ; If slot #2 empty, get null string twice
NOP

SLL T4 T2 5 ; Multiply by 32 (distance between item strings)
ADDU T4 T0 T4 ; T4 now contains item string #2 pointer

BEQ T3 T7 GetNullString ; If slot #3 empty, get null string
NOP

SLL T6 T3 5 ; Multiply by 32 (distance between item srings)
J FinalString
ADDU T6 T0 T6 ; T6 now contains item string #3 pointer

GetNullStringTwice:
LUI T4 hi(NullString)
ADDIU T4 T4 lo(NullString) ; Item #2 = null string
LUI A3 hi(BlackColor_ptr)
ADDIU A3 A3 lo(BlackColor_ptr) ; Use black font

GetNullString:
LUI T6 hi(NullString)
ADDIU T6 T6 lo(NullString) ; Item #3 = null string
LUI T5 hi(BlackColor_ptr)
ADDIU T5 T5 lo(BlackColor_ptr) ; Use black font

FinalString:
MOVE A1 A0 ; String formatter (%s) from message address
LUI A0 hi(PromptHolder)
ADDIU A0 A0 lo(PromptHolder) ; Parse destination
; A2 has item string #1
; A3 has item #2 font colour
SW T4 16(SP) ; Pass T4 to A4 of sprintf (item string #2)
SW T5 20(SP) ; Pass T5 to A5 of sprintf (item #3 font colour)
SW T6 24(SP) ; Pass T6 to A6 of sprintf (item string #3)
JAL sprintf ; Converts to text string
SW R0 28(SP) ; Terminator byte

LW RA 36(SP)
JR RA
ADDIU SP SP 40

.align 16
BlueColor_ptr:
.byte 0x06,0

.align 16
BlackColor_ptr:
.byte 0x01,0

;===Mini Func to Disable Prompt Options===
.align 4
DisablePrompt:
ADDIU SP SP -40
SW RA 36(SP)
SW S0 32(SP)
SW S1 28(SP)

; A0 / S0 = Window ID
; A1 / S1 = Empty Item Slot (0,1,2,-1)

BLTZ A1 DisablePromptExit ; If no empty slots, no need to disable
NOP
MOVE S0 A0 ; Copy A0 to S0
MOVE S1 A1 ; Copy A1 to S1

BNEZ S1 SkipZero
NOP
; Pass window ID on A0, 0th option on A1
JAL DisablePromptOption
NOP
ADDIU S1 S1 1

SkipZero:
LI T1 2
BEQ S1 T1 SkipOne
NOP

MOVE A0 S0 ; Copy S0 to A0
JAL DisablePromptOption
MOVE A1 S1 ; Disable 1st option
ADDIU S1 S1 1

SkipOne:
MOVE A0 S0 ; Copy S0 to A0
JAL DisablePromptOption
MOVE A1 S1 ; Disable 2nd option

DisablePromptExit:
LW RA 36(SP)
LW S0 32(SP)
LW S1 28(SP)
JR RA
ADDIU SP SP 40

;===Mini Func to Get Random Byte===
.align 4
GetRand: ; returns on V0

; A0 = max byte

ADDIU sp, sp, -0x18
SW ra, 0x0010 (sp)
BLTZL a0, label1_func0
SUBU a0, r0, a0
label1_func0:
BEQZ a0, End1
DADDU v0, r0, r0
ADDIU v0, r0, 0x0001
BNEL a0, v0, label2_func0
ADDIU v0, r0, 0x0064
JAL Function1
ADDIU a0, r0, 0x03E8
SLTI v0, v0, 0x01F5
J End1
XORI v0, v0, 0x0001
label2_func0:
BEQ a0, v0, label3_func0
NOP
JAL Function1
NOP
J End1
NOP
label3_func0:
JAL Function1
ADDIU a0, r0, 0x03F1
LUI v1, 0x6666
ORI v1, v1, 0x6667
MULT v0, v1
SRA v0, v0, 31
MFHI a1
SRA v1, a1, 2
SUBU v0, v1, v0
End1:
LW ra, 0x0010 (sp)
JR RA
ADDIU sp, sp, 0x18
//
Function1:
ADDIU sp, sp, -0x20
SW s0, 0x0010 (sp)
ADDIU s0, r0, 0xFFFF
SW s1, 0x0014 (sp)
ADDIU s1, a0, 0x0001
BNEZ s1, label1_func1
DIVU s0, s1
BREAK 0x01C00
label1_func1:
MFLO s0
BNEZ s0, label2_func1
SW ra, 0x0018 (sp)
ADDIU s0, r0, 0x0001
label2_func1:
JAL Function2
NOP
BNEZ s0, label3_func1
DIVU v0, s0
BREAK 0x01C00
label3_func1:
MFLO v1
SLTU v0, v1, s1
BEQZ v0, label2_func1
DADDU v0, v1, r0
LW ra, 0x0018 (sp)
LW s1, 0x0014 (sp)
LW s0, 0x0010 (sp)
JR RA
ADDIU sp, sp, 0x20
//
Function2:
LUI v0, 0x8009
LW v0, 0x7650 (v0)
LUI v1, 0x41C6
ORI v1, v1, 0x4E6D
MULT v0, v1
MFLO v0
ADDIU v0, v0, 0x3039
LUI v1, 0x8009
JR RA
SW v0, 0x7650 (v1)

;===Mini Func to Play Happy Voice and Animation===
.align 4
HappyVoice:
ADDIU SP SP -40
SW RA 36(SP)

; A0 = Current Player Struct

LBU A0 3(A0) ; Load character value from offset of player struct
JAL PlaySound
ADDIU A0 A0 0x2BE ; Add character value to Mario's happy voice
; Character voices are their "character value" distance away from
; Mario's, e.g. Luigi's character value = 1, so Luigi's happy voice
; is 1 away from Mario's.
; 0x2BE = Happy Voice, 0x287 = Sad Voice

LI A0 -1 ; Set current player
LI A1 5 ; Set joy animation
JAL SetBoardPlayerAnimation
LI A2 0 ; Do not loop animation

JAL SleepProcess
LI A0 40 ; Wait 40 frames for animation

LW RA 36(SP)
JR RA
ADDIU SP SP 40

;===Mini Func to Call Message===
.align 4
CallMessage:
ADDIU SP SP -40
SW RA 36(SP)

; A0 = Message Address
; A1 = String #1

MOVE A2 A1 ; Copy A1 to A2
MOVE A1 A0 ; Copy A0 to A1
SW R0 16(SP) ; A4
SW R0 20(SP) ; A5
SW R0 24(SP) ; A6
LI A0 0x7 ; Character image (-1 for none, 0x7 for Boo)
; Visit the following link to get the full list of Character Images
; https://github.com/PartyPlanner64/PartyPlanner64/wiki/Displaying-Messages
; If you use a character image, check the bottom of the code
JAL ShowMessage
LI A3 0

; Obligatory message box closing/cleanup calls.
JAL 0x800EC9DC
NOP
JAL CloseMessage
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6EC
NOP

LW RA 36(SP)
JR RA
ADDIU SP SP 40
