Enter Teacups v3.1.code:
; NAME: Enter Teacups v3.1
; GAMES: MP3_USA
; EXECUTION: Direct
; PARAM: Space|BooSpace
; PARAM: Space|TeacupsSpace
; PARAM: Space|TeacupsSpacePrev

ADDIU SP SP -40
SW RA 36(SP)
SW S0 32(SP)
SW S1 28(SP)

; S0 = Current Player Index
; S1 = Prompt Choice

;===Hide Dice Roll===
JAL GetCurrentPlayerIndex ; Get current player index at V0
NOP
MOVE S0 V0 ; Copy V0 to S0

JAL 0x800DBEC0 ; HideDiceRoll
MOVE A0 S0 ; Pass current player index on A0

;===Set Player Idle Animation===
LI A0 -1 ; Set current player
LI A1 -1 ; Set idle animation
JAL SetBoardPlayerAnimation
LI A2 2 ; Loop the animation

;===Rotate Toward Boo===
LI A0 -1 ; Set current player
LI A1 8 ; Rotate in 8 frames
JAL RotatePlayerModel
LI A2 BooSpace ; Rotate toward BooSpace

;===Display Prompt===
JAL PlaySound
LI A0 0x257 ; Boo laugh

MainPrompt:
SW R0 16(SP) ; A4
SW R0 20(SP) ; A5
SW R0 24(SP) ; A6
LI A0 0x7 ; Character image (-1 for none, 0x7 for Boo)
; Visit the following link to get the full list of Character Images
; https://github.com/PartyPlanner64/PartyPlanner64/wiki/Displaying-Messages
; If you use a character image, check the bottom of the code
LUI A1 hi(Prompt)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(Prompt) ; Display Prompt
LI A2 0
JAL ShowMessage
LI A3 0

JAL RNGPercentChance
LI A0 80 ; 80% chance of V0 = 1

; Get the selection, either from the player or CPU.
; If A0 is a pointer to AI data, AI logic is ran to pick for CPUs.
; If A0 is 0 or 1, the 0th or 1st option is chosen by CPUs.
; If A0 is 2, then the value of A1 is the CPUs option index choice.
LI A0 2
JAL GetBasicPromptSelection
MOVE A1 V0 ; A1 now has the AI's decision
MOVE S1 V0 ; S1 now has the chosen option index

; Obligatory message box closing/cleanup calls.
JAL CloseMessage
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6EC
NOP

; Change the player's destination based on the choice.
BEQZ S1 EnterTeacups
NOP
LI T0 1
BEQ S1 T0 exit
NOP
; else pick "View map"
JAL ViewBoardMap
NOP
J MainPrompt
NOP

;===Check Player Coins===
EnterTeacups:
MOVE A0 S0 ; Pass current player index on A0
JAL PlayerHasCoins
LI A1 5 ; Check if player has 5 coins

BEQZ V0 CannotPay ; If V0 = 0, player does not have 5 coins
NOP

;===Take Coins===
MOVE A0 S0 ; Take coins from current player
JAL AdjustPlayerCoinsGradual
LI A1 -5 ; Subtract 5 coins

MOVE A0 S0 ; Take coins from current player
JAL ShowPlayerCoinChange
LI A1 -5 ; Subtract 5 coins

JAL SleepProcess
LI A0 30 ; Wait 30 frames for coin change

;===Set Player Onto Teacups Path===
LI A0 -1 ; Set current player
LI A1 TeacupsSpace_chain_index
JAL SetNextChainAndSpace
LI A2 TeacupsSpace_chain_space_index

LI A0 -1 ; Set current player
LI A1 TeacupsSpacePrev_chain_index
JAL SetPrevChainAndSpace
LI A2 TeacupsSpacePrev_chain_space_index

J exit
NOP

;===No Coins Message===
CannotPay:
JAL PlaySound
LI A0 0x25E ; Boo cry

SW R0 16(SP) ; A4
SW R0 20(SP) ; A5
SW R0 24(SP) ; A6
LI A0 0x7 ; Character image (-1 for none, 0x7 for Boo)
; Visit the following link to get the full list of Character Images
; https://github.com/PartyPlanner64/PartyPlanner64/wiki/Displaying-Messages
; If you use a character image, check the bottom of the code
LUI A1 hi(NoCoinsMessage)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(NoCoinsMessage) ; Display NoCoinsMessage
LI A2 0
JAL ShowMessage
LI A3 0

; Obligatory message box closing/cleanup calls.
JAL 0x800EC9DC
NOP
JAL CloseMessage
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6EC
NOP

exit:
JAL 0x800DB884 ; ShowDiceRoll
MOVE A0 S0 ; Pass current player index on A0

JAL SleepProcess
LI A0 10 ; Wait 10 frames for dice roll to show

LW RA 36(SP)
LW S0 32(SP)
LW S1 28(SP)
JR RA
ADDIU SP SP 40

;===Message Text===
.align 16
Prompt:
.byte 0x1A,0x1A,0x1A,0x1A ; Padding for character image
.ascii "Welcome to the"
.byte 0x0A,0x1A,0x1A,0x1A,0x1A ; New line + character image padding
.ascii "Swirling Boo Buddies ride"
.byte 0xC2 ; Exclamation mark (!)
.byte 0x0A,0x1A,0x1A,0x1A,0x1A ; New line + character image padding
.ascii "You could win a"
.byte 0x06 ; Blue font
.ascii " ticket"
.byte 0x08,0x82 ; White font, Comma (,)
.ascii " or"
.byte 0x0A,0x1A,0x1A,0x1A,0x1A ; New line + character image padding
.ascii "maybe even something else"
.byte 0xC2 ; Exclamation mark (!)
.byte 0x0A,0x1A,0x1A,0x1A,0x1A ; New line + character image padding
.ascii "Would you like to try"
.byte 0xC3 ; Question mark (?)
.byte 0x0A,0x0A ; Two new lines
.byte 0x1A,0x1A,0x1A,0x1A,0x1A,0x1A ; Character image + option indent
.byte 0x0C ; Start option
.ascii "Sign me up"
.byte 0xC2 ; Exclamation mark (!)
.byte 0x1A,0x1A ; Tabs
.byte 0x29,0x3E ; Coin icon, Multiply (x)
.ascii " 5"
.byte 0x0D ; End option
.byte 0x0A ; New line (writes below)
.byte 0x1A,0x1A,0x1A,0x1A,0x1A,0x1A ; Character image + option indent
.byte 0x0C ; Start option
.ascii "Maybe next time"
.byte 0x85 ; Period (.)
.byte 0x0D ; End option
.byte 0x0A ; New line (writes below)
.byte 0x1A,0x1A,0x1A,0x1A,0x1A,0x1A ; Character image + option indent
.byte 0x0C ; Start option
.ascii "View map"
.byte 0x0D ; End option
.byte 0 ; End prompt

.align 16
NoCoinsMessage:
.byte 0x1A,0x1A,0x1A,0x1A ; Padding for character image
.ascii "Hey"
.byte 0xC2 ; Exclamation mark (!)
.ascii " You need"
.byte 0x07 ; Yellow font
.ascii " coins"
.byte 0x08 ; White font
.ascii " for this ride"
.byte 0xC2 ; Exclamation mark (!)
.byte 0xFF,0 ; Wait, press A to confirm

; Here's a list of the most common bytes you'll need
; .byte 0x01 ; Black font
; .byte 0x03 ; Red font

; .byte 0x08 ; White font
; .byte 0x85 ; Period (.)
; .byte 0xC2 ; Exclamation mark (!)
; .byte 0xC3 ; Question mark (?)
; .byte 0x82 ; Comma (,)
; .byte 0x0A ; New line (writes below)
; .byte 0x5C ; Apostrophe (')
; .byte 0x29 ; Coin icon

Rules of the Board (KBC).code:
; NAME: Rules of the Board (KBC)
; GAMES: MP3_USA
; EXECUTION: Direct
; PARAM: Boolean|ChocolateRules
; PARAM: Boolean|ActivateRules

; This event is adapted from Spongyoshi's "Rules of the Board" event.
; If you'd like to use this event on your board, please refer to
; Spongyoshi's original version.

; If you don't want the rules prompt to appear at the start of the
; game, set the parameter "ActivateRules" to "false". The parameter
; "ChocolateRules" is set to "false" for the Vanilla version of the
; board, and "true" for the Chocolate version.

ADDIU SP SP -32
SW RA 28(SP)

;===Check to Activate Rules===
LI T0 ActivateRules
BEQZ T0 exit ; If ActivateRules is turned OFF, exit
NOP

;===Check the Turn Count===
LUI T0 hi(current_turn)
ADDIU T0 T0 lo(current_turn)
LBU T0 0(T0) ; Load current turn into T0
LI T1 1
BNE T0 T1 exit ; If it's not turn 1, exit
NOP

;===Greeting Prompt===
JAL PlaySound
LI A0 0x257 ; Boo laugh

LI A0 0 ; No string
LUI A1 hi(GreetingPrompt)
JAL CallPrompt
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(GreetingPrompt) ; Display GreetingPrompt

; Change the outcome based on the choice.
BEQZ V0 Bye
NOP
; else, pick Rules

;===Greeting Message===
LUI A0 hi(GreetingMessage)
JAL CallMessage
ADDIU A0 A0 lo(GreetingMessage) ; Display GreetingMessage

;===Rules Prompt===
Rules:
JAL PlaySound
LI A0 0x257 ; Boo laugh

JAL GetCurrentPlayerIndex ; Get current player index at V0
NOP
JAL GetPlayerStruct
MOVE A0 V0 ; Get current player struct at V0

LBU A0 3(V0) ; Load character value from offset of player struct
ADDIU A0 A0 0x1C00 ; Add character value to MARIO string
LUI A1 hi(RulesPrompt)
JAL CallPrompt
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(RulesPrompt) ; Display RulesPrompt

; Change the outcome based on the choice.
BEQZ V0 TicketRules
NOP
LI T0 1
BEQ V0 T0 GameRules
NOP
LI T0 2
BEQ V0 T0 ItemRules
NOP
LI T0 3
BEQ V0 T0 BooRules
NOP
LI T0 4
BEQ V0 T0 LastRules
NOP
LI T0 5
BEQ V0 T0 BonusRules
NOP
; else, pick Bye
J Bye
NOP

;===Ticket Rules===
TicketRules:
LUI A0 hi(TicketMessage)
J RulesDisplay
ADDIU A0 A0 lo(TicketMessage) ; Display TicketMessage

;===Game Rules===
GameRules:
LUI A0 hi(GameMessage)
J RulesDisplay
ADDIU A0 A0 lo(GameMessage) ; Display GameMessage

;===Item Rules===
ItemRules:
LUI A0 hi(ItemMessage)
J RulesDisplay
ADDIU A0 A0 lo(ItemMessage) ; Display ItemMessage

;===Boo Rules===
BooRules:
LUI A0 hi(BooMessage)
J RulesDisplay
ADDIU A0 A0 lo(BooMessage) ; Display BooMessage

;===Last Rules===
LastRules:
LI T0 ChocolateRules
BNEZ T0 LastRulesChocolate ; Check if chocolate rules are ON
NOP
; else, use vanilla rules
LUI A0 hi(LastMessageVanilla)
J RulesDisplay
ADDIU A0 A0 lo(LastMessageVanilla) ; Display LastMessageVanilla

LastRulesChocolate:
LUI A0 hi(LastMessageChocolate)
J RulesDisplay
ADDIU A0 A0 lo(LastMessageChocolate) ; Display LastMessageChocolate

;===Bonus Rules===
BonusRules:
LI T0 ChocolateRules
BNEZ T0 BonusRulesChocolate ; Check if chocolate rules are ON
NOP
; else, use vanilla rules
LUI A0 hi(BonusMessageVanilla)
J RulesDisplay
ADDIU A0 A0 lo(BonusMessageVanilla) ; Display BonusMessageVanilla

BonusRulesChocolate:
LUI A0 hi(BonusMessageChocolate)
ADDIU A0 A0 lo(BonusMessageChocolate) ; Display BonusMessageChocolate

;===Rules Display===
RulesDisplay:
JAL CallMessage
NOP

J Rules
NOP

;===Bye Message===
Bye:
LUI A0 hi(ByeMessage)
JAL CallMessage
ADDIU A0 A0 lo(ByeMessage) ; Display ByeMessage

exit:
LW RA 28(SP)
JR RA
ADDIU SP SP 32

;===Mini Func to Call Prompt===
.align 4
CallPrompt:
ADDIU SP SP -40
SW RA 36(SP)
SW S0 32(SP)

; A0 = String #1
; A1 = Prompt Address
; S0 / V0 = Prompt Choice

MOVE A2 A0 ; Copy A0 to A2
SW R0 16(SP) ; A4
SW R0 20(SP) ; A5
SW R0 24(SP) ; A6
LI A0 0x7 ; Character image (-1 for none, 0x7 for Boo)
; Visit the following link to get the full list of Character Images
; https://github.com/PartyPlanner64/PartyPlanner64/wiki/Displaying-Messages
; If you use a character image, check the bottom of the code
; Pass prompt address on A1
JAL ShowMessage
LI A3 0

; If A0 is a pointer to AI data, AI logic is ran to pick for CPUs.
; If A0 is 0 or 1, the 0th or 1st option is chosen by CPUs.
; If A0 is 2, then the value of A1 is the CPUs option index choice.
LI A0 2
JAL GetBasicPromptSelection
LI A1 0
MOVE S0 V0 ; S0 now has the chosen option index

; Obligatory message box closing/cleanup calls.
JAL CloseMessage
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6EC
NOP

MOVE V0 S0 ; Copy S0 to V0

LW RA 36(SP)
LW S0 32(SP)
JR RA
ADDIU SP SP 40

;===Mini Func to Call Message===
.align 4
CallMessage:
ADDIU SP SP -32
SW RA 28(SP)

; A0 = Message Address

MOVE A1 A0 ; Copy A0 to A1
SW R0 16(SP) ; A4
SW R0 20(SP) ; A5
SW R0 24(SP) ; A6
LI A0 0x7 ; Character image (-1 for none, 0x7 for Boo)
; Visit the following link to get the full list of Character Images
; https://github.com/PartyPlanner64/PartyPlanner64/wiki/Displaying-Messages
; If you use a character image, check the bottom of the code
; Pass message address on A1
LI A2 0
JAL ShowMessage
LI A3 0

; Obligatory message box closing/cleanup calls.
JAL 0x800EC9DC
NOP
JAL CloseMessage
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6EC
NOP

LW RA 28(SP)
JR RA
ADDIU SP SP 32

; Here's a list of the most common bytes you'll need
; .byte 0x01 ; Black font
; .byte 0x03 ; Red font
; .byte 0x04 ; Purple font
; .byte 0x05 ; Green font
; .byte 0x06 ; Blue font

; .byte 0x08 ; White font

; .byte 0xC2 ; Exclamation mark (!)
; .byte 0xC3 ; Question mark (?)
; .byte 0x82 ; Comma (,)
; .byte 0x0A ; New line (writes below)
; .byte 0x5C ; Apostrophe (')
; .byte 0x29 ; Coin icon
; .byte 0x3D ; Minus (-)
; .byte 0x3E ; Multiply (x)
; .byte 0xFF,0 ; Wait, press A to confirm

; If your message has an image, use this at the start of each line
; .byte 0x1A,0x1A,0x1A,0x1A ; Padding for character image

King Boo Carnival Shop v3.1 (Chocolate).code:
; NAME: King Boo Carnival Shop v3.1 (Chocolate)
; GAMES: MP3_USA
; EXECUTION: Direct
; PARAM: Space|ShopSpace

ADDIU SP SP -120
SW RA 116(SP)
SW S0 112(SP)
SW S1 108(SP)
SW S2 104(SP)
SW S3 100(SP)
SW S4 96(SP)
SW S5 92(SP)
SW S6 88(SP)
SW S7 84(SP)

; S0 = Current Player Struct
; S1 = Prompt Option / Selected Item
; S2 = Item Table / Item Bag Table
; S3 = Price Table / Price / Item Bag Chances Table
; S4 = Current Player Placement / Empty Item Slot Offset (Item Bag)
; S5 = Shop Prompt / Bad Exit Message
; S6 = Empty Item Slot (Offset)
; S7 = Exit Flag (0 or 1)
; 80(SP) = Shop Model Pointer
; 76(SP) = Boo Model Pointer

;===Hide Dice Roll===
JAL GetPlayerStruct
LI A0 -1 ; Get current player struct at V0
MOVE S0 V0 ; Copy V0 to S0

JAL 0x800DBEC0 ; HideDiceRoll
LBU A0 0x1D(S0) ; Pass current player index on A0

;===Set Player Idle Animation===
LI A0 -1 ; Set current player
LI A1 -1 ; Set idle animation
JAL SetBoardPlayerAnimation
LI A2 2 ; Loop the animation

;===Rotate Toward ShopSpace===
LI A0 -1 ; Set current player
LI A1 8 ; Rotate in 8 frames
JAL RotatePlayerModel
LI A2 ShopSpace ; Face ShopSpace

;===Check Current Turn===
LUI T0 hi(total_turns)
ADDIU T0 T0 lo(total_turns)
LBU T0 0(T0) ; Load total turns into T0

LUI T1 hi(current_turn)
ADDIU T1 T1 lo(current_turn)
LBU T1 0(T1) ; Load current turn into T1

BEQ T0 T1 LastTurn ; If it's the last turn, go to LastTurn
NOP

;===Check Player's Coins===
LBU A0 0x1D(S0) ; Pass current player index on A0
JAL PlayerHasCoins ; Returns 1 if player has enough coins
LI A1 5 ; Check for 5 coins

BEQZ V0 NoCoinsToShop ; If not enough coins, go to NoCoinsToShop
NOP

;===Check Player's Inventory===
JAL PlayerHasEmptyItemSlot
LBU A0 0x1D(S0) ; Pass current player index on A0

BLTZ V0 TooManyItems ; If player has no empty slot, go to TooManyItems
NOP
; else, player has an empty item slot (0-2)
MOVE S6 V0 ; Copy V0 to S6
LI S7 0 ; Set exit flag to 0

;===Get Player Placement and Item Table===
JAL LoadBooShop
LI A0 0x257 ; Boo laugh
SW V0 80(SP) ; Store V0 into 80(SP) (S8)
SW V1 76(SP) ; Store V1 into 76(SP) (S9)

JAL GetPlayerPlacement
LBU A0 0x1D(S0) ; Check current player placement (0-3)
MOVE S4 V0 ; Copy V0 to S4

BEQZ S4 FirstPlace ; If V0 = 0, player is in 1st place
NOP
; else, player is 2nd-4th
LUI S2 hi(ItemTable)
ADDIU S2 S2 lo(ItemTable)
LUI S5 hi(ShopPrompt)
J Greeting
ADDIU S5 S5 lo(ShopPrompt) ; Display ShopPrompt

FirstPlace:
LUI S2 hi(FirstItemTable)
ADDIU S2 S2 lo(FirstItemTable)
LUI S5 hi(FirstShopPrompt)
ADDIU S5 S5 lo(FirstShopPrompt) ; Display FirstShopPrompt

;===Greeting Message===
Greeting:
LI A0 1 ; Display prompt
LUI A1 hi(GreetingPrompt)
JAL CallMessage
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(GreetingPrompt) ; Display GreetingPrompt

BNEL S7 R0 SkipGreetingAI ; If S7 = 1, skip GreetingAI
MOVE V0 S7 ; Copy S7 to V0 (select exit on likely)

JAL RNGPercentChance
LI A0 25 ; 25% chance of V0 = 1

SkipGreetingAI:
; Get the selection, either from the player or CPU.
; If A0 is a pointer to AI data, AI logic is ran to pick for CPUs.
; If A0 is 0 or 1, the 0th or 1st option is chosen by CPUs.
; If A0 is 2, then the value of A1 is the CPUs option index choice.
LI A0 2
JAL GetBasicPromptSelection
MOVE A1 V0 ; A1 now has the AI's decision
MOVE S1 V0 ; S1 now has the chosen option index

; Obligatory message box closing/cleanup calls.
JAL CloseMessage
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6EC
NOP

; Change the player's destination based on the choice.
BEQZ S1 MainPrompt ; If S1 = 0, go to main prompt
NOP
LI T0 1
BEQ S1 T0 exit ; If S1 = 1, exit
NOP
; else pick "View map"
JAL ViewBoardMap
NOP
J Greeting
NOP

;===Shop Prompt===
MainPrompt:
LBU A0 0x1D(S0) ; Pass current player index on A0
ADDIU A1 S2 16 ; Pass price table on A1
JAL PreparePrompt
MOVE A2 S5 ; Pass prompt address on A2

LI A0 1 ; Display prompt
LUI A1 hi(PromptHolder)
JAL CallMessage
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(PromptHolder) ; Display ShopPrompt with strings

JAL DisableItems ; Disable unaffordable options
NOP

LBU A0 0x1D(S0) ; Pass current player index on A0
JAL AILogic
MOVE A1 S4 ; Pass current player placement on A1

; Get the selection, either from the player or CPU.
; If A0 is a pointer to AI data, AI logic is ran to pick for CPUs.
; If A0 is 0 or 1, the 0th or 1st option is chosen by CPUs.
; If A0 is 2, then the value of A1 is the CPUs option index choice.
LI A0 2
JAL GetBasicPromptSelection
MOVE A1 V0 ; A1 now has the AI's decision
MOVE S1 V0 ; S1 now has the chosen option index

; Obligatory message box closing/cleanup calls.
JAL CloseMessage
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6EC
NOP

; Change the player's destination based on the choice.
SLTI T0 S1 7 ; If S1 < 7, T0 = 1
BNEZ T0 PickItem ; If T0 = 1, pick item
NOP
LI T0 7
BEQ S1 T0 ItemBag ; If S1 = T0, go to ItemBag
NOP
LI T0 9
BEQL S1 T0 Greeting ; If S1 = T0, go back to Greeting
LI S7 1 ; Set exit flag to 1
; else pick "Item Descriptions"
JAL 0x800E44E4 ; GetItemDescriptions
LBU A0 0x1D(S0) ; Pass current player index on A0
J MainPrompt
NOP

;===Item Bag===
ItemBag:
LBU A0 0x1D(S0) ; Take coins from current player
JAL AdjustPlayerCoinsGradual
LI A1 -30 ; Subtract 30 coins

LBU A0 0x1D(S0) ; Take coins from current player
JAL ShowPlayerCoinChange
LI A1 -30 ; Subtract 30 coins

JAL SleepProcess
LI A0 30 ; Wait 30 frames for coin change

;===Get Item Bag Tables===
LUI S2 hi(ItemBagTable)
ADDIU S2 S2 lo(ItemBagTable)

LI T0 16 ; Add distance between chances tables
MULT S4 T0 ; Multiply by player placement
MFLO T0 ; Move result into T0

LUI S3 hi(ItemBagChancesTable)
ADDIU S3 S3 lo(ItemBagChancesTable)
ADDU S3 T0 S3 ; Add distance between chances tables

ADDU S4 S0 S6 ; Add empty item slot offset to player struct

;===Randomize Outcome===
Randomizer:
JAL GetRand
ORI A0 R0 0x63 ; Get random byte from 00-63 (0-99) at V0
MOVE T3 S3 ; Copy S3 to T3
MOVE T2 S2 ; Copy S2 to T2

RandomItemLoop:
LBU T5 0(T3) ; Load chance value from chances table
LBU T4 0(T2) ; Load item index from ItemBagTable
SLT T1 V0 T5 ; If V0 < T3, T1 = 1
BNEZ T1 SelectItem
NOP
ADDIU T3 T3 1 ; Load next byte from chances table
J RandomItemLoop
ADDIU T2 T2 1 ; Load next byte from ItemBagTable

;===Obtain Item Bag Item===
SelectItem:
SB T4 0x18(S4) ; Store item into empty slot offset of player struct
LI T1 0x01 ; Skeleton Key index
BNE T4 T1 SelectItem2 ; If not a key, continue
NOP
LBU T3 0x1E(S0) ; Load ticket star from offset of player struct
ADDIU T3 T3 1 ; Add 1 to ticket star
SB T3 0x1E(S0) ; Store ticket star into offset of player struct

SelectItem2:
JAL PlaySound
LI A0 0x10C ; Turn Start sound

JAL SleepProcess
LI A0 30 ; Wait 30 frames

;===Check Player Slots for Item Bag===
ADDIU S6 S6 1 ; Add 1 to empty item slot
LI T0 3
BEQ S6 T0 HappyVoice ; If S6 = T0, go to HappyVoice
NOP
; else, player still has empty item slots
J Randomizer
ADDIU S4 S4 1 ; Add 1 to empty slot offset

;===Pick Item and Check for Coins===
PickItem:
ADDIU S3 S2 16 ; Add offset of Price Table from Item Table
ADDU S3 S3 S1 ; Add S1 as byte offset of Price Table
LBU S3 0(S3) ; Load price value from offset of Price Table

ADDU S1 S2 S1 ; Add S1 as byte offset of Item Table
LBU S1 0(S1) ; Load item value from offset of Item Table

;===Pay Coins===
LBU A0 0x1D(S0) ; Take coins from current player
JAL AdjustPlayerCoinsGradual
SUBU A1 R0 S3 ; Subtract item price

LBU A0 0x1D(S0) ; Take coins from current player
JAL ShowPlayerCoinChange
SUBU A1 R0 S3 ; Subtract item price

JAL SleepProcess
LI A0 30 ; Wait 30 frames for coin change

;===Receive Item===
ADDU S6 S0 S6 ; Add empty item slot offset to player struct
SB S1 0x18(S6) ; Store item into offset of player struct

JAL PlaySound
LI A0 0x10C ; Turn Start sound

;===Play Happy Voice and Animation===
HappyVoice:
LBU A0 3(S0) ; Load character value from offset of player struct
JAL PlaySound
ADDIU A0 A0 0x2BE ; Add character value to Mario's happy voice
; Character voices are their "character value" distance away from
; Mario's, e.g. Luigi's character value = 1, so Luigi's happy voice
; is 1 away from Mario's.
; 0x2BE = Happy Voice, 0x287 = Sad Voice

LI A0 -1 ; Set current player
LI A1 5 ; Set joy animation
JAL SetBoardPlayerAnimation
LI A2 0 ; Do not loop animation

JAL SleepProcess
LI A0 40 ; Wait 40 frames for animation

JAL PlaySound
LI A0 0x257 ; Boo laugh

LI A0 0 ; Display message
LUI A1 hi(GotItemMessage)
JAL CallMessage
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(GotItemMessage) ; Display GotItemMessage

J exit
NOP

;===Too Many Items Message===
TooManyItems:
LUI S5 hi(TooManyItemsMessage)
J SadMessage
ADDIU S5 S5 lo(TooManyItemsMessage) ; Display TooManyItemsMessage

;===No Coins to Shop Message===
NoCoinsToShop:
LUI S5 hi(NoCoinsToShopMessage)
J SadMessage
ADDIU S5 S5 lo(NoCoinsToShopMessage) ; Display NoCoinsToShopMessage

;===Last Turn Message===
LastTurn:
LUI S5 hi(LastTurnMessage)
ADDIU S5 S5 lo(LastTurnMessage) ; Display LastTurnMessage

SadMessage:
JAL LoadBooShop
LI A0 0x25E ; Boo cry
SW V0 80(SP) ; Store V0 into 80(SP) (S8)
SW V1 76(SP) ; Store V1 into 76(SP) (S9)

LI A0 0 ; Display message
JAL CallMessage
MOVE A1 S5 ; Pass sad message address on A0

exit:
LW A0 80(SP) ; Pass shop model pointer on A0
JAL UnloadBooShop
LW A1 76(SP) ; Pass Boo model pointer on A1

JAL 0x800DB884 ; ShowDiceRoll
LBU A0 0x1D(S0) ; Pass current player index on A0

JAL SleepProcess
LI A0 10 ; Wait 10 frames for dice roll to show

LW RA 116(SP)
LW S0 112(SP)
LW S1 108(SP)
LW S2 104(SP)
LW S3 100(SP)
LW S4 96(SP)
LW S5 92(SP)
LW S6 88(SP)
LW S7 84(SP)
JR RA
ADDIU SP SP 120

;===Mini Func to Call Message===
.align 4
CallMessage:
ADDIU SP SP -40
SW RA 36(SP)
SW S0 32(SP)

; A0 / S0 = Message or Prompt
; A1 = Message Address

MOVE S0 A0 ; Copy A0 to S0
SW R0 16(SP) ; A4
SW R0 20(SP) ; A5
SW R0 24(SP) ; A6
LI A0 0x7 ; Character image (-1 for none, 0x7 for Boo)
; Visit the following link to get the full list of Character Images
; https://github.com/PartyPlanner64/PartyPlanner64/wiki/Displaying-Messages
; If you use a character image, check the bottom of the code
; Pass message address on A1
LI A2 0
JAL ShowMessage
LI A3 0

BNEZ S0 CallMessageExit ; If displaying a prompt, exit
NOP

; Obligatory message box closing/cleanup calls.
JAL 0x800EC9DC
NOP
JAL CloseMessage
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6EC
NOP

CallMessageExit:
LW RA 36(SP)
LW S0 32(SP)
JR RA
ADDIU SP SP 40

;===Mini Func to Prepare Prompt===
.align 4
PreparePrompt:
ADDIU SP SP -64
SW RA 60(SP)
SW S0 56(SP)
SW S1 52(SP)
SW S2 48(SP)

; A0 / S0 = Current Player Index
; A1 / S1 = Price Table
; A2 / S2 = Prompt Address

MOVE S0 A0 ; Copy A0 to S0
MOVE S1 A1 ; Copy A1 to S1
JAL SetupPrices
MOVE S2 A2 ; Copy A2 to S2

LUI A2 hi(BlackColour)
ADDIU A2 A2 lo(BlackColour) ; Default to black colour
MOVE A3 A2 ; Copy A2 to A3
MOVE T4 A2 ; Copy A2 to T4
MOVE T5 A2 ; Copy A2 to T5
MOVE T6 A2 ; Copy A2 to T6
MOVE T7 A2 ; Copy A2 to T7
MOVE T8 A2 ; Copy A2 to T8
MOVE T9 A2 ; Copy A2 to T9
LUI T1 hi(BlueColour)
ADDIU T1 T1 lo(BlueColour) ; Prepare blue colour

; Mushroom colour
LBU T0 0(V0) ; Load Mushroom setup flag into T0
BNEZL T0 GetColour2 ; If T0 = 1, get blue colour
MOVE A2 T1 ; Get blue colour (on likely)

; Plunder Chest / Poison Mushroom colour
GetColour2:
LBU T0 1(V0) ; Load setup flag into T0
BNEZL T0 GetColour3 ; If T0 = 1, get blue colour
MOVE A3 T1 ; Get blue colour (on likely)

; Dueling Glove / Plunder Chest colour
GetColour3:
LBU T0 2(V0) ; Load setup flag into T0
BNEZL T0 GetColour4 ; If T0 = 1, get blue colour
MOVE T4 T1 ; Get blue colour (on likely)

; Golden Mushroom / Dueling Glove colour
GetColour4:
LBU T0 3(V0) ; Load setup flag into T0
BNEZL T0 GetColour5 ; If T0 = 1, get blue colour
MOVE T5 T1 ; Get blue colour (on likely)

; Boo Bell colour
GetColour5:
LBU T0 4(V0) ; Load setup flag into T0
BNEZL T0 GetColour6 ; If T0 = 1, get blue colour
MOVE T6 T1 ; Get blue colour (on likely)

; Bowser Suit colour
GetColour6:
LBU T0 5(V0) ; Load setup flag into T0
BNEZL T0 GetColour7 ; If T0 = 1, get blue colour
MOVE T7 T1 ; Get blue colour (on likely)

; Magic Lamp / Lucky Lamp colour
GetColour7:
LBU T0 6(V0) ; Load setup flag into T0
BNEZL T0 GetColour8 ; If T0 = 1, get blue colour
MOVE T8 T1 ; Get blue colour (on likely)

; Item Bag colour
GetColour8:
LBU T0 7(V0) ; Load setup flag into T0
BNEZL T0 PrintPrompt ; If T0 = 1, get blue colour
MOVE T9 T1 ; Get blue colour (on likely)

; Print prompt
PrintPrompt:
LUI A0 hi(PromptHolder)
ADDIU A0 A0 lo(PromptHolder) ; Parse destination
MOVE A1 S2 ; Pass prompt address on A1 (string formatter %s)
; Pass Mushroom colour on A2
; Pass Plunder Chest / Poison Mushroom colour on A3
SW T4 16(SP) ; Pass Dueling Glove / Plunder Chest colour on A4
SW T5 20(SP) ; Pass Golden Mushroom / Dueling Glove colour on A5
SW T6 24(SP) ; Pass Boo Bell colour on A6
SW T7 28(SP) ; Pass Bowser Suit colour on A7
SW T8 32(SP) ; Pass Magic Lamp / Lucky Lamp colour on A8
SW T9 36(SP) ; Pass Item Bag colour on A9
JAL sprintf
SW R0 40(SP) ; Terminator byte

LW RA 60(SP)
LW S0 56(SP)
LW S1 52(SP)
LW S2 48(SP)
JR RA
ADDIU SP SP 64

.align 4
BlueColour:
.byte 0x06,0

.align 4
BlackColour:
.byte 0x01,0

;===Mini Func to Setup Prices===
.align 4
SetupPrices:
ADDIU SP SP -48
SW RA 44(SP)
SW S0 40(SP)
SW S1 36(SP)
SW S2 32(SP)
SW S3 28(SP)

; A0 / S0 = Current Player Index
; A1 / S1 = Price Table
; S2 = Loop Counter
; S3 / V0 = Price Setup Array

MOVE S0 A0 ; Copy A0 to S0
MOVE S1 A1 ; Copy A1 to S1
LI S2 0 ; Start counter at 0
LUI S3 hi(PriceSetup)
ADDIU S3 S3 lo(PriceSetup)
SetupPricesLoop:
MOVE A0 S0 ; Pass current player index on A0
JAL PlayerHasCoins
LBU A1 0(S1) ; Pass nth item price on A1
SB V0 0(S3) ; Store setup flag into array
LI T0 6
BEQ S2 T0 FinishSetupPrices ; If all items checked, finish
NOP
ADDIU S1 S1 1 ; Add 1 to get next item price
ADDIU S2 S2 1 ; Add 1 to loop counter
J SetupPricesLoop
ADDIU S3 S3 1 ; Add 1 to store next price

FinishSetupPrices:
MOVE A0 S0 ; Pass current player index on A0
JAL PlayerHasCoins
LI A1 30 ; Check for 30 coins
SB V0 1(S3) ; Store setup flag into array

ADDIU V0 S3 -6 ; Pass price setup array on V0

LW RA 44(SP)
LW S0 40(SP)
LW S1 36(SP)
LW S2 32(SP)
LW S3 28(SP)
JR RA
ADDIU SP SP 48

.align 8
PriceSetup:
.fill 8

;===Mini Func to Disable Items===
.align 4
DisableItems:
ADDIU SP SP -40
SW RA 36(SP)
SW S0 32(SP)
SW S1 28(SP)

; S0 = Price Setup Array
; S1 = Option Counter

LUI S0 hi(PriceSetup)
ADDIU S0 S0 lo(PriceSetup)
LI S1 0 ; Start with 0th option
DisableItemsLoop:
LBU T0 0(S0) ; Load setup flag
BNEZ T0 SkipDisabling ; If setup flag enabled, skip disabling
NOP
LI A0 2 ; Window ID
JAL DisablePromptOption
MOVE A1 S1 ; Disable nth option

SkipDisabling:
LI T0 7 ; All options (0-7)
BEQ S1 T0 DisableItemsExit ; If all options checked, exit
NOP
ADDIU S0 S0 1 ; Add 1 to get next setup flag
J DisableItemsLoop
ADDIU S1 S1 1 ; Add 1 to check next option

DisableItemsExit:
LW RA 36(SP)
LW S0 32(SP)
LW S1 28(SP)
JR RA
ADDIU SP SP 40

;===Mini Func to Determine AI Logic===
.align 4
AILogic:
ADDIU SP SP -40
SW RA 36(SP)
SW S0 32(SP)
SW S1 28(SP)

; A0 / S0 = Current Player Index
; A1 / S1 = Current Player Placement

MOVE S0 A0 ; Copy A0 to S0
MOVE S1 A1 ; Copy A1 to S1

MOVE A0 S0 ; Check CPU
JAL PlayerHasCoins
LI A1 30 ; Check for 30 coins

BNEZ V0 ItemBagChoice ; If CPU has 30 coins, go to ItemBagChoice
NOP

BEQZ S1 FirstCPU ; If CPU is in 1st place, go to FirstCPU
NOP

MOVE A0 S0 ; Check CPU
JAL PlayerHasCoins
LI A1 20 ; Check for 20 coins

BNEZ V0 ConsiderAllItems
NOP

MOVE A0 S0 ; Check CPU
JAL PlayerHasCoins
LI A1 15 ; Check for 15 coins

BNEZ V0 FifteenCoinChoice
NOP

MOVE A0 S0 ; Check CPU
JAL PlayerHasCoins
LI A1 10 ; Check for 10 coins

BNEZ V0 TenCoinChoice
NOP
; else, CPU has 5 coins
JAL RNGPercentChance
LI A0 50 ; 50% chance of V0 = 1

BEQZ V0 AIExit
NOP
J AIExit
LI V0 9 ; Choose exit

TenCoinChoice:
JAL GetRand
LI A0 5 ; Get random byte (0-5) at V0

LI T0 4
BNE V0 T0 AIExit ; Choose 0-3,5
NOP
J AIExit
LI V0 9 ; Choose exit

FifteenCoinChoice:
JAL GetRand
LI A0 6 ; Get random byte (0-6) at V0

LI T0 6
BNE V0 T0 AIExit ; Choose 0-5
NOP
J AIExit
LI V0 9 ; Choose exit

FirstCPU:
MOVE A0 S0 ; Check CPU
JAL PlayerHasCoins
LI A1 15 ; Check for 15 coins

BNEZ V0 ConsiderAllItems
NOP

MOVE A0 S0 ; Check CPU
JAL PlayerHasCoins
LI A1 10 ; Check for 10 coins

BNEZ V0 FirstTenCoinChoice
NOP
; else, CPU has 5 coins
JAL GetRand
LI A0 2 ; Get random byte (0-2) at V0

LI T0 2
BNE V0 T0 AIExit ; Choose 0-1
NOP
J AIExit
LI V0 9 ; Choose exit

FirstTenCoinChoice:
JAL GetRand
LI A0 6 ; Get random byte (0-6) at V0

PastBooBell:
SLTI T0 V0 4 ; If V0 < 4, T0 = 1
BNEZ T0 AIExit
NOP
J CorrectExit
ADDIU V0 V0 1 ; Add 1 if V0 = 4-6 to get 5-7

ConsiderAllItems:
JAL GetRand
LI A0 7 ; Get random byte (0-7) at V0

CorrectExit:
SLTI T0 V0 7 ; If V0 < 7, T0 = 1
BNEZ T0 AIExit
NOP
J AIExit
ADDIU V0 V0 2 ; Add 2 if V0 = 7 to choose exit

ItemBagChoice:
JAL GetRand
LI A0 7 ; Get random byte (0-7) at V0

AIExit:
LW RA 36(SP)
LW S0 32(SP)
LW S1 28(SP)
JR RA
ADDIU SP SP 40

;===Mini Func to Get Random Byte===
.align 4
GetRand: ; returns on V0

; A0 = max byte

ADDIU sp, sp, -0x18
SW ra, 0x0010 (sp)
BLTZL a0, label1_func0
SUBU a0, r0, a0
label1_func0:
BEQZ a0, End1
DADDU v0, r0, r0
ADDIU v0, r0, 0x0001
BNEL a0, v0, label2_func0
ADDIU v0, r0, 0x0064
JAL Function1
ADDIU a0, r0, 0x03E8
SLTI v0, v0, 0x01F5
J End1
XORI v0, v0, 0x0001
label2_func0:
BEQ a0, v0, label3_func0
NOP
JAL Function1
NOP
J End1
NOP
label3_func0:
JAL Function1
ADDIU a0, r0, 0x03F1
LUI v1, 0x6666
ORI v1, v1, 0x6667
MULT v0, v1
SRA v0, v0, 31
MFHI a1
SRA v1, a1, 2
SUBU v0, v1, v0
End1:
LW ra, 0x0010 (sp)
JR RA
ADDIU sp, sp, 0x18
//
Function1:
ADDIU sp, sp, -0x20
SW s0, 0x0010 (sp)
ADDIU s0, r0, 0xFFFF
SW s1, 0x0014 (sp)
ADDIU s1, a0, 0x0001
BNEZ s1, label1_func1
DIVU s0, s1
BREAK 0x01C00
label1_func1:
MFLO s0
BNEZ s0, label2_func1
SW ra, 0x0018 (sp)
ADDIU s0, r0, 0x0001
label2_func1:
JAL Function2
NOP
BNEZ s0, label3_func1
DIVU v0, s0
BREAK 0x01C00
label3_func1:
MFLO v1
SLTU v0, v1, s1
BEQZ v0, label2_func1
DADDU v0, v1, r0
LW ra, 0x0018 (sp)
LW s1, 0x0014 (sp)
LW s0, 0x0010 (sp)
JR RA
ADDIU sp, sp, 0x20
//
Function2:
LUI v0, 0x8009
LW v0, 0x7650 (v0)
LUI v1, 0x41C6
ORI v1, v1, 0x4E6D
MULT v0, v1
MFLO v0
ADDIU v0, v0, 0x3039
LUI v1, 0x8009
JR RA
SW v0, 0x7650 (v1)

;===Mini Func to Load Boo Shop===
.align 4
LoadBooShop:
ADDIU SP SP -80
SW RA 76(SP)
SW S0 72(SP)
SW S1 68(SP)
SW S2 64(SP)
SW S3 60(SP)
SW S4 56(SP)
SW S5 52(SP)

; S0 = Shop Model (0 or 1)
; S1 / V0 = Shop Model Pointer
; S2 = Current Space Data
; S3 = Shop Space Data
; S4 / V1 = Boo Model Pointer
; A0 / S5 = Boo voice
; 32(SP) = Midpoint Coords

; Prepare shop model
MOVE S5 A0 ; Copy A0 to S5
JAL RNGPercentChance
LI A0 33 ; 33% chance of V0 = 1
SUBU S0 R0 V0
ANDI S0 S0 0x31 ; AND with 49
ORI S0 S0 0x30 ; OR with 48
JAL PlaySound
LI A0 276 ; Shop opening sound
ANDI A0 S0 0xFF ; AND with -1
JAL 0x800D90C8 ; GetModelPointer
LI A1 0
MOVE S1 V0 ; Copy V0 to S1
JAL 0x800D9714
MOVE A0 S1 ; Pass model pointer on A0

;Get space data
JAL GetCurrentSpaceIndex ; Get current space index at V0
NOP
JAL GetSpaceData
MOVE A0 V0 ; Get current space data at V0
MOVE S2 V0 ; Copy V0 to S2
JAL GetSpaceData
LI A0 ShopSpace ; Get shop space data at V0
MOVE S3 V0 ; Copy V0 to S3

;Set shop model to space
ADDIU A0 SP 32 ; Store midpoint xyz coords in 32(SP)
ADDIU A1 S2 8 ; Current space coords
JAL midpoint
ADDIU A2 S3 8 ; Shop space coords
JAL 0x800D88E8 ; SpaceAngleHelper
ADDIU A0 SP 32 ; Fix-up midpoint coords
ADDIU A0 S1 0x18 ; Pass model x2 coords on A0
JAL 0x80089A20 ; StoreCoords (to face)
ADDIU A1 SP 32 ; Pass midpoint coords on A1
SW R0 0x28(S1)
MOVE A0 S1 ; Pass model pointer on A0
LI A1 -1
JAL 0x800D9CE8
LI A2 1
JAL 0x800D9A40
MOVE A0 S1 ; Pass model pointer on A0
ADDIU A0 S1 0x0C ; Pass model x coords on A0
JAL 0x80089A20 ; StoreCoords (to stand)
ADDIU A1 S3 8 ; Pass shop space coords on A1

;Prepare Boo model
LI A0 10 ; Boo model
LUI A1 hi(BooHelper)
JAL 0x800D90C8 ; GetModelPointer
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(BooHelper)
MOVE S4 V0 ; Copy V0 to S4
JAL 0x800D9714
MOVE A0 S4 ; Pass model pointer on A0

;Set Boo model to space
ADDIU A0 S4 0x18 ; Pass model x2 coords on A0
JAL 0x80089A20 ; StoreCoords (to face)
ADDIU A1 SP 32 ; Pass midpoint coords on A1
ADDIU A0 S4 0x0C ; Pass model x coords on A0
JAL 0x80089A20 ; StoreCoords (to stand)
ADDIU A1 S3 8 ; Pass shop space coords on A1
LI AT 0x41800000 ; 16.000000
SW AT 0x10(S4) ; Set y coords

;Set floats
LI AT 0x3F990000 ; 1.195312
ORI AT AT 0x999A
MTC1 AT F0
SWC1 F0 0x2C(S4)
SWC1 F0 0x24(S4)
SWC1 F0 0x28(S4)
JAL 0x800D9B24
MOVE A0 S4 ; Pass Boo model pointer on A0
LI AT 0x42480000 ; 50.000000
MTC1 AT F12
JAL 0x8008EF20
NOP
LI AT 0x3F800000 ; 1.000000
MTC1 AT F2
NOP
DIV.S F22 F2 F0
MTC1 R0 F20
JAL FloatHelper1
NOP
Branch94C:
JAL 0x8008EF20
MOV.S F12 F20
MUL.S F0 F0 F22
SWC1 F0 0x28(S1)
JAL 0x8008EF20
MOV.S F12 F20
MUL.S F0 F0 F22
NOP
MUL.S F0 F0 F26
ADD.S F0 F0 F24
SWC1 F0 0x24(S1)
JAL 0x8008EF20
MOV.S F12 F20
MUL.S F0 F0 F22
NOP
MUL.S F0 F0 F26
ADD.S F0 F0 F24
JAL SleepVProcess
SWC1 F0 0x2C(S1)
ADD.S F20 F20 F30
C.LT.S F20 F28
NOP

NOP
LI AT 0x42480000 ; 50.000000

NOP

NOP

MOVE A0 S4 ; Pass Boo model pointer on A0

LW RA 76(SP)

;===Mini Func to Unload Boo Shop===
.align 4
UnloadBooShop:
ADDIU SP SP -80
SW RA 76(SP)
SW S1 72(SP)
SW S4 68(SP)

; A0 / S1 = Shop Model Pointer
; A1 / S4 = Boo Model Pointer

MOVE S1 A0 ; Copy A0 to S1
MOVE S4 A1 ; Copy A1 to S4

JAL PlaySound
LI A0 277 ; Shop closing sound?
MOVE A0 S1 ; Pass shop model pointer on A0
LI A1 -1
JAL 0x800D9CE8
LI A2 4
LW V0 0x3C(S1)
LW V0 0x40(V0)
LH A0 0(V0)
LUI A1 0x3F99
JAL 0x8001C92C
ORI A1 A1 0x999A
LW V0 0x3C(S1)
LW V0 0x40(V0)
LH A0 0(V0)
LUI V1 hi(0x800D03F8)
LW V1 lo(0x800D03F8)(V1)
SLL V0 A0 1
ADDU V0 V0 A0
SLL V0 V0 6
ADDU V0 V0 V1
LBU V1 2(V0)
LUI A1 hi(0x800CCF58)
LW A1 lo(0x800CCF58)(A1)
SLL V0 V1 1
ADDU V0 V0 V1
SLL V0 V0 3
ADDU V0 V0 A1
LH V0 2(V0)
MTC1 V0 F4
NOP
CVT.S.W F4 F4
MFC1 A1 F4
JAL 0x8001C6A8
NOP

Shady Boo v2.code:
; NAME: Shady Boo v2
; GAMES: MP3_USA
; EXECUTION: Direct
; PARAM: Space|ShadyBoo

ADDIU SP SP -48
SW RA 44(SP)
SW S0 40(SP)
SW S1 36(SP)
SW S2 32(SP)

; S0 = Current Player Struct
; S1 = Empty Slot Offset / Coins Gained

;===Rotate Toward Boo Bellhouse===
LI A0 -1 ; Set current player
LI A1 8 ; Rotate in 8 frames
JAL RotatePlayerModel
LI A2 ShadyBoo ; Face ShadyBoo

;===Boo Bellhouse Message===
JAL PlaySound
LI A0 0x257 ; Boo laugh

SW R0 16(SP) ; A4
SW R0 20(SP) ; A5
SW R0 24(SP) ; A6
LI A0 0x7 ; Character image (-1 for none, 0x7 for Boo)
; Visit the following link to get the full list of Character Images
; https://github.com/PartyPlanner64/PartyPlanner64/wiki/Displaying-Messages
; If you use a character image, check the bottom of the code
LUI A1 hi(ShadyMessage)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(ShadyMessage) ; Display ShadyMessage
LI A2 0
JAL ShowMessage
LI A3 0

; Obligatory message box closing/cleanup calls.
JAL 0x800EC9DC
NOP
JAL CloseMessage
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6EC
NOP

;===Check Player Item Slots===
JAL GetPlayerStruct
LI A0 -1 ; Get current player struct at V0
MOVE S0 V0 ; Copy V0 to S0

JAL PlayerHasEmptyItemSlot
LBU A0 0x1D(S0) ; Pass current player index on A0

BLTZ V0 GetCoins ; If V0 < 0 (no empty slots), get coins
NOP
MOVE S1 V0 ; Copy V0 to S1

;===Determine Item===
JAL GetPlayerPlacement
LBU A0 0x1D(S0) ; Get current player placement (0-3) at V0
SLL V0 V0 1 ; Shift left by 1 (multiply by 2)
JAL GetRand ; Get random byte (0-1,3,5,7) at V0
ADDIU A0 V0 1 ; Add 1 to get possible items

;===Receive Item===
LUI T0 hi(ItemTable)
ADDIU T0 T0 lo(ItemTable) ; Load item table into T0
ADDU T0 T0 V0 ; Add item offset to item table
LBU T0 0(T0) ; Load item into T0
ADDU S1 S0 S1 ; Add empty slot offset to player struct
SB T0 0x18(S1) ; Store item into empty slot offset of player struct

JAL PlaySound
LI A0 0x10C ; Turn Start sound

J HappyVoice
NOP

;===Get Coins===
GetCoins:
JAL GetRandomByte ; Get random byte (0-255) at V0
NOP
LI T0 16
DIVU V0 T0 ; Divide V0 by T0
MFHI S1 ; Store remainder into S1
ADDIU S1 S1 5 ; Add 5

LBU A0 0x1D(S0) ; Give current player coins
JAL AdjustPlayerCoinsGradual
MOVE A1 S1 ; Gain coins

LBU A0 0x1D(S0) ; Give current player coins
JAL ShowPlayerCoinChange
MOVE A1 S1 ; Gain coins

JAL SleepProcess
LI A0 30 ; Wait 30 frames for coin change

;===Play Happy Voice and Animation===
HappyVoice:
LBU A0 3(S0) ; Load character value from offset of player struct
JAL PlaySound
ADDIU A0 A0 0x2BE ; Add character value to Mario's happy voice
; Character voices are their "character value" distance away from
; Mario's, e.g. Luigi's character value = 1, so Luigi's happy voice
; is 1 away from Mario's.
; 0x2BE = Happy Voice, 0x287 = Sad Voice

LI A0 -1 ; Set current player
LI A1 5 ; Set joy animation
JAL SetBoardPlayerAnimation
LI A2 0 ; Do not loop animation

JAL SleepProcess
LI A0 40 ; Wait 40 frames for animation

exit:
LW RA 44(SP)
LW S0 40(SP)
LW S1 36(SP)
LW S2 32(SP)
JR RA
ADDIU SP SP 48

;===Mini Func to Get Random Byte===
.align 4
GetRand: ; returns on V0

; A0 = max byte

ADDIU sp, sp, -0x18
SW ra, 0x0010 (sp)
BLTZL a0, label1_func0
SUBU a0, r0, a0
label1_func0:
BEQZ a0, End1
DADDU v0, r0, r0
ADDIU v0, r0, 0x0001
BNEL a0, v0, label2_func0
ADDIU v0, r0, 0x0064
JAL Function1
ADDIU a0, r0, 0x03E8
SLTI v0, v0, 0x01F5
J End1
XORI v0, v0, 0x0001
label2_func0:
BEQ a0, v0, label3_func0
NOP
JAL Function1
NOP
J End1
NOP
label3_func0:
JAL Function1
ADDIU a0, r0, 0x03F1
LUI v1, 0x6666
ORI v1, v1, 0x6667
MULT v0, v1
SRA v0, v0, 31
MFHI a1
SRA v1, a1, 2
SUBU v0, v1, v0
End1:
LW ra, 0x0010 (sp)
JR RA
ADDIU sp, sp, 0x18
//
Function1:
ADDIU sp, sp, -0x20
SW s0, 0x0010 (sp)
ADDIU s0, r0, 0xFFFF
SW s1, 0x0014 (sp)
ADDIU s1, a0, 0x0001
BNEZ s1, label1_func1
DIVU s0, s1
BREAK 0x01C00
label1_func1:
MFLO s0
BNEZ s0, label2_func1
SW ra, 0x0018 (sp)
ADDIU s0, r0, 0x0001
label2_func1:
JAL Function2
NOP
BNEZ s0, label3_func1
DIVU v0, s0
BREAK 0x01C00
label3_func1:
MFLO v1
SLTU v0, v1, s1
BEQZ v0, label2_func1
DADDU v0, v1, r0
LW ra, 0x0018 (sp)
LW s1, 0x0014 (sp)
LW s0, 0x0010 (sp)
JR RA
ADDIU sp, sp, 0x20
//
Function2:
LUI v0, 0x8009
LW v0, 0x7650 (v0)
LUI v1, 0x41C6
ORI v1, v1, 0x4E6D
MULT v0, v1
MFLO v0
ADDIU v0, v0, 0x3039
LUI v1, 0x8009
JR RA
SW v0, 0x7650 (v1)

;===Item Table===
.align 16
ItemTable:
.byte 0x01 ; Skeleton Key index
.byte 0x03 ; Reverse Mushroom index
.byte 0x04 ; Cellular Shopper index
.byte 0x06 ; Plunder Chest index
.byte 0x09 ; Lucky Lamp index
.byte 0x0E ; Magic Lamp index
.byte 0x0F ; Koopa Kard index
.byte 0x10 ; Barter Box index

;===Message Text===
.align 16
ShadyMessage:
.byte 0x1A,0x1A,0x1A,0x1A ; Padding for character image
.ascii "Psst"
.byte 0xC2 ; Exclamation mark (!)
.ascii " Take"
.byte 0x06 ; Blue font
.ascii " this"
.byte 0x08,0xC2 ; White font, Exclamation mark (!)
.byte 0x0A,0x1A,0x1A,0x1A,0x1A ; New line + character image padding
.ascii "It"
.byte 0x5C ; Apostrophe (')
.ascii "s a secret to everybody"
.byte 0xC2 ; Exclamation mark (!)
.byte 0x0A,0x1A,0x1A,0x1A,0x1A ; New line + character image padding
.ascii "And don"
.byte 0x5C ; Apostrophe (')
.ascii "t ask me how I got this"
.byte 0x85 ; Period (.)
.ascii " It"
.byte 0x5C ; Apostrophe (')
.ascii "s"
.byte 0x0A,0x1A,0x1A,0x1A,0x1A ; New line + character image padding
.ascii "better if you don"
.byte 0x5C ; Apostrophe (')
.ascii "t know"
.byte 0x85,0x85,0x85 ; Three periods (...)
.byte 0xFF,0 ; Wait, press A to confirm

; Here's a list of the most common bytes you'll need
; .byte 0x01 ; Black font
; .byte 0x03 ; Red font
; .byte 0x04 ; Purple font
; .byte 0x05 ; Green font
; .byte 0x06 ; Blue font
; .byte 0x07 ; Yellow font
; .byte 0x08 ; White font
; .byte 0x85 ; Period (.)
; .byte 0xC2 ; Exclamation mark (!)
; .byte 0xC3 ; Question mark (?)
; .byte 0x82 ; Comma (,)
; .byte 0x0A ; New line (writes below)
; .byte 0x5C ; Apostrophe (')
; .byte 0x29 ; Coin icon
; .byte 0x3D ; Minus (-)
; .byte 0x3E ; Multiply (x)
; .byte 0xFF,0 ; Wait, press A to confirm

; If your message has an image, use this at the start of each line
; .byte 0x1A,0x1A,0x1A,0x1A ; Padding for character image

Last 5 Turns Event (KBC) v1.2.code:
; NAME: Last 5 Turns Event (KBC) v1.2
; GAMES: MP3_USA
; EXECUTION: Direct
; PARAM: Boolean|Last5Turns
; PARAM: Boolean|CustomBonusStar

; This code is adapted from Spongyoshi's "Last 5 Turns Event". Please
; refer to his original event if you want to use a Last 5 Turns Event
; on your own board.

ADDIU SP SP -80
SW RA 76(SP)
SW S0 72(SP)
SW S1 68(SP)
SW S2 64(SP)
SW S3 60(SP)
SW S4 56(SP)
SW S5 52(SP)
SW S6 48(SP)
SW S7 44(SP)

; S0 = Player Struct
; S1 = Prompt Choice
; S2 = Current Player Index Address
; S3 = Player Placement Array / New Ruleset Address / Value (Boosted Player Index)
; S4 = Player Placement Array (Shifted) / Item Chances Table / Bank Coins Address
; S5 = Items Table / Item Index / Coin Prize
; S6 = Current Player Index / Players' Coins (Revolution)
; S7 = Coin Tally / Loop Counter (Opponent Player Index)
; 40(SP) = Exit Flag
; 36(SP) = Player Placement Array Shifted

;===Get Current Player Index Address===
LUI S2 hi(current_player_index)
ADDIU S2 S2 lo(current_player_index) ; Load current player index address

;===Check Current Turn===
LUI T0 hi(total_turns)
ADDIU T0 T0 lo(total_turns) ; Load total turns address
LBU T1 1(T0) ; Load current turn
LBU T0 0(T0) ; Load total turns

SUBU T2 T0 T1 ; Subtract current turn from total turns
LI T3 5
BEQ T2 T3 StartEvent ; If it's the 5th last turn, start event
NOP
SLT T2 T2 T3 ; If T2 < T3, T2 = 1 (within last 5 turns)
BNEZ T2 CheckBonuses ; If within last 5 turns, check bonuses
NOP
LUI T0 0x800C ; 0x800C0000
ORI T0 T0 0xD0AB ; 0x800CD0AB, Wacky Watch Flag
LBU T0 0(T0) ; Load flag into T0
LI T1 2
BEQ T0 T1 StartEvent ; If flag = 2, Wacky Watch just used, start event
NOP
; else, exit
J exit
NOP

;===Start Event===
StartEvent:
LI T0 Last5Turns
BEQZ T0 exit ; If Last5Turns toggled OFF, then exit
NOP
; else, start the event

; Fade-out?

JAL PlaySound
LI A0 0x0C ; Bell ringing

JAL SleepProcess
LI A0 40 ; Wait 40 frames for sound + anticipation

JAL PlayMusic
LI A0 19 ; Play the Last 5 Turns music

JAL PlaySound
LI A0 0x257 ; Boo laugh

LI A0 0x7 ; Boo image
LUI A1 hi(GreetingMessage)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(GreetingMessage) ; Display GreetingMessage
JAL CallMessage2
LI A2 0 ; No string

SW R0 40(SP) ; Set exit flag to 0 (event has not started)

JAL SleepProcess
LI A0 20 ; Wait 20 frames for anticipation

;===Prepare Player Placement Array===
LUI S3 hi(PlacementArray)
ADDIU S3 S3 lo(PlacementArray) ; Load Player Placement Array

JAL GetPlayerPlacement
LI A0 0 ; Get P1 placement at V0
SB V0 0(S3) ; Store P1 placement into array

JAL GetPlayerPlacement
LI A0 1 ; Get P2 placement at V0
SB V0 1(S3) ; Store P2 placement into array

JAL GetPlayerPlacement
LI A0 2 ; Get P3 placement at V0
SB V0 2(S3) ; Store P3 placement into array

JAL GetPlayerPlacement
LI A0 3 ; Get P4 placement at V0
SB V0 3(S3) ; Store P4 placement into array

;===Find 4th Place===
MOVE S4 S3 ; Copy S3 to S4
LI T0 3 ; Find 4th place
LI T4 4 ; Terminator value
LI S6 0 ; Start with P1
4thPlaceLoop:
LBU T3 0(S4) ; Check player placement
BEQL T3 T4 Exit4th ; If all players checked, exit 4th place
MOVE S4 S3 ; Copy S3 to S4 on likely
BEQ T0 T3 FourthPlaceEvent ; If player is 4th, start event
NOP
ADDIU S4 S4 1 ; Add 1 to check next player
J 4thPlaceLoop
ADDIU S6 S6 1 ; Add 1 to set next player

Exit4th:
LI S6 0 ; Start with P1

;===Find 3rd Place===
Find3rdPlace:
LI T0 2 ; Find 3rd place
LI T4 4 ; Terminator value
LBU T3 0(S4) ; Check player placement
BEQL T3 T4 Exit3rd ; If all players checked, exit 3rd place
MOVE S4 S3 ; Copy S3 to S4 on likely
BEQ T0 T3 ThirdPlaceEvent ; If player is 3rd, start event
NOP
3rdPlaceLoop:
ADDIU S4 S4 1 ; Add 1 to check next player
J Find3rdPlace
ADDIU S6 S6 1 ; Add 1 to set next player

Exit3rd:
LW T4 40(SP) ; Load exit flag
BNEZ T4 ExitWindow2 ; If event has occurred, exit
NOP
; else, still checking for last place, so find 2nd place

LI S6 0 ; Start with P1

;===Find 2nd Place===
Find2ndPlace:
LI T0 1 ; Find 2nd place
LI T4 4 ; Terminator value
LBU T3 0(S4) ; Check player placement
BEQ T3 T4 Exit2nd ; If all players checked, exit 2nd place
NOP
BEQ T0 T3 SecondPlaceEvent ; If player is 2nd, start event
NOP
2ndPlaceLoop:
ADDIU S4 S4 1 ; Add 1 to check next player
J Find2ndPlace
ADDIU S6 S6 1 ; Add 1 to set next player

Exit2nd:
LW T4 40(SP) ; Load exit flag
BNEZ T4 ExitWindow2 ; If event has occurred, exit
NOP
; else, no one is 2nd, everyone is tied for 1st

;===First Place Event===
; Fade-in?

JAL PlaySound
LI A0 0x25E ; Boo cry

LI A0 0x7 ; Boo image
LUI A1 hi(NoEventMessage)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(NoEventMessage) ; Display NoEventMessage
JAL CallMessage2
LI A2 0 ; No string

J exit
NOP

;===Second Place Event===
SecondPlaceEvent:
SW T0 40(SP) ; Turn exit flag ON
SW S4 36(SP) ; Store placement array read (shifted) into S9

; Fade-in?

SB S6 0(S2) ; Set checked player as current player
JAL GetPlayerStruct
MOVE A0 S6 ; Get checked player struct at V0
MOVE S0 V0 ; Copy V0 to S0

;===Start Second Place Prompt===
JAL PlaySound
LI A0 0x257 ; Boo laugh

StartSecondPlacePrompt:
JAL CallTiedPrompt
LBU A0 3(S0) ; Pass character value on A0

; Change the outcome based on the choice.
BEQZ V0 SecondItem
NOP
LI T0 1
BEQ V0 T0 SecondCoins
NOP
; else pick "View map"
JAL ViewBoardMap
NOP
J StartThirdPlacePrompt
NOP

;===Second Item===
SecondItem:
JAL PlaySound
LI A0 0x143 ; Shining star

JAL SleepProcess
LI A0 50 ; Wait 50 frames for sound + anticipation

;===Determine Item===
LUI S4 hi(SecondItemChances)
ADDIU S4 S4 lo(SecondItemChances) ; Load Second Item Chances Table

JAL GetRand
LI A0 99 ; Get random byte (0-99) at V0

LUI S5 hi(ItemsTable)
ADDIU S5 S5 lo(ItemsTable) ; Load Items Table

SecondItemLoop:
LBU T4 0(S4) ; Load item chance
SLT T0 V0 T4 ; If V0 < T4, T0 = 1
BNEZ T0 Get2ndItem ; If T0 = 1, get item
NOP
ADDIU S4 S4 1 ; Add 1 to get next item chance
J SecondItemLoop
ADDIU S5 S5 1 ; Add 1 to get next item

Get2ndItem:
MOVE A0 S0 ; Pass 2nd player struct on A0
JAL ItemGiveaway
LBU A1 0(S5) ; Pass item given on A1

BEQZ V0 SecondPlaceFade ; If unhappy, skip happy voice
NOP

JAL HappyVoice
LBU A0 3(S0) ; Pass character value on A0

J SecondPlaceFade ; Fade back out
NOP

;===Second Coins===
SecondCoins:
LBU A0 0x1D(S0) ; Give current player coins
JAL AdjustPlayerCoinsGradual
LI A1 15 ; Get 15 coins

LBU A0 0x1D(S0) ; Give current player coins
JAL ShowPlayerCoinChange
LI A1 15 ; Get 15 coins

JAL SleepProcess
LI A0 30 ; Wait 30 frames for coin change

JAL HappyVoice
LBU A0 3(S0) ; Pass character value on A0

;===Second Place Fade===
SecondPlaceFade:
; Fade-out?

J 2ndPlaceLoop ; Continue checking for 2nd place
LW S4 36(SP) ; Load player placement array read (shifted) from S9

;===Third Place Event===
ThirdPlaceEvent:
SW T0 40(SP) ; Turn exit flag ON
SW S4 36(SP) ; Store placement array read (shifted) into S9

; Fade-in?

SB S6 0(S2) ; Set checked player as current player
JAL GetPlayerStruct
MOVE A0 S6 ; Get checked player struct at V0
MOVE S0 V0 ; Copy V0 to S0

;===Start Third Place Prompt===
JAL PlaySound
LI A0 0x257 ; Boo laugh

StartThirdPlacePrompt:
JAL CallTiedPrompt
LBU A0 3(S0) ; Pass character value on A0

; Change the outcome based on the choice.
BEQZ V0 ThirdItem
NOP
LI T0 1
BEQ V0 T0 ThirdCoins
NOP
; else pick "View map"
JAL ViewBoardMap
NOP
J StartThirdPlacePrompt
NOP

;===Third Item===
ThirdItem:
JAL PlaySound
LI A0 0x143 ; Shining star

JAL SleepProcess
LI A0 50 ; Wait 50 frames for sound + anticipation

;===Determine Item===
LUI S4 hi(ThirdItemChances)
ADDIU S4 S4 lo(ThirdItemChances) ; Load Third Item Chances Table

JAL GetRand
LI A0 99 ; Get random byte (0-99) at V0

LUI S5 hi(ItemsTable)
ADDIU S5 S5 lo(ItemsTable) ; Load Items Table

ThirdItemLoop:
LBU T4 0(S4) ; Load item chance
SLT T0 V0 T4 ; If V0 < T4, T0 = 1
BNEZ T0 Get3rdItem ; If T0 = 1, get item
NOP
ADDIU S4 S4 1 ; Add 1 to get next item chance
J ThirdItemLoop
ADDIU S5 S5 1 ; Add 1 to get next item

Get3rdItem:
MOVE A0 S0 ; Pass 3rd player struct on A0
JAL ItemGiveaway
LBU A1 0(S5) ; Pass item given on A1

BEQZ V0 ThirdPlaceFade ; If unhappy, skip happy voice
NOP

JAL HappyVoice
LBU A0 3(S0) ; Pass character value on A0

J ThirdPlaceFade ; Fade back out
NOP

;===Third Coins===
ThirdCoins:
LBU A0 0x1D(S0) ; Give current player coins
JAL AdjustPlayerCoinsGradual
LI A1 20 ; Get 20 coins

LBU A0 0x1D(S0) ; Give current player coins
JAL ShowPlayerCoinChange
LI A1 20 ; Get 20 coins

JAL SleepProcess
LI A0 30 ; Wait 30 frames for coin change

JAL HappyVoice
LBU A0 3(S0) ; Pass character value on A0

;===Third Place Fade===
ThirdPlaceFade:
; Fade-out?

J 3rdPlaceLoop ; Continue checking for 3rd place
LW S4 36(SP) ; Load player placement array read (shifted) from S9

;===Fourth Place Event===
FourthPlaceEvent:
; Fade-in?

SB S6 0(S2) ; Set 4th place player as current player
JAL GetPlayerStruct
MOVE A0 S6 ; Get 4th place player struct at V0
MOVE S0 V0 ; Copy V0 to S0

;===Start Fourth Place Prompt===
JAL PlaySound
LI A0 0x257 ; Boo laugh

StartFourthPlacePrompt:
LI A0 0x7 ; Boo image
LUI A1 hi(MainPrompt)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(MainPrompt) ; Display MainPrompt
LBU A2 3(S0) ; Load character value from offset of player struct
ADDIU A2 A2 0x1C00 ; Add the character value to MARIO string
JAL CallMessage
LI A3 1 ; Display prompt

JAL GetRand
LI A0 2 ; Get random byte (0-2) at V0

; Get the selection, either from the player or CPU.
; If A0 is a pointer to AI data, AI logic is ran to pick for CPUs.
; If A0 is 0 or 1, the 0th or 1st option is chosen by CPUs.
; If A0 is 2, then the value of A1 is the CPUs option index choice.
LI A0 2
JAL GetBasicPromptSelection
MOVE A1 V0
MOVE S1 V0 ; S1 now has the chosen option index

; Obligatory message box closing/cleanup calls.
JAL CloseMessage
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6EC
NOP

; Change the outcome based on the choice.
BEQZ S1 SomeItem
NOP
LI T0 1
BEQ S1 T0 SomeCoins
NOP
LI T0 2
BEQ S1 T0 SomeRules
NOP
; else pick "View map"
JAL ViewBoardMap
NOP
J StartFourthPlacePrompt
NOP

;===Get Some Item===
SomeItem:
JAL PlaySound
LI A0 0x143 ; Shining star

JAL SleepProcess
LI A0 50 ; Wait 50 frames for sound + anticipation

;===Determine Item===
LUI S4 hi(FourthItemChances)
ADDIU S4 S4 lo(FourthItemChances) ; Load Fourth Item Chances Table

JAL GetRand
LI A0 99 ; Get random byte (0-99) at V0

LUI S5 hi(ItemsTable)
ADDIU S5 S5 lo(ItemsTable) ; Load Items Table

RandomItemLoop:
LBU T4 0(S4) ; Load item chance
SLT T0 V0 T4 ; If V0 < T4, T0 = 1
BNEZ T0 GetItem ; If T0 = 1, get item
NOP
ADDIU S4 S4 1 ; Add 1 to get next item chance
J RandomItemLoop
ADDIU S5 S5 1 ; Add 1 to get next item

GetItem:
MOVE A0 S0 ; Pass 4th player struct on A0
JAL ItemGiveaway
LBU A1 0(S5) ; Pass item given on A1

BEQZ V0 ExitWindow ; If unhappy, exit
NOP

JAL HappyVoice
LBU A0 3(S0) ; Pass character value on A0

J ExitWindow
NOP

;===Get Some Coins===
SomeCoins:
JAL PlaySound
LI A0 0x143 ; Shining star

JAL SleepProcess
LI A0 50 ; Wait 50 frames for sound + anticipation

;===Determine Coin Event===
JAL GetRand
LI A0 6 ; Get random byte (0-6) at V0

SLTI T0 V0 2 ; If V0 < 2, T0 = 1
BNEZ T0 GetCoinsOrStar ; If T0 = 1, get coins or star
NOP
SLTI T0 V0 4 ; If V0 < 4, T0 = 1
BNEZ T0 StealCoins ; If T0 = 1, steal coins
NOP
SLTI T0 V0 6 ; If V0 < 6, T0 = 1
BNEZ T0 BankMaster ; If T0 = 1, get bank master
NOP
; else, get Bowser Revolution

;===Bowser Revolution===
BowserRevolution:
JAL PlaySound
LI A0 0x257 ; Boo laugh

LI A0 0x7 ; Boo image
LUI A1 hi(RevolutionMessage)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(RevolutionMessage)
LBU A2 3(S0) ; Load character value from offset of player struct
ADDIU A2 A2 0x1C00 ; Add the character value to MARIO string
JAL CallMessage
LI A3 0 ; Display message

JAL PlaySound
LI A0 0x29C ; Bowser laugh

JAL SleepProcess
LI A0 20 ; Wait 20 frames for sound

;===Take Coins from All Players===
LI S7 0 ; Start with P1
LI S5 0 ; Start with 0 coins
TakeCoinsLoop:
JAL GetPlayerStruct
MOVE A0 S7 ; Get player struct at V0
LHU S6 0xA(V0) ; Get player coins
ADDU S5 S6 S5 ; Add coins to pot

MOVE A0 S7 ; Take coins from player
JAL AdjustPlayerCoinsGradual
SUBU A1 R0 S6 ; Subtract coins

MOVE A0 S7 ; Take coins from player
JAL 0x800E1F28 ; ShowPlayerCoinChangeHUD
SUBU A1 R0 S6 ; Subtract coins

LI T0 3
BEQ S7 T0 RevolutionPart2 ; If all players' coins taken, go to part 2
NOP
J TakeCoinsLoop
ADDIU S7 S7 1 ; Add 1 to get next player

RevolutionPart2:
JAL SleepProcess
LI A0 30 ; Wait 30 frames for coin change

;===Divide Total Coins Equally===
LI T0 4
DIVU S5 T0 ; Divide coin pot by four
MFLO S6 ; Move the result into S6

;===Give Coins to All Players===
LI S7 0 ; Start with P1
GiveCoinsLoop:
MOVE A0 S7 ; Give coins to player
JAL AdjustPlayerCoinsGradual
MOVE A1 S6 ; Gain coins

MOVE A0 S7 ; Give coins to player
JAL 0x800E1F28 ; ShowPlayerCoinChangeHUD
MOVE A1 S6 ; Gain coins

LI T0 3
BEQ S7 T0 ExitRevolution ; If all players given coins, exit
NOP
J GiveCoinsLoop
ADDIU S7 S7 1 ; Add 1 to get next player

ExitRevolution:
JAL SleepProcess
LI A0 30 ; Wait 30 frames for coin change

J ExitWindow
NOP

;===Get Coins or Star===
GetCoinsOrStar:
JAL PlaySound
LI A0 0x257 ; Boo laugh

LI A0 0x7 ; Boo image
LUI A1 hi(PrizeMessage)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(PrizeMessage) ; Display PrizeMessage
LBU A2 3(S0) ; Load character value from offset of player struct
ADDIU A2 A2 0x1C00 ; Add the character value to MARIO string
JAL CallMessage
LI A3 0 ; Display message

JAL GetPlayerPlacementAtEndOfGame
LBU A0 0x1D(S0) ; Get current player placement (with Bonus Stars) at V0

SLTI T0 V0 2 ; If V0 < 2, T0 = 1
BNEZ T0 CoinPrize ; If current player is 1st or 2nd, get coin prize
NOP
; else, try for star prize

;===Star Prize===
LBU T0 0xE(S0) ; Load stars from offset of player struct
LI T1 99
BEQ T0 T1 CoinPrize ; If player has 99 stars, get coin prize
NOP

LBU A0 0xF(S0) ; Pass current chain index on A0
JAL GetAbsSpaceIndexFromChainSpaceIndex
LBU A1 0x10(S0) ; Pass current chain space index on A1

JAL GetSpaceData
MOVE A0 V0 ; Get abs space data at V0

LW T0 8(V0) ; Load x pos of the space
LW T1 12(V0) ; Load y pos of the space
LW T2 16(V0) ; Load z pos of the space

LUI A0 hi(StarCoords)
ADDIU A0 A0 lo(StarCoords) ; Load pointer to star coords

SW T0 12(A0) ; Store x coords
SW T1 16(A0) ; Store y coords
JAL 0x80106A9C ; GetStar
SW T2 20(A0) ; Store z coords

JAL SleepProcess
LI A0 30 ; Wait 30 frames to get star

JAL PlayMusic
LI A0 19 ; Play the Last 5 Turns music

J ExitWindow
NOP

;===Coin Prize===
CoinPrize:
LBU A0 0x1D(S0) ; Give current player coins
JAL AdjustPlayerCoinsGradual
LI A1 30 ; Get 30 coins

LBU A0 0x1D(S0) ; Give current player coins
JAL ShowPlayerCoinChange
LI A1 30 ; Get 30 coins

JAL SleepProcess
LI A0 30 ; Wait 30 frames for coin change

JAL HappyVoice
LBU A0 3(S0) ; Pass character value on A0

J ExitWindow
NOP

;===Steal Coins===
StealCoins:
LBU S6 0(S2) ; Load current player index
BEQZ S6 SkipP1 ; If current player is P1, skip them
LI S7 0 ; Set coin tally to 0
LI A0 0 ; Check P1
JAL PlayerHasCoins
LI A1 5 ; Check for 5 coins

BEQZ V0 GetCoinsOrStar ; If P1 doesn't have 5 coins, don't steal
NOP
LI A0 0 ; Check P1
JAL PlayerHasCoins
LI A1 10 ; Check for 10 coins

ADDU S7 S7 V0 ; Add 1 to S7 if opponent has 10 coins

SkipP1:
LI T0 1
BEQ S6 T0 SkipP2 ; If current player is P2, skip them
NOP
LI A0 1 ; Check P2
JAL PlayerHasCoins
LI A1 5 ; Check for 5 coins

BEQZ V0 GetCoinsOrStar ; If P2 doesn't have 5 coins, don't steal
NOP
LI A0 1 ; Check P2
JAL PlayerHasCoins
LI A1 10 ; Check for 10 coins

ADDU S7 S7 V0 ; Add 1 to S7 if opponent has 10 coins

SkipP2:
LI T0 2
BEQ S6 T0 SkipP3 ; If current player is P3, skip them
NOP
LI A0 2 ; Check P3
JAL PlayerHasCoins
LI A1 5 ; Check for 5 coins

BEQZ V0 GetCoinsOrStar ; If P3 doesn't have 5 coins, don't steal
NOP
LI A0 2 ; Check P3
JAL PlayerHasCoins
LI A1 10 ; Check for 10 coins

ADDU S7 S7 V0 ; Add 1 to S7 if opponent has 10 coins

SkipP3:
LI T0 3
BEQ S6 T0 CheckCoinTally ; If current player is P4, check coin tally
NOP
LI A0 3 ; Check P4
JAL PlayerHasCoins
LI A1 5 ; Check for 5 coins

BEQZ V0 GetCoinsOrStar ; If P4 doesn't have 5 coins, don't steal
NOP
LI A0 3 ; Check P4
JAL PlayerHasCoins
LI A1 10 ; Check for 10 coins

ADDU S7 S7 V0 ; Add 1 to S7 if opponent has 10 coins

CheckCoinTally:
LI T0 3
BNE T0 S7 StealFive ; If S7 < 3, steal five coins
LI S5 0 ; Set coin prize to 0
; else, steal ten coins

ADDIU S5 S5 5 ; Add 5 coins
StealFive:
ADDIU S5 S5 5 ; Add 5 coins

;===Message and Coin Stealing===
JAL PlaySound
LI A0 0x257 ; Boo laugh

LI A0 0x7 ; Boo image
LUI A1 hi(CoinStealMessage)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(CoinStealMessage) ; Display CoinStealMessage
LBU A2 3(S0) ; Load character value from offset of player struct
ADDIU A2 A2 0x1C00 ; Add the character value to MARIO string
JAL CallMessage
LI A3 0 ; Display message

LI S7 0 ; Start with P1
StealLoop:
BEQ S6 S7 StealNext ; If checking current player, steal next player
NOP
MOVE A0 S7 ; Take coins from player
JAL AdjustPlayerCoinsGradual
SUBU A1 R0 S5 ; Subtract coins

MOVE A0 S7 ; Take coins from player
JAL 0x800E1F28 ; ShowPlayerCoinChangeHUD
SUBU A1 R0 S5 ; Subtract coins

StealNext:
LI T0 4
BEQ T0 S7 ExitSteal ; If all players checked, exit steal
NOP
J StealLoop
ADDIU S7 S7 1 ; Add 1 to get next player

ExitSteal:
JAL SleepProcess
LI A0 30 ; Wait 30 frames for coin change

;===Get Stolen Coins===
LI T0 3
MULT S5 T0 ; Multiply S5 by T0 (coins x3)
MFLO S5 ; Move the result into S5

LBU A0 0x1D(S0) ; Give current player coins
JAL AdjustPlayerCoinsGradual
MOVE A1 S5 ; Gain coins

LBU A0 0x1D(S0) ; Give current player coins
JAL ShowPlayerCoinChange
MOVE A1 S5 ; Gain coins

JAL SleepProcess
LI A0 30 ; Wait 30 frames for coin change

JAL HappyVoice
LBU A0 3(S0) ; Pass character value on A0

J ExitWindow
NOP

;===Bank Master===
BankMaster:
LUI S4 0x800C ; 0x800C0000
ORI S4 S4 0xD0B4 ; 0x800CD0B4, Bank Coin Total
LHU S5 0(S4) ; Load bank coins into S5
BNEZ S5 ContinueBankmaster ; If bank has coins, continue
NOP
; else, bank has no coins, get another option
JAL RNGPercentChance
LI A0 33 ; 33% chance of V0 = 1
BNEZ V0 StealCoins ; If V0 = 1, steal coins
NOP
JAL RNGPercentChance
LI A0 50 ; 50% chance of V0 = 1
BNEZ V0 BowserRevolution ; If V0 = 1, start Bowser Revolution
NOP
; else, get coins or star
J GetCoinsOrStar
NOP

ContinueBankmaster:
JAL PlaySound
LI A0 0x257 ; Boo laugh

LI A0 0x7 ; Boo image
LUI A1 hi(BankmasterMessage)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(BankmasterMessage) ; Display BankmasterMessage
LBU A2 3(S0) ; Load character value from offset of player struct
ADDIU A2 A2 0x1C00 ; Add the character value to MARIO string
JAL CallMessage
LI A3 0 ; Display message

;===Get Bank Coins===
LBU A0 0x1D(S0) ; Pass current player index on A0
JAL AdjustPlayerCoinsGradual
MOVE A1 S5 ; Pass bank coins on A1

LBU A0 0x1D(S0) ; Pass current player index on A0
JAL ShowPlayerCoinChange
MOVE A1 S5 ; Pass bank coins on A1

JAL SleepProcess
LI A0 30 ; Wait 30 frames for coin change

JAL HappyVoice
LBU A0 3(S0) ; Pass character value on A0

J ExitWindow
SH R0 0(S4) ; Empty bank coin total

;===Get Some Rules===
SomeRules:
JAL PlaySound
LI A0 0x143 ; Shining star

JAL SleepProcess
LI A0 50 ; Wait 50 frames for sound + anticipation

LUI S3 0x800C ; 0x800C0000
ORI S3 S3 0xD0A8 ; 0x800CD0A8, New Ruleset Address

JAL GetRand
LI A0 4 ; Get random byte (0-4) at V0

BEQZ V0 BlueSpaceRules ; If V0 = 0, get Blue Space Ruleset
NOP
LI T0 1
BEQ V0 T0 RedSpaceRules ; If V0 = 1, get Red Space Ruleset
NOP
LI T0 2
BEQ V0 T0 BankRules ; If V0 = 2, get Bank Ruleset
NOP
LI T0 3
BEQ V0 T0 BooRules ; If V0 = 3, get Boo Buddy Ruleset
NOP
; else, get Bonus Boost Ruleset

;===Prepare Bonus Boost Message===
LI A2 CustomBonusStar
SLL A2 A2 5 ; Multiply by 32 (distance between Bonus Star strings)
LUI T2 hi(HappeningStarString)
ADDIU T2 T2 lo(HappeningStarString)
ADDU A2 T2 A2 ; A2 now contains Bonus Star string

LUI A0 hi(ItemMessageHolder)
ADDIU A0 A0 lo(ItemMessageHolder) ; Parse destination
LUI A1 hi(BonusBoostRulesMessage)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(BonusBoostRulesMessage) ; String formatter (%s)
; Pass Bonus Star string on A2
JAL sprintf
LI A3 0 ; Terminator byte

;===Bonus Boost Ruleset Message===
JAL PlaySound
LI A0 0x257 ; Boo laugh

LI A0 0x7 ; Boo image
LUI A1 hi(ItemMessageHolder)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(ItemMessageHolder) ; Display BonusBoostRulesMessage with strings
LBU A2 3(S0) ; Load character value from offset of player struct
ADDIU A2 A2 0x1C00 ; Add the character value to MARIO string
JAL CallMessage
LI A3 0 ; Display message

LBU T1 0(S2) ; Load current player index
ADDIU T1 T1 5 ; Get current player Bonus Boost Ruleset
SB T1 0(S3) ; Set Bonus Boost Ruleset

J ExitWindow
NOP

;===Blue Space Ruleset===
BlueSpaceRules:
JAL PlaySound
LI A0 0x257 ; Boo laugh

LI A0 0x7 ; Boo image
LUI A1 hi(BlueSpaceRulesMessage)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(BlueSpaceRulesMessage) ; Display BlueSpaceRulesMessage
LI A2 0 ; No string
JAL CallMessage
LI A3 0 ; Display message

LI T1 1 ; Blue Space Ruleset
SB T1 0(S3) ; Set Blue Space Ruleset

J ExitWindow
NOP

;===Red Space Ruleset===
RedSpaceRules:
JAL PlaySound
LI A0 0x257 ; Boo laugh

LI A0 0x7 ; Boo image
LUI A1 hi(RedSpaceRulesMessage)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(RedSpaceRulesMessage) ; Display RedSpaceRulesMessage
LI A2 0 ; No string
JAL CallMessage
LI A3 0 ; Display message

LI T1 2 ; Red Space Ruleset
SB T1 0(S3) ; Set Red Space Ruleset

J ExitWindow
NOP

;===Bank Ruleset===
BankRules:
JAL PlaySound
LI A0 0x257 ; Boo laugh

LI A0 0x7 ; Boo image
LUI A1 hi(BankRulesMessage)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(BankRulesMessage) ; Display BankRulesMessage
LI A2 0 ; No string
JAL CallMessage
LI A3 0 ; Display message

LI T1 3 ; Bank Ruleset
SB T1 0(S3) ; Set Blue Space Ruleset

J ExitWindow
NOP

;===Boo Buddy Ruleset===
BooRules:
JAL PlaySound
LI A0 0x257 ; Boo laugh

LI A0 0x7 ; Boo image
LUI A1 hi(BooRulesMessage)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(BooRulesMessage) ; Display SeedRulesMessage
LI A2 0 ; No string
JAL CallMessage
LI A3 0 ; Display message

LI T1 4 ; Boo Buddy Ruleset
SB T1 0(S3) ; Set Boo Buddy Ruleset

J ExitWindow
NOP

;===Exit Window===
ExitWindow:
; Fade-out?

ExitWindow2:
; Fade-in?

JAL SleepProcess
LI A0 15 ; Wait 15 frames before camera reset

LI T0 3 ; P4 index
SB T0 0(S2) ; Set P4 as current player

JAL PlaySound
LI A0 0x257 ; Boo laugh

LI A0 0x7 ; Boo image
LUI A1 hi(ExitMessage)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(ExitMessage)
JAL CallMessage2
LI A2 0 ; No string

J exit
NOP

;===Check Bonuses===
CheckBonuses:
LUI S3 0x800C ; 0x800C0000
ORI S3 S3 0xD0A8 ; 0x800CD0A8, New Ruleset Address
LBU S3 0(S3) ; Load New Ruleset value

SLTI T0 S3 5 ; If S3 < 5, T0 = 1
BNEZ T0 CheckOut ; If ruleset is not Bonus Boost, check out
NOP
; else, ruleset is Bonus Boost

ADDIU S3 S3 -5 ; Subtract 8 to get boosted player index

JAL GetPlayerStruct
MOVE A0 S3 ; Get boosted player struct at V0
MOVE S0 V0 ; Copy V0 to S0

JAL GetRand
LI A0 2 ; Get random byte (0-2) at V0

BEQZ V0 BoostCoinStar
NOP
LI T0 1
BEQ V0 T0 BoostHappeningStar
NOP
; else, boost Minigame Star

;===Boost Minigame Star===
LHU T0 0x28(S0) ; Load minigame star from offset of player struct
ADDIU T0 T0 7 ; Boost minigame star
J BoostedWindow
SH T0 0x28(S0) ; Store boosted minigame star into offset of player struct

;===Boost Coin Star===
BoostCoinStar:
LHU T0 0x2A(S0) ; Load coin star from offset of player struct
ADDIU T0 T0 10 ; Boost coin star
J BoostedWindow
SH T0 0x2A(S0) ; Store boosted coin star into offset of player struct

;===Boost Happening Star===
BoostHappeningStar:
LI T0 CustomBonusStar ; Check if CustomBonusStar is turned ON
BNEZ T0 BoostCustomStar ; If turned ON, boost custom star
NOP
; else, boost happening star
LBU T0 0x2C(S0) ; Load happening star from offset of player struct
ADDIU T0 T0 1 ; Boost happening star
J BoostedWindow
SB T0 0x2C(S0) ; Store boosted happening star into offset of player struct

;===Boost Custom Star===
BoostCustomStar:
LBU T0 0x1E(S0) ; Load ticket star from offset of player struct
ADDIU T0 T0 1 ; Boost ticket star
SB T0 0x1E(S0) ; Store boosted ticket star into offset of player struct

;===Boosted Window===
BoostedWindow:
; Fade-out?

JAL PlaySound
LI A0 0x143 ; Shining star

JAL SleepProcess
LI A0 50 ; Wait 50 frames for sound + anticipation

; Fade-in?

SB S3 0(S2) ; Set boosted player as current player

;===Boosted Message===
LI A0 -1 ; No character image
LUI A1 hi(BoostedMessage)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(BoostedMessage)
LBU A2 3(S0) ; Load character value from offset of player struct
JAL CallMessage2
ADDIU A2 A2 0x1C00 ; Add the character value to MARIO string

JAL HappyVoice
LBU A0 3(S0) ; Pass character value on A0

; Fade-out?

LI T3 3 ; P4 index
SB T3 0(S2) ; Set P4 as current player

;===Check Wacky Watch===
CheckOut:
LUI T0 0x800C ; 0x800C0000
ORI T0 T0 0xD0AB ; 0x800CD0AB, Wacky Watch Flag
LBU T0 0(T0) ; Load flag into T0
LI T1 2
BEQ T0 T1 StartEvent ; If flag = 2, Wacky Watch just used, start event
NOP

;===Check Custom Bonus Star===
LI T0 CustomBonusStar ; Check if CustomBonusStar is turned ON
BEQZ T0 exit ; If turned OFF, exit
NOP
; else, check when to set up custom bonus star

LUI T0 hi(total_turns)
ADDIU T0 T0 lo(total_turns) ; Load total turns address
LBU T1 1(T0) ; Load current turn
LBU T0 0(T0) ; Load total turns

BNE T0 T1 exit ; If it's not the last turn, exit
NOP
; else, it's the last turn, so set up custom bonus star

;===Set-up Custom Bonus Star===
LUI T0 0x800D ; 0x800D0000
ORI T1 T0 0x1126 ; 0x800D1126, P1 Ticket Star
LBU T2 0(T1) ; Load P1 Ticket Star
SB T2 0xE(T1) ; Store P1 Ticket Star into Happening Star

ORI T1 T0 0x115E ; 0x800D115E, P2 Ticket Star
LBU T2 0(T1) ; Load P2 Ticket Star
SB T2 0xE(T1) ; Store P2 Ticket Star into Happening Star

ORI T1 T0 0x1196 ; 0x800D1196, P3 Ticket Star
LBU T2 0(T1) ; Load P3 Ticket Star
SB T2 0xE(T1) ; Store P3 Ticket Star into Happening Star

ORI T1 T0 0x11CE ; 0x800D11CE, P4 Ticket Star
LBU T2 0(T1) ; Load P4 Ticket Star
SB T2 0xE(T1) ; Store P4 Ticket Star into Happening Star

exit:
LW RA 76(SP)
LW S0 72(SP)
LW S1 68(SP)
LW S2 64(SP)
LW S3 60(SP)
LW S4 56(SP)
LW S5 52(SP)
LW S6 48(SP)
LW S7 44(SP)
JR RA
ADDIU SP SP 80

;===Star Coords===
.align 32
StarCoords:
.word 0x8012EA10 ; Star model
.word 0x80134E20 ; Star model
.word 0x0A020008 ; Star model
.word 0x00000000 ; X coords
.word 0x00000000 ; Y coords
.word 0x00000000 ; Z coords

;===Mini Func to Call Message 2===
.align 4
CallMessage2:
ADDIU SP SP -40
SW RA 36(SP)

; A0 = Character image
; A1 = Message Address
; A2 = String #1

SW R0 16(SP) ; A4
SW R0 20(SP) ; A5
SW R0 24(SP) ; A6
LI T0 100 ; 100 y-axis units
SW T0 28(SP) ; A7
; Pass character image on A0
; Pass message address on A1
; Pass String #1 on A2
JAL 0x800EC980 ; ShowMessage2
LI A3 0

; Obligatory message box closing/cleanup calls.
JAL 0x800EC9DC
NOP
JAL CloseMessage
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6EC
NOP

LW RA 36(SP)
JR RA
ADDIU SP SP 40

;===Mini Func to Call Tied Prompt===
.align 4
CallTiedPrompt:
ADDIU SP SP -40
SW RA 36(SP)
SW S0 32(SP)

; A0 = Character value
; S0 / V0 = Prompt Choice

ADDIU A2 A0 0x1C00 ; Add the character value to MARIO string
LI A0 0x7 ; Boo image
LUI A1 hi(TiedPrompt)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(TiedPrompt) ; Display TiedPrompt
JAL CallMessage
LI A3 1 ; Display prompt

JAL RNGPercentChance
LI A0 50 ; 50% chance of V0 = 1

; Get the selection, either from the player or CPU.
; If A0 is a pointer to AI data, AI logic is ran to pick for CPUs.
; If A0 is 0 or 1, the 0th or 1st option is chosen by CPUs.
; If A0 is 2, then the value of A1 is the CPUs option index choice.
LI A0 2
JAL GetBasicPromptSelection
MOVE A1 V0 ; Copy V0 to A1
MOVE S0 V0 ; Copy V0 to S0

; Obligatory message box closing/cleanup calls.
JAL CloseMessage
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6EC
NOP

MOVE V0 S0 ; Copy S0 to V0

LW RA 36(SP)
LW S0 32(SP)
JR RA
ADDIU SP SP 40

;===Mini Func to Call Message or Prompt===
.align 4
CallMessage:
ADDIU SP SP -40
SW RA 36(SP)
SW S0 32(SP)

; A0 = Character image
; A1 = Message Address
; A2 = String #1
; A3 / S0 = Message or Prompt Flag (0 or 1)

MOVE S0 A3 ; Copy A3 to S0

SW R0 16(SP) ; A4
SW R0 20(SP) ; A5
SW R0 24(SP) ; A6
; Pass character image on A0
; Pass message address on A1
; Pass String #1 on A2
JAL ShowMessage
LI A3 0

BNEZ S0 ExitCallMessage ; If displaying prompt, exit
NOP

; Obligatory message box closing/cleanup calls.
JAL 0x800EC9DC
NOP
JAL CloseMessage
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6EC
NOP

ExitCallMessage:
LW RA 36(SP)
LW S0 32(SP)
JR RA
ADDIU SP SP 40

;===Mini Func to Get Random Byte===
.align 4
GetRand: ; returns on V0

; A0 = max byte

ADDIU sp, sp, -0x18
SW ra, 0x0010 (sp)
BLTZL a0, label1_func0
SUBU a0, r0, a0
label1_func0:
BEQZ a0, End1
DADDU v0, r0, r0
ADDIU v0, r0, 0x0001
BNEL a0, v0, label2_func0
ADDIU v0, r0, 0x0064
JAL Function1
ADDIU a0, r0, 0x03E8
SLTI v0, v0, 0x01F5
J End1
XORI v0, v0, 0x0001
label2_func0:
BEQ a0, v0, label3_func0
NOP
JAL Function1
NOP
J End1
NOP
label3_func0:
JAL Function1
ADDIU a0, r0, 0x03F1
LUI v1, 0x6666
ORI v1, v1, 0x6667
MULT v0, v1
SRA v0, v0, 31
MFHI a1
SRA v1, a1, 2
SUBU v0, v1, v0
End1:
LW ra, 0x0010 (sp)
JR RA
ADDIU sp, sp, 0x18
//
Function1:
ADDIU sp, sp, -0x20
SW s0, 0x0010 (sp)
ADDIU s0, r0, 0xFFFF
SW s1, 0x0014 (sp)
ADDIU s1, a0, 0x0001
BNEZ s1, label1_func1
DIVU s0, s1
BREAK 0x01C00
label1_func1:
MFLO s0
BNEZ s0, label2_func1
SW ra, 0x0018 (sp)
ADDIU s0, r0, 0x0001
label2_func1:
JAL Function2
NOP
BNEZ s0, label3_func1
DIVU v0, s0
BREAK 0x01C00
label3_func1:
MFLO v1
SLTU v0, v1, s1
BEQZ v0, label2_func1
DADDU v0, v1, r0
LW ra, 0x0018 (sp)
LW s1, 0x0014 (sp)
LW s0, 0x0010 (sp)
JR RA
ADDIU sp, sp, 0x20
//
Function2:
LUI v0, 0x8009
LW v0, 0x7650 (v0)
LUI v1, 0x41C6
ORI v1, v1, 0x4E6D
MULT v0, v1
MFLO v0
ADDIU v0, v0, 0x3039
LUI v1, 0x8009
JR RA
SW v0, 0x7650 (v1)

;===Mini Func for Item Giveaway===
.align 4
ItemGiveaway:
ADDIU SP SP -48
SW RA 44(SP)
SW S0 40(SP)
SW S1 36(SP)
SW S2 32(SP)

; A0 / S0 = Current Player Struct
; A1 / S1 = Item Index
; S2 = Empty Item Slot / Prompt Choice / Item Slot to Replace
; V0 = Happy or Unhappy Exit (1 or 0)

MOVE S0 A0 ; Copy A0 to S0
MOVE S1 A1 ; Copy A1 to S1

JAL PlayerHasEmptyItemSlot
LBU A0 0x1D(S0) ; Check current player for empty item slot

BLTZ V0 TooManyItems ; If V0 = -1, go to TooManyItems
MOVE S2 V0 ; Copy V0 to S2

MOVE A0 S1 ; Pass item index on A0
LUI A1 hi(ItemGiveawayMessage)
JAL PrepareItemString
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(ItemGiveawayMessage) ; Print ItemGiveawayMessage

LI A0 0x7 ; Boo image
LUI A1 hi(ItemMessageHolder)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(ItemMessageHolder) ; Display ItemGiveawayMessage with strings
LBU A2 3(S0) ; Load character value from offset of player struct
ADDIU A2 A2 0x1C00 ; Add the character value to MARIO string
JAL CallMessage
LI A3 0 ; Display message

ADDU S2 S0 S2 ; Add empty item slot offset to player struct
SB S1 0x18(S2) ; Get new item

JAL PlaySound
LI A0 0x10C ; Turn Start sound

JAL SleepProcess
LI A0 30 ; Wait 30 frames for sound

J ExitItemGiveaway
LI V0 1 ; Happy exit

TooManyItems:
MOVE A0 S0 ; Pass current player struct on A0
LUI A1 hi(ItemPrompt)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(ItemPrompt) ; Print ItemPrompt
JAL PrepareItemStrings
MOVE A2 S1 ; Pass item index on A2

JAL PlaySound
LI A0 0x25E ; Boo cry

StartItemPrompt:
LI A0 0x7 ; Boo image
LUI A1 hi(ItemMessageHolder)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(ItemMessageHolder) ; Display ItemPrompt with strings
LI A2 0
JAL CallMessage
LI A3 1 ; Display prompt

JAL GetRand
LI A0 3 ; Get random byte (0-3) at V0

; Get the selection, either from the player or CPU.
; If A0 is a pointer to AI data, AI logic is ran to pick for CPUs.
; If A0 is 0 or 1, the 0th or 1st option is chosen by CPUs.
; If A0 is 2, then the value of A1 is the CPUs option index choice.
LI A0 2
JAL GetBasicPromptSelection
MOVE A1 V0
MOVE S2 V0 ; S2 now has the chosen option index

; Obligatory message box closing/cleanup calls.
JAL CloseMessage
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6EC
NOP

; Change the outcome based on the choice.
SLTI T2 S2 3
BNEZ T2 DeleteItem
NOP
LI T0 3
BEQ S2 T0 DiscardItem
NOP
; else pick "View map"
JAL ViewBoardMap
NOP
J StartItemPrompt
NOP

DeleteItem:
ADDU S2 S0 S2 ; Add item slot offset to player struct
SB S1 0x18(S2) ; Get new item
J ExitItemGiveaway
LI V0 1 ; Happy exit

DiscardItem:
LI A0 0x7 ; Boo image
LUI A1 hi(DiscardItemMessage)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(DiscardItemMessage)
LI A2 0
JAL CallMessage
LI A3 0 ; Display message
LI V0 0 ; Unhappy exit

ExitItemGiveaway:
LW RA 44(SP)
LW S0 40(SP)
LW S1 36(SP)
LW S2 32(SP)
JR RA
ADDIU SP SP 48

;===Mini Func to Prepare Item String===
.align 4
PrepareItemString:
ADDIU SP SP -40
SW RA 36(SP)

; A0 = Item Index
; A1 = Message Address to Print

LUI T0 hi(ItemStrings)
ADDIU T0 T0 lo(ItemStrings) ; Load Item Strings
SLL T1 A0 5 ; Multiply item index by 32 (distance between item strings)
ADDU A2 T0 T1 ; Add to get its item string

LUI A0 hi(ItemMessageHolder)
ADDIU A0 A0 lo(ItemMessageHolder) ; Parse destination
; Pass message address on A1 (string formatter %s)
; Pass item string on A2
JAL sprintf
LI A3 0 ; Terminator byte

LW RA 36(SP)
JR RA
ADDIU SP SP 40

;===Mini Func to Prepare Item Strings===
.align 4
PrepareItemStrings:
ADDIU SP SP -40
SW RA 36(SP)

; A0 = Current Player Struct
; A1 = Message Address to Print
; A2 = Item Index

LUI T0 hi(ItemStrings)
ADDIU T0 T0 lo(ItemStrings) ; Load Item Strings
LBU T1 0x18(A0) ; Load item #1 from offset of player struct
LBU T2 0x19(A0) ; Load item #2 from offset of player struct
LBU T3 0x1A(A0) ; Load item #3 from offset of player struct

SLL A3 T1 5 ; Multiply item #1 by 32 (distance between item strings)
ADDU A3 T0 A3 ; A3 now contains item string #1 pointer
SLL T2 T2 5 ; Multiply item #2 by 32 (distance between item strings)
ADDU T2 T0 T2 ; T2 now contains item string #2 pointer
SLL T3 T3 5 ; Multiply item #3 by 32 (distance between item strings)
ADDU T3 T0 T3 ; T3 now contains item string #3 pointer
SLL A2 A2 5 ; Multiply new item by 32 (distance between item strings)
ADDU A2 T0 A2 ; A2 now contains new item string pointer
MOVE T4 A2 ; Copy A2 to T4

LUI A0 hi(ItemMessageHolder)
ADDIU A0 A0 lo(ItemMessageHolder) ; Parse destination
; Pass message address on A1 (string formatter %s)
; Pass new item string on A2
; Pass item string #1 on A3
SW T2 16(SP) ; Pass item string #2 on A4
SW T3 20(SP) ; Pass item string #3 on A5
SW T4 24(SP) ; Pass new item string on A6
JAL sprintf
SW R0 28(SP) ; Terminator byte

LW RA 36(SP)
JR RA
ADDIU SP SP 40

;===Mini Func to Play Happy Voice===
.align 4
HappyVoice:
ADDIU SP SP -40
SW RA 36(SP)

; A0 = Player Character Value

JAL PlaySound
ADDIU A0 A0 0x2BE ; Add character value to Mario's happy voice
; Character voices are their "character value" distance away from
; Mario's, e.g. Luigi's character value = 1, so Luigi's happy voice
; is 1 away from Mario's.
; 0x2BE = Happy Voice, 0x287 = Sad Voice

LI A0 -1 ; Set current player
LI A1 5 ; Set joy animation
JAL SetBoardPlayerAnimation
LI A2 0 ; Do not loop animation

JAL SleepProcess
LI A0 40 ; Wait 40 frames for animation

LI A0 -1 ; Set current player
LI A1 -1 ; Set idle animation
JAL SetBoardPlayerAnimation
LI A2 2 ; Loop the animation

LW RA 36(SP)
JR RA
ADDIU SP SP 40

.fill 5,4

.byte 35 ; Reverse Mushroom (20-34)
.byte 50 ; Cellular Shopper (35-49)

.byte 85 ; Golden Mushroom (70-84)
.byte 100 ; Boo Bell (85-99)

.byte 75 ; Golden Mushroom (60-74)

;===Message Text===
.align 16
GreetingMessage:
.byte 0x1A,0x1A,0x1A,0x1A ; Padding for character image
.ascii "The game is reaching the"
.byte 0x03 ; Green font
.ascii " Last Five Turns"
.byte 0x08,0xC2 ; White font, Exclamation mark (!)
.byte 0xFF,0 ; Wait, press A to confirm

.align 16
NoEventMessage:
.byte 0x1A,0x1A,0x1A,0x1A ; Padding for character image
.ascii "And"
.byte 0x85,0x85,0x85 ; Three periods (...)
.ascii "everyone is tied"
.byte 0xC3,0xC2 ; Question mark (?), Exclamation mark (!)
.byte 0x0A,0x1A,0x1A,0x1A,0x1A ; New line + character image padding
.ascii "That"
.byte 0x5C ; Apostrophe (')
.ascii "s lame"
.byte 0x85,0x85,0x85 ; Three periods (...)
.ascii " Let"
.byte 0x5C ; Apostrophe (')
.ascii "s forget this"
.byte 0x0A,0x1A,0x1A,0x1A,0x1A ; New line + character image padding
.ascii "happened"
.byte 0x85 ; Period (.)
.ascii " Good luck"
.byte 0x82 ; Comma (,)
.ascii " you"
.byte 0x5C ; Apostrophe (')
.ascii "ll need it"
.byte 0xC2,0xC2 ; Two exclamation marks (!!)
.byte 0xFF,0 ; Wait, press A to confirm

.align 16
TiedPrompt:
.byte 0x1A,0x1A,0x1A,0x1A ; Padding for character image
